
1a1(mdo 'grel): tshad ma'i de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba slob dpon zhi ba mtshos mdzad pa bzhugs//
1b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ t+ttwa saM gra ha kA ri kA /bod skad du/ de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ 'phags
1b2(mdo 'grel): pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin dbang ldan gnyis ka dang/ /bdag sogs byed dang bral g.yo
1b3(mdo 'grel): ba/ /las dang de 'bras 'brel bdag /rnam par bzhag la sogs pa'i rten/ /yon tan rdzas dang bya ba dang/ /rigs dang 'du
1b4(mdo 'grel): sogs khyad par gyis/ /stong dang sgro btags rnam can ni/ /sgra dang shes pa'i spyod yul can/ /mtshan nyid gsal dang
2a1(mdo 'grel): ldan pa yi/ /tshad ma gnyis kyis gtan la dbab/ /cha shas shin tu phra bas kyang/ /'dres pa gzhan gyi bdag nyid
2a2(mdo 'grel): min/ /mi 'pho thog mdza' med pa can/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs dag dang 'dra/ /spros pa kun gyi tshogs dang bral/ /gzhan gyi
2a3(mdo 'grel): rtogs pa ma yin dang/ /rang dbang thos la mi brten pa/ /'gro la phan pa mdzad bzhed pa/ /bskal pa grangs med mi nyung bas/ /thugs
2a4(mdo 'grel): rje chen po'i bdag gyur pa/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni/ /gang gis gsungs pa smra ba'i mchog /kun mkhyen de la phyag 'tshal
2b1(mdo 'grel): nas/ /de nyid rnams ni bsdu bar bya/ /nus pa ma lus dang ldan pa'i/ /gtso bo nyid ni 'ba' zhig las/ /'bras bu'i khyad par rab skye ste/ /de dngos can nyid
2b2(mdo 'grel): yang dag par/ /gal te rgyu'i bdag nyid la/ /nus pa 'bras bu don yod min/ /de ni bya bar mi nus te/ /ngo bo med phyir mkha' pad bzhin/ /med par mtshungs
2b3(mdo 'grel): na ci'i phyir/ /sA lu sa bon la sogs pa'i/ /bye brag phyir na nges pa yi/ /nyer ni len len byed gzhan ma yin/ /skye ba'i chos can thams cad kyang/ /
2b4(mdo 'grel): dngos po kun la skye 'gyur te/ /'di kun la ni de dag nyid/ /khyad par khyad par med phyir ro/ /'di'i nus pa nges pa'i phyir/ /
2b5(mdo 'grel): de lta min zhes lan mi rung/ /gang phyir nus pa'i rgyu dag gis/ /nus par 'os pa'i 'bras nyid byed/ /khyad par byar med gang yin pa/ /dngos po
3a1(mdo 'grel): med dang 'gyur ba med/ /gyur na bdag nyid nyams gyur phyir/ /de dag gis de ji ltar byed/ /de ltar 'bras nyid mi rung phyir/ /ci zhig byed pas rgyu
3a2(mdo 'grel): ru 'gyur/ /de'i phyir sa bon la sogs pa/ /rgyu'i dngos por yang mi 'gyur/ /gsal ba 'di ni bde sogs kyi/ /rdzas 'gro'i bar ni gsal bar snang/ /rab tu
3a3(mdo 'grel): gdung dang btang snyoms sogs/ /'bras bu 'di la dmigs phyir ro/ /de phyir de bdag can las byung/ /de rigs rjes 'gro mthong phyir te/ /bum sogs bye
3a4(mdo 'grel): brag bzhin gtso bo/ /de yang yin zhes ser skya smra/ /'di la blo bzang rnam chad pa/ /yod pa la yang klan ka mtshungs/ /de la khyed kyi lan gang yin/ /blo bzang rnams
3a5(mdo 'grel): kyi'ang de dang 'dra/ /gal te zho sogs 'o ma sogs/ /bdag nyid la ni rnam kun yod/ /rgyu la sogs dang 'dra bdag nyid/ /yod pa de dag ci zhig skye/ /'bras bu
3b1(mdo 'grel): de rgyus bskyed bya min/ /yod phyir rgyu dang rig pa bzhin/ de phyir mngon 'dod rgyu min te/ /bsgrub bya med phyir bdag mchog bzhin/ /gal te gsal sogs mtshan nyid can/ /khyad par gyur pa
3b2(mdo 'grel): 'ga' zhig la/ /'di ni rgyu rnams kyis byed na/ /tha snyad du ni 'gyur pa min/ /gal te snga na de yod na/ /de ltar ci yang lan ma thebs/ /'on te de med de dag las/ /med par ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/ /
3b3(mdo 'grel): de phyir bsgrub bya med pas na/ /nyer len yongs su 'dzin pa med/ /nges pa las kyang skye ba med/ /nus pa med cing bya ba 'ang med/ /bdag nyid thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /'di ni 'bras bu ci yang med/ /
3b4(mdo 'grel): de phyir rgyu yi tha snyad kyang/ /'thad pa nyid ni ma yin no/ /sgrub byed zhugs pa thams cad ni/ /phyin ci log ni bzlog pa dang/ /nges pa skyed byed de lta bur/ /'di ni rigs pas 'thad ma yin/ /the tshom
3b5(mdo 'grel): dang ni phyin ci log /rtag tu gnas phyir zlog tu med/ /nges pa skye ba 'ang yod ma yin/ /de nyid phyir na kun don med/ /yang na nges pa med pa ni/ /sgrub byed las ni skye 'gyur na/ /yang dag ma yin
3b6(mdo 'grel): skye zhe na/ /de nyid kyis na 'di dag kun/ /'khrul pa can 'gyur ma yin nam/ /gal te mi gsal de dag las/ /gsal rten zhe na de gsal gang/ /ngo bo khyad par skye min te/ /dbyer med phyir dang ma
4a1(mdo 'grel): 'brel phyir/ /yul de rigs pa 'ang ma yin la/ /dmigs pa'i sgrib pa zad pa 'ang min/ /rtag pa'i phyir dang dmigs pa ni/ /gnyis pa yang ni mi srid phyir/ /yon tan
4a2(mdo 'grel): gsum ldan dbyer med kyang/ /thams cad kun gyi byed po min/ /gang 'dra med pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /thams cad byed po kun min na/ /bltos pa ma grub pa yi phyir/ /khyod ni nus pa nges pa med/ /
4a3(mdo 'grel): yod na de yi nges pa ni/ /bltos bcas rig pa ma yin nam/ /de min de dag ma skyes na/ /de lta'i sgra ni med du zad/ /khyad par kun gyis dben pa yi/ /dngos po'i ngo bo nyams pa med/ /mi ni
4a4(mdo 'grel): dngos po'i ngo bo min/ /gang phyir brjod dang rnam rtog ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dbyer med la/ /ji ltar goms pa bzhin du 'jug /skye ba'i dngos po'i dngos de ni/ /med dang de bzhin yod pa dang/ /
4a5(mdo 'grel): 'brel pa med de rnam rtog blos/ /med dang sbrel pa kho nar zad/ /gal te dngos po'i ngo bo nyid/ /gcig gi rjes la mthong ba dang/ /sngar med zhes pa de sa bon/ /sngar yod pa la 'di med do/ /'o ma sogs
4a6(mdo 'grel): la zho la sogs/ /nus pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa gang/ /de la nus gang gal te zho/ /'o ma bzhin du snang bar 'gyur/ /gal te gzhan yin gzhan yod na/ /ji ltar dngos kun gzhan zhes bya/ /snying stobs
4b1(mdo 'grel): yod pa sdug bsngal dang/ gti mug yod pa ma yin no/ /gsal ba snying stobs sogs rjes 'gro/ des la ji ltar yang ma grub/ /bde sogs nang gi yin pa'i phyir/ /de ni rang rig gsal phyir ro/ /sgra sogs gcig pu kho na yang/ /goms dang rig pa'i bye brag las
4b2(mdo 'grel): chags pa la sogs nges pa ni/ /skye ba dag tu gsal bar snang/ /dngos gcig rjes su 'brangs nas ni/ /rigs pa rna tshogs thal bar 'gyur/ gal te ma mthong sogs dbang gis/ /dngos po'i rjes su 'brang mi 'gyur/ dngos po ngo bo rnam gsum
4b3(mdo 'grel): pa/ de'i rig pa rnam gcig can/ de dang mi mthun de dag ni/ /de la yang dag ji ltar rigs/ /skyes bu gcig la rnal 'byor pa'i/ /bde dang skyo dang btang snyoms skye'i/ /pha rol rnams kyi skyes bu ni/ de'i ngo bor 'dod ma yin/ /gsal
4b4(mdo 'grel): ba yon tan gsum can du/ /grub kyang gtso bor ba? ma grub/ /de rgyu gcig dang rtag nyid min/ /de ni rigs gcig dang ldan min/ /gsal ba thams cad lcags kyi ni/ /thur ma dang 'dra rim pa dang/ 'brel pa'i lus can dag tu snang
4b5(mdo 'grel): rtog dang 'dres pa'i bdag nyid can/ de bzhin 'ji ba'i 'gyur la sogs/ /khyad par rigs gcig ldan min dang/ /rgyu gcig min par yang 'grub ste/ /'jim gong la sogs tha dad phyir/ skyes bu rnams la sems yod sogs/ /rjes 'gro ni 
4b6(mdo 'grel): yang rgyu gcig ni/ sngon 'gror mi 'dod dngos min zhes/ /gal te dngos su min zhes na/ /'di la ni yang ces mi mtshungs/ de phyir gtso bo'i rgyu med na/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa/ /sna tshogs thams cad nus pa yi/ /khyad par las ni
4b7(mdo 'grel): rung bar 'gyur/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las rang bzhin rtag pa ste dang po'o// //gzhan dag skye ldan kun gyi ni/ /rgyu ni dbang phyug yin zhes zer/ /shes pa med pa'i bdag nyid ni/ /rang gi
5a1(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu rtsom mi byed/ /rab rtsom byed pa'i yan lag gi/ dbyings kyi khyad par dang ldan gang/ /de ni blo ldan rgyas bskyed bya/ /bum pa sogs bzhin dbang po ni/ /gnyis kyis gzung par bzung ba min/ /rtsod
5a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i gzhi dang 'di 'dra bar/ /des na blo ldan sngon 'gro bar/ /chos mi mthun pa rdul du 'dod/ /de bzhin lus sems pa yi rgyu/ /shes pa yod pas byin brlabs te/ /gzugs sogs ldan phyir rgyu spun sogs/ /rang gi 'bras bu byed mthong
5a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /chos dang chos min rdul phran bzhin/ /sems dang ldan pas byin brlabs te/ rang gi 'bras bu byed sdod do/ /'jug phyir tshig pa rgyu spun bzhin/ /skyes bu skye ba'i dang po ni/ /tha snyad gzhan gyis bstan las byung/ /rab sad rnams kyis
5a4(mdo 'grel): des pa'i phyir/ /byis pa yi ni tha snyad bzhin/ /'byung ba chen sogs gsal ba ni/ /sems dang ldan pas byin brlabs na/ /'jig rten kun gyi bde ba dang/ /sdug bsngal rgyu mtshan nyid du 'gyur/ /shes pa med pa nyid 'bras nyid dang/ 'jig
5a5(mdo 'grel): pa nyid sogs rgyu yi phyir/ /ste'u sogs bzhin de yi phyir/ /de ni yod par gsal bar shes/ /kun gyi byed pa nyid grub na/ /de ni sgrib med kun shes nyid/ /grub ste 'di ltar byed pos ni/ 'bras bu'i ngo bo sogs rigs byed/ /rtsod pa'i rten
5a6(mdo 'grel): gyis dngos po ni/ /'gal ba mngon sum du ni gsal/ /dngos po yod sogs gtan tshigs phyir/ /bde sogs ngo bo'i bye brag gi/ sgrub pa dang po de la ni/ /gtan tshigs ma grub gang gi phyir/ /bkod par 'byor pa zhes bya dang/ /de
5a7(mdo 'grel): bzhin yan lag can ma grub/ /bltar rung nyid du khas blangs pa/ /gnyis ka mi dmigs pa yi phyir/ /de yi phyir ni dpe 'di yang/ /sgrub dang ldan pa ma yin na/ /mig dang rig pa'i rnam shes ni/ tha dad snang ba nye bar skye/ /de dag dmigs
5b1(mdo 'grel): ba gcig nyid med/ /dri la sogs pa'i sems bzhin no/ /de dag gis ni mthu byung na/ /rtog dang 'brel pa'i bdag nyid can/ /nying mtshams sbyor ba'i shes pa yi/ /bsdus la zhen par byed pa yin/ /de phyir chu dang me sogs 'di/ /dbang po gnyis kyis gzung bya med
5b2(mdo 'grel): ji skad bshad pa'i chos can ni/ /ma grub phyir na gzhi ma grub/ /lha khang la sogs la bkod pa/ /khyad par can nyid ci 'dra ba/ /byed pa po ni mi dmigs na/ gang mthong bas ni blo ldan rtogs/ /lus dang ri sogs chos can la/ /gal te de 'dra nyid snang na//
5b3(mdo 'grel): sgrub pa 'di las ji lta bur/ /'dod pa sgrub pa de rigs so/ /rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa yis/ /gang gis 'bras bur gang nges pa/ /de mthong ba na de des pa/ /zhes byar rig pas gnas pa yin/ /dbyibs kyi khyad par de lta bu/ /lus dang shing la
5b4(mdo 'grel): sogs pa'i dbyibs/ /khyad par 'di dag la med de/ /de 'dra ba ni rab brjod pa'i/ /sgra tsam 'ba' zhig kho na yis/ /ldog na the tshom za bar ni/ /sgrub par 'grub ste grogs mkhar dag /rdza mkhan gyis ni byas pa bzhin/ /chos kyi khyad par rnam
5b5(mdo 'grel): rtag phyir/ /'di ni ltag sbyong ma yin nam/ /'bras bu la sogs spyi nyid ni/ /sgrub pa yin par bstan ce na/ de dngos min pa las log pa'i/ /'bras bu tsam zhig mi rtag nyid/ /sgrub par byed de bdag phyir ro/ /sgrub byed de la de tshul med/ /me
5b6(mdo 'grel): la 'khrul pa med par ni/ /du ba'i bdag nyid skye bo mthong/ /skya bor brjod pa ce na nyid kyis// //kha ba las kyang de rtog med/ /spyir 'brel ba lang gang gi tshe/ /khyad par dag la brtod pa yi/ /klan ka de la tshol byed na/ ltag chod yin par yang dag brjod/ /gal te tshul 'dir
5b7(mdo 'grel): mi brten par/ gzhan du go sgra'i brjod pa tsam/ /nyid kyis rdo rje la sogs la/ /rwa can nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gal te 'di la 'brel pa ni/ /tshad ma yis ni sgrub byed na/ /de phyir rig pas grub byed na/ /rtsod pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ /'on kyang rtag
6a1(mdo 'grel): gcig kun shes pa'i/ /blo rtag pa yi rten yin par/ 'grub par mi 'gyur khyab med phyir/ /bsgrub bya med pa nyid phyir ro/ /'di ltar kha skya them skas dang/ /khang bzang chod dus la sogs pa/ rnam shes du ma mi
6a2(mdo 'grel): rtag pas/ /sngon du 'gro ba can du des/ /de nyid phyir na 'dod pa la/ /gnod par byed par yang 'dod do/ /rnam shes du ma mi rtag pa/ /sngon 'gro can nyid sgrub phyir ro/ /rgyu ni blo dang ldan tsam la/ /khyod kyis 'brel pa brjod pas na/ /gnyis pa la ni kho bo yis
6a3(mdo 'grel): rnam pa gsal ba brjod pa yin/ /rtag rnams rim dang rim min pa/ /'gal phyir bya ba byed ma yin/ /yul rnams rim can nyid kyi phyir/ /de shes rnams la'ang rim pa yod/ /shes bya rim can dang 'brel phyir/ /dbang phyug shes pa rim pas
6a4(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ /lha sbyin sogs kyi rnam par shes/ /'bar sogs spyod yul can bzhin no/ /kho bos bum pa la sogs pa/ /rdul phran tshogs can yin par 'dod/ /de'i byed po rdza mkhan sogs/ /rdul phran kho na'i byed por 'dod/ /de phyir
6a5(mdo 'grel): chos mi mthun pa'i dpe/ /rdul phran rab tu bstan 'di las/ /bsgrub bya nyid du mngon 'dod pa'i/ /chos 'di log pa ma yin no/ /gal te spyir na blo ldan zhig /sngon du 'gro ba can 'dod na/ /de la brtsod pa yod med do/ /ngo bo sna tshogs las
6a6(mdo 'grel): skyes pa/ /rtag lo gcig can sngon 'gro bar/ /bsgrub na bsgrub byas stong pa nyid/ /mang po rnams kyis khang skye sogs/ /byas par mthong phyir 'khrul pa yin/ /skyon 'di nyid ni ci rigs par/ /gtan tshigs lhag ma dag
6a7(mdo 'grel): la yang/ /sbyar bar bya ste gzhan yang ni/ /cung zad tsam zhig rab bstan te/ /skad cig 'jig phyir rdul phran sogs/ /'dod nas 'jug par ma grub po/ /de yang rim dang ldan 'jug phyir/ /de nyid kyis na 'khrul pa 'ang yin/ /kho bo 'jig tshe skyes
6b1(mdo 'grel): bu rnams/ /rnam shes dran pa 'jig mi 'dod/ /'od gsal lha sogs skye phyir dang/ /de nyid las ni 'di skye phyir/ /kha med lung 'bog byed pa po/ /gal te dad pas rtogs 'gyur gyis/ /lus 'bras nyid phyir kha med de/ /chos dang chos min
6b2(mdo 'grel): med phyir ro/ /sgrub byed kun la khyab ba ni/ /rjes su dpag dang 'gal ba dang yin/ /'gal ba'i chos kyi gtan tshigs ni/ /khyab par rung ba ma yin no/ /skye ba med phyir dbang phyug ni/ /skye ba can gyi rgyu ma yin/ /nam mkha' yi ni pad+ma bzhin/ /gzhan du thams
6b3(mdo 'grel): cad cig car 'gyur/ gang dag rim gyis 'byung bar yang/ /de dag dbang phyug rgyu can min/ /ji skad bshad pa'i sgrub pa las/ /blun po yid ches skyed pa bzhin/ /de dag kyang de las byung na/ /sgrub pa brjod pa don med do/ /rtag phyir gso byed min pa la/
6b4(mdo 'grel): de ni lhan cig byed ma yin/ /gang dag yod na 'byung mthong la/ /med na nam yang ma yin pa/ /de yi rgyu gzhan nyid rtog na/ /khyed la ji ltar thug med min/ /byed pa po nyid bkag pa'i phyir/ /kun shes nyid kyang bsal par ni/ /rtogs bya de yi
6b5(mdo 'grel): stobs nyid kyis/ /kun shes nyid du 'thad phyir ro/ /ci skad bshad pa'i nyes pa yi/ /sgrub rnams sun phyung ma gyur kyang/ /'on kyang 'khrul pa mthong ba'i phyir/ /byed pa po gcig ma grub na/ /thams cad shes nyid ci lta brten/ /de sgrub phyir ni sgrub
6b6(mdo 'grel): smras pa/ /rgyal dpog pa rnams la mdzes so/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las dbang phyug brtag pa ste gnyis pa'o// //de ltar rang bzhin dbang phyug dag/ so sor rgyu nyid bkag pa'i phyir/ /gnyis ka lhan cig pa 'di yang/ /skye ba can gyi
6b7(mdo 'grel): byed po min/ /de dag lhan cig byed nyid du/ /brtags pa gang yin pa de yang/ /khyad par skyed par byed phyir ram/ /don gcig byed pa'i phyir yin grang/ /rtog pa dang po rigs min te/ /de dag 'gyur pa med phyir ro/ /gnyis pa 'ang ma yin 'bras bu rnams/
7a1(mdo 'grel): cig car thal bar 'gyur phyir ro/ /ci ste gtso bo'i ngo bo ni/ /tshul gsum nyid du rnam par gnas/ /de la dbang phyug 'di rdul dang/ /ldan na 'byin pa'i rgyu yin no/ /snying stobs sha cher? 'jug pa la/ /gang tshe rten par byed
7a2(mdo 'grel): pa na/ /de tshe 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /gnas pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid du 'gyur/ /gang tshe mun pa'i nus pa ni/ /shas chen po dang sbyor ba na/ /de tshe 'di ni 'gro ba kun/ /'jig par byed pa yin zhes grags/ /de ltar rdul dang snying stobs sogs/ /dngos po rnams
7a3(mdo 'grel): 'di yi lhan cig byed/ /rim pa kho nar 'byung 'gyur te/ de phyir 'bras bu rin med yin/ /'dir brjod bya ste 'di dag ni/ /gcig byed tshe na srid dam gcig sgrub pa'i mthu ste yod dam med/ gal te yod na 'byin tshe gzhan/ gnyis pa yang ni yod par 'gyur//
7a4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gzhan zhig yod na yang/ gnyis pa gzhan du thal bar 'gyur/ /de yi ngo bo gzhan gyis ni/ /gzhan gyis byed po ma yin pas/ /'di yi rang bzhin 'di nyid ni/ de yi bye brag ga la yod/ /de yi nus pa dang bral na/
7a5(mdo 'grel): gzhan tshe de'i skyed pa por/ /mi 'gyur nus pas stong pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha' yi ni me tog bzhin/ /nus pa shas tshan ngo bo yang/ /gal te de tsam gyi rgyu na/ /rgyu'i ngo bo rtag nye'i phyir/ /dus kun tu ni de yod 'gyur/ /gzhan dag gis gzhan mi 'dod pa/ /de phyir gzhan
7a6(mdo 'grel): las kyang de min/ /res 'ga' 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir/ /de ni rang dbang can yang yin/ /rang las byung na rgyu nyid min/ rang la byed pa 'gal phyir ro/ /dngos po rnams ni bltos pa yis/ /res 'ga' ba nyid srid pa yin/ /'di ltar rang gi bdag nyid la//
7a7(mdo 'grel): rang dngos bya ba 'jug mi 'dod/ /bdag nyid grub par gyur pa yang/ /gnas skabs 'di la grub phyir/ /bdag gi de nyid ma grub pa/ /'ga' la byed pa min nyid de/ /nus pa kun dang bral ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha' i pad+ma la sogs bzhin/ de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i
7b1(mdo 'grel): rab tu byed pa las gnyis ka brtag pa ste gsum pa'o// //rang bzhin smra ba rnams kyis ni/ /dngos po rnams kyi skye ba 'di/ /rgyu kun la ni bltos med smra/ /de dag rang yang rgyur mi smra/ /pad+ma'i ge sar la sogs pa'i/ /sna tshogs
7b2(mdo 'grel): gang gis byed 'gyur ba 'am/ /rma bya'i mdongs la sogs pa yis/ /sna tshogs pa'i gang gis sprul/ /dper na tsher? ma la sogs pa'i/ /sna tshogs rgyu med can nyid de/ /res 'ga' 'byung phyir de bzhin du/ /sdug bsngal la sogs rgyu med nyid/ /rjes su 'gro ldog
7b3(mdo 'grel): ldan pa yi/ /mtsho skyes ge sar la sogs pa/ /gnas skabs khyad par ldan pa yi/ /sa bon 'dam dang chu sogs can/ /mngon sum mi dmigs pa dag gi/ rgyu ni nges pa nyid yin na/ /gang tshe 'di dag gi rgyun ni/ gzhan gang yin zhes 'dri bar byed/ /yul dang dus
7b4(mdo 'grel): kyi nges pa dag /ji ltar dngos po rnams la yod/ /gal te 'di yi de rgyu min/ /de dag kun tu kun 'byung tshe/ /gang du gang tshe 'ga' zhig la/ /de las gzhan pa spangs nas ni/ /des pa nyid du 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de dag de la bltos pa yin/ /de ltos de ltar
7b5(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba yin/ /bltos pa 'bras bu nyid du brjod/ /mngon sum gyis kyang de ltar brjod/ /des ni 'di la rgyu dag 'grub/ /yang na de la zhes byar sbyar/ /de phyir rang bzhin smra ba 'di/ /mngon sum gyis ni rab gnod 'gyur/ /mngon sum dang ni mi dmigs pas brgya
7b6(mdo 'grel): yi ngo bo des phyir ro/ /rgyu yod par ni bsgrub don ste/ /tshad ma yod nyid ma gyur mod/ /de lta na yang tshad med pas/ /don med nyid du nges pa yin/ /gang phyir don ni yod pa yi/ /tshad ma khyab byed dang rgyu min/ /tha dad par ni yod phyir dang/ /'khrul phyir de las byung phyir ro
7b7(mdo 'grel): dngos gang de lta'i rnam pa min/ /de nyid dang ni ldog pa las/ /gzhan ldog par ni nges pa ru/ /mi rtog 'brel pa med phyir ro/ /kun gyis ma mthong the tshom dang/ /rang gi ma mthong 'khrul pa ste/ /'bigs byed ri phug ngur pa sogs/ ma mthong bar yang yod phyir ro/ /gal te
8a1(mdo 'grel): rgyu med can nyid du/ bsgrub phyir gtan tshigs mi sbyor na/ tshad ma med par mi 'grub ste/ /de yi phyir na phyogs mi 'grub/ gal te de grub phyir gtan tshigs/ /rab tu sbyor ba de lta na'ang/ /grub pa de rgyus bskyed nyid phyir/ /khyed kyi phyogs
8a2(mdo 'grel): kyi 'grub mi 'gyur/ de ltar shes byed gtan tshigs dang/ /de gsal byed pa'i yang de ni/ /grub pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid gyur pa/ /bsgrub bya'i shes byed yin par bshad/ /de phyir byed pa 'di nyid ni/ shes par byed pa'ang rgyur 'dod do/ /sgrub bya'i skyed byed ma yin phyir/
8a3(mdo 'grel): byed pa por ni mi brjod do/ /de phyir dngos po gzhan dag kyang/ /rgyu bcas nges las skyed phyir ro/ /khyed kyi bsgrub bya'i don yul can/ /shes pa bzhin du bsgrub 'byung phyir/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las 'gro ba rang bzhin du smra ba brtag pa ste
8a4(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa'o// //skye 'jig med par yang dag ldan/ /sgra yi rang bzhin tshangs pa mchog /gang de yongs su gyur pa ni/ /dngos po'i grong nyid rab shes bya/ /de ltar gang dag brjod pa la'ang/ /de la brjod bya ba 'di ni/ /rang gi sgra yi ngo bo ni//
8a5(mdo 'grel): btang nas sngo sogs nyid thob bam/ /de lta min na gang gi tshe/ /dang po'i phyogs rten de mi tshe/ yi ge nyid dang bral 'gyur te/ sngar yod dag ni 'jig phyir ro/ /ji ltar de ma thag pa'i phyogs/ de la sngo sogs myong ba'i tshe/ /'on pa la yang gsal por ni/
8a6(mdo 'grel): sgra yi bdag nyid myong bar 'gyur/ /gang gis gtso bor 'jug pa yis/ /thams cad sgra yi ngo bor gnas/ /sgra yi ngo bo ma btang na/ /yongs 'gyur bar brjod phyir ro/ /sngon po la sogs gcig nyid du 'phal ba min par rnam gnas na/ de rigs pa yi
8a7(mdo 'grel): dus su ni/ /ji ltar 'di rig yang ma yin/ /'di rig med na sngo sogs kyang/ /rab tu myong bar mi 'gyur te/ /gcig bdag nyid phyir tha dad chos/ /shin tu tha dad thal bar 'gyur/ 'gal ba'i chos dang 'brel pa yi/ /dngos rnams tha dad mtshan nyid yin
8b1(mdo 'grel): gzhan du gsal ba'i pha dang la'ang/ /rtog pa 'di ni med par 'gyur/ /gal te dngos po so so yang/ /sgra gcig bdag nyid dbyer med 'dod/ /thams cad yul gcig nyid dang ni/ /rnam pa gcig tu rig par 'gyur/ /'di gsal so so tha dad na/ /tshangs pa du mar thal 'gyur te/
8b2(mdo 'grel): tha dad du ma dngos po'i bdag/ ngo bo nyid phyir dngos po'i bzhin/ /sgra yi rang bzhin rtag nyid ni/ /dngos rnams kyang ni rtag nyid de/ de dag cig car grub pa'i phyir/ /yongs su grub pa mi rigs so/ /ngo bo gcig ni mi gsal bzhin/ /ngo bo gzhan ni 'byung 'gyur na/ /'jig sogs
8b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du 'grub 'gyur ba/ /rim med la ni yongs gyur med/ /gzhan yang 'bras bu'i ngo bor ni/ /'gro ba'i sgra tshangs rang bzhin na/ /de lta na yang 'gyur med phyir/ /de las rim pa 'byung ba med/ /rang bzhin gcig po de nyid las/ /gzhan gzhan ngo bor
8b4(mdo 'grel): 'byung min na/ /don gyi ngo bo yongs gyur par/ /de la ji ltar brjod par bya/ /de yi ngo bo min las ldog/ 'ji ba'i ngo bo nyid dmigs phyir/ kham bum la sogs khyad par la/ /'ji ba'i bdag nyid gcig tu rtog/ sngo dang ser sogs khyad par la/ /sgra
8b5(mdo 'grel): bdag min las ldog pa ni/ /de nyid la ni mi dmigs te/ /de phyir rtog pa'ang sa bon med/ /ci ste tshangs pa'i de nyid 'di/ /rtag tu cha med nyid gnas pa/ /ma rig gis bslad 'jig rten gyi/ /sna tshogs nyid du mngon par sems/ /de la'ang ma rig pas
8b6(mdo 'grel): 'khrul pa'i/ /skye bo rnams kyis gzugs rtogs 'gyur/ /gang zhig sngo sogs rnams pa ru/ /blang dang dor ba'i rgyu mtshan ni/ /de yi ngo bo las rtog pa'i/ /tshangs pa'i ngo bor shes pa med/ /ji ltar ldang ba'i sems rnams kyis/ /yod pa nyid du shes mi
8b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /de ni mngon sum gyis 'grub min/ /cha med snang ba med phyir ro/ /rtag las skye ba rigs yin pas/ /de las 'bras bu'i rtags kyang med/ /chos can yod nyid ma grub phyir/ /rang bzhin grub byed ma yin no/ /de dag las ni ma gtogs pa'i/ /yod par grub pa'i rtogs
9a1(mdo 'grel): med do/ /shes bya yin ni go rim las/ /shes kun go rims can du grub/ /gzhan du cig car nyid du ni/ /de 'bras rnam shes thal bar 'gyur/ /'di ni shes pa tsam la yang/ /nus pa'i dngos med de la gzhan/ /yin na 'di na mo gsham gyi//
9a2(mdo 'grel): bu dang mtshungs par thal bar 'gyur/ /rnam dag ye shes rgyu can gyi/ /rnal 'byor bas kyang tshangs pa'i dngos/ /de mi shes te de yi phyir/ /shes la bya ba 'brel med phyir/ /gtso bo yongs su gyur pa dang/ /tshangs pa'i lta ba mtshungs pa 'ang min/ /tshangs pa'i mthong
9a3(mdo 'grel): ba gtso bo yi/ /yongs su 'gyur ba dang yang mtshungs/ /de yi sun 'byin rjes 'brangs nas/ /'di la sun 'byin rtogs par bya/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las sgra'i tshangs pa brtag pa ste lnga pa'o// //nyes par bshad pa'i grub mdza' yi/
9a4(mdo 'grel): rjes 'jug blo can gzhan dang ni/ /dbang phyug chos mtshungs skye bu ni/ /'jig rten rgyur ni rtog par byed/ /dngos po ma lus 'jig na yang/ /shes pa nus ldan 'jig pa med/ /brgya rnams kyi ba bzhin du/ /de ni skye ldan rgyu ru grags/ /dbang phyug bzhin
9a5(mdo 'grel): du 'di la yang/ /sun 'byin thams cad brjod par yang/ /'di yi bya ba 'di 'dra 'di/ /ci yi phyir na byed pa yin/ /gal te gzhan gyis rab sbyar phyir/ /'di ni rang dbang nyid 'gyur min/ /'on te brtse bas byed 'gyur na/ /'gro ba gcig tu bde bar
9a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur// nad dang dbul dang mya ngan sogs/ /sdug bsngal du mas gzir ba yi/ /skye ba 'byin par byed pa de'i/ /rjes su brtse pa ji ltar shes/ /'byin pa'i snga na snying rje'i yul/ /med na rjes brtse 'thad ma yin/ /gang dang 'brel par gyur
9a7(mdo 'grel): pa las/ /'di ni 'byin pa bor rtog byed/ /rtag tu bde dang ldan rnams kyis/ /'jig pa 'di yis byed mi 'gyur// de yis ma mthong la bltos na/ /rang dbang nyid ni nyams par 'gyur/ /ma mthong sdug bsngal gyis rgyu la/
9b1(mdo 'grel): ci phyir de ni ltos par byed/ /'di ni brtse dang ldan yin na/ de la btang snyoms bya bar rigs/ /gal te de 'jug rtsed mo'i don/ /rtsed mo la ni gtso bo min/ /rtsed mo'i thabs ni sna tshogs la/ /bltos pa'i phyir na gzhon nu bzhin/ /rtsed mo bsgrub bya'i dga' gang dang/ /de yi bsgrub
9b2(mdo 'grel): byed gang yin de/ /gal te de byed nus ldan na/ de kun cig car byed par 'gyur/ /dang por de nus ldan min na/ /mi gzhan du yang nus med 'gyur/ /dngos po dbye ba med pa la/ /nus dang mi nus mi rigs so/ /'on te rang bzhin nyid las 'di/ /'jug pa la sogs la
9b3(mdo 'grel): brjod de/ /dper na me sogs rang bzhin gyis/ /sreg pa la sogs las la bzhin/ /gal te de la yin de las/ /dngos po ma lus cig car 'byung/ /de dag skyed pa'i nus pa dang/ /ldan pa'i rgyu ni nye phya'i ro/ /me la sogs pa'i dngos rnams la/ /nges pa nyid ni nus pa
9b4(mdo 'grel): dag/ dus kun tu ni 'byung min te/ /rang gi rgyu stobs las 'byung phyir/ /gzhan du gal te dag gi 'am/ /des 'di khas mi len na ni/ /'bras bu thams cad cig car ni/ /yang dag 'byung ba nyid du 'gyur/ /brgya bal gyi rang bzhin gyi/ /snal ma'i rgyur ni mi 'dod de/ /gang phyir
9b5(mdo 'grel): srog chags pa 'dod las/ /kha chu yi ni dra ba byed/ /gal te ji zhig ltar 'jug na/ /'di yi 'byung ldan ci 'dra zhig /gang gi phyir na nya pa yang/ /ma dpyad las la 'jug mi 'gyur/ /dpa' bo'i bu dang bdag skyes so/ /rnam pa de dag nyid kyis ni/ /byed pa por yongs brtags
9b6(mdo 'grel): pa yang/ /yongs su 'ang de dag sun phyung 'gyur/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las skyes bu brtag pa ste drug pa'o// //gzhan dag kyang ni 'dir bdag nyid/ /'dod la sogs pa'i rten gyur pa/ /de bzhin rtag dang kun 'jug can/ /rang nyid sems
9b7(mdo 'grel): med ngo bor 'dod/ /dge dang mi dge'i las rnams kyi/ /byed pa po dang de 'bras kyi/ /za ba po yin sems 'brel phyir/ /sems yin rang gi ngo bos min/ /shes dang rtsom sogs dang 'brel pa/ /de la byed pa po nyid brjod/ /bde dang sdug bsngal sogs rig pa'i/ /'dul ba
10a1(mdo 'grel): las ni za ba po/ /de yis ris mthun khyad par dang/ /blo rnams dang ni tshor ba ni/ /sngar med rnams dang 'brel pa yi/ /de skye mngon par mngon par brjod/ /sngar blangs pa dang bral ba ni/ /'chi ba yin te 'tsho ba yang/ /chos dang chos
10a2(mdo 'grel): min 'dus byas pa'i/ /lus babs yid dang 'brel pa yi/ /lus dang mig sogs gnod pa'i phyir/ /'di la 'tshe par rnam par brtag/ 'di ltar skyes bu brtag pa 'ang/ /tha dad 'di ni dri med 'dod/ /nga shes bya ba'i nus pa dang/ /lus la sogs ni tha
10a3(mdo 'grel): dad pa'i/ /rig par byed pa'i rig yin te/ /shes phyir de las gzhan pa bzhin/ /'dod pa la sogs thams cad kyang/ /de dag 'ga' zhig la brten nyid de/ /dngos nyid yin pas 'bras nyid phyir/ /gzugs bzhin nyid kyi skyes bu de/ /dngos nyid dngos po'i
10a4(mdo 'grel): phyir na 'di/ /'jig pa 'khrul ldan ma yin te/ /'jig ba rgyu can nyid na yang/ /gang phyir dngos nyid ma yin no/ /gzugs sogs shes pa thams cad kyang/ /gcig dang du ma'i mtshan nyid can/ /nga zhes bya ba'i shes pa dang/ /de dag mtshams ni sbyor nyid phyir//
10a5(mdo 'grel): gar mkhan smin khyug g.yo ba la/ /mang po dag gis shes pa bzhin/ /rnam pa du ma mtshams sbyor ba/ /rgyu med par ni skye mi 'gyur/ /bdag ces bya ba'i tshig 'di ni/ /blo dang dbang sogs tshogs pa las/ /tha dad par ni rjod byed min/ /rab grags mi las tha
10a6(mdo 'grel): dad na/ /gang phyir tshig gcig nyid 'dod phyir/ /gang yang de ltar des gyur pa/ /ji skad bshad pa'i chos dang ni/ /der 'brel bum pa'i sgra bzhin no/ /gson pa yi ni lus 'di ni/ /srog sogs dang yang bral 'gyur te/ /bdag nyid phyir na bum pa bzhin/ /de
10a7(mdo 'grel): phyir 'di la bdag med med/ /rnam shes phyi ma thams cad ni/ /skyes ma thag pa'i thog ma yi/ /shes pa'i rig byed kyis rig ste/ /shes phyir de yi rang so bzhin/ /thag ring yul na gnas gyur pa'i/ /bdag dang ldan pa nyid yin te/ /lus can sogs phyir
10b1(mdo 'grel): bdag lus med/ /de ltar bdag ni yod dang rtag /khyab byed dag tu nges yin na/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa/ /zhes byar gnas pa ma yin no/ /de ltar bu 'dir re zhig ni/ /sgrub byed dang po grub pa sgrub/ /gang phyir khyod kyis shes pa ni/ /kun mkhyen sogs kyi shes
10b2(mdo 'grel): byar 'dod/ /gsal byed la ni ltos med par/ /rang rig ngo bor skye 'gyur ba/ de ltar gzhan gyi rnam shes kyang/ /dpe ni bsgrub byas stong pa yin/ /de yi rnam par nyer bsgyur ba'i/ /gzhan gyis rab tu shes par 'gyur/ /de dpe nyid du brjod na yang/ /gzhan gyi sgo
10b3(mdo 'grel): nas the tshom 'gyur/ /gal te 'dod pa la sogs kyi/ /'ga' zhig rten du rab sgrub na/ /gal te de la rgyu tsam nyid/ /rten du yongs su rtog na ni/ /'dod pa grub yin gal te yang/ /de gzhi rten du khyod 'dod na/ /de tshe 'ang rgyu bas stong pa yis/ /rten du rtog pa don i med yin/ /rgyu shugs 'bras bu sogs kyi gzhi/ /mkhar gzhong la sogs bcad pa yi/ /ltung pa'i bgegs pa dang byed phyir ram/ khyad par dag ni skyed phyir ro/ /'jigs pa dngos po med pa yang/ /'bras bu nyid du rigs ldan min/ /de phyir gzhan gyi
10b4(mdo 'grel): gtan tshigs 'dir/ /khyad par smras pa'i don med do/ /ma rig pa yis bslad pa las/ /da yis zhes dang mtshams sbyor 'di/ /dngos po skad cig ma dag la'ang/ /byed po gcig tu zhen par 'jug /log pa'i rnam par rtog 'di las/ /de nyid gnas pa rig ma
10b5(mdo 'grel): yin/ /nus khyad par las tha dad kyang/ /gcig gi rgyu mtshan byed par 'gyur/ /gzugs dang sgra sogs sems dag ni/ /rjes 'khor gcig gis 'bras nyid na/ /snga phyi dag ni 'gal 'gyur te/ /nus pa'i rgyu ni nye phyir ro/ /rnam shes de ma thag gcig las/ /rnam
10b6(mdo 'grel): shes drug po 'byung ba ni/ /gsal bar cig car rig 'gyur te/ /de phyir 'dod pa'i sgrub byed yin/ /rim pa can/ la rgyu gcig nyid/ /med ces de ma thag tu bstan/ /de phyir de ni yid khyab la/ /rjes dpag gis gnod gsal por mthong/ /gar mkhan
11a1(mdo 'grel): smin khags g.yo ba ni/ /don dam par ni gcig nyid min/ /rdul phran du ma'i tshogs nyid phyir/ /de la gcig tu rtag pa'i phyir/ /'bras bu gcig la nye sbyor phyir/ /sgra gcig gi ni spyod yul yin/ /bsgrub bya rnam pa de lta bur/
11a2(mdo 'grel): gal te 'dod na grub pa sgrub/ /blo dang sems la sogs pa'i sgra/ /kho bo cag gi rnam grangs dag /tshig gcig yin yang tha dad pa'i/ /rjod par byed pa nyid ma yin/ /de phyir gtan tshigs ma nges pa'o/ /de'i khyad par smras yin nam/ /de nyid ma grub par smra te
11a3(mdo 'grel): sems rnam grangs su gnas shes bya/ /nga rgyal gyis ni rten nyid kyis/ /sems la bdag ces brjod pa ni/ /kun rdzob tu yin don dam par/ /'di yi yul ni yod ma yin/ /mkha' dkyil pad+ma sogs pad+ma/ /byed pa po la sogs pa'i tshig/ gcig ni rnam par sbyor
11a4(mdo 'grel): byed na/ /des ni 'khrul ba dag kyang mthong/ /brda tsam las ni byung ba yi/ /tshig dag gang du 'brel pa med/ /bdag la sogs pa'i tshig dag la'ang/ /rang bzhin gyi don gsal byed med/ /gang tshe bdag dang lhan cig tu/ /srog sogs 'brel pa 'grub 'gyur ba/
11a5(mdo 'grel): de tshe thal ba 'di rigs kyi/ /rnam pa gzhan du mi rigs so/ /mo gsham bu yi stong nyid ni/ gson lus srog sogs dang bral ba/ /thal bar mi 'gyur de bzhin du/ khyod kyi thal 'gyur 'di nyid yin /re zhig 'di la de bdag med/ /de dag tha dad khas len phyir ro/ /rgyu dang 'bras
11a6(mdo 'grel): bu nyid kyang min/ /cig car thal bar 'gyur phyir ro/ /de yi phyir na nyid ldog pa/ /de dang 'brel pa med pa yi/ /dbugs kyi 'byung rdub sogs 'di dag /ci phyir lus las ldog par 'gyur/ /de ltar sgrub byed thams cad kyis/ /bdag sogs ma grub pa yi phyir
11a7(mdo 'grel): rtag dang khyab pa nyid dag gi /dpe ni sgrub byas stong par bstan/ /gzhan dag gis bdag mngon sum gyis/ /grub pa nyid du yongs su brtags/ /gang phyir 'ong zhes rang rig ste/ /yul ni bdag yin par 'dod do/ /de ni mi rigs ba zhes la/ /de yi ngo bor mi snang
11b1(mdo 'grel): zhes/ /gang phyir de la rtag pa dang/ /khyab sogs snang ba shes pa med/ /'di ni kha dog dkar sogs su/ /snang ba gsal bar rig 'gyur na/ /de yi rang bzhin bdag mi 'dod/ /de phyir de yi yul can ni/ gal te skyes bu yang dag par/ /mngon sum gyis ni shes gyur na/ /de bas
11b2(mdo 'grel): ci phyir rtsod pa 'di/ /de yongs sogs la 'jug par 'gyur/ /'di ltar nges par bya ba 'di/ /nges pa'i bdag nyid du 'jug cing/ /nges pa dang ni sgro 'dogs blo/ /gnod bya gnod byed nyid du gnas/ /de phyir 'dod sogs thams cad? ni/ /bdag dang 'du ba ma yin nyid/ rim gyi skye ba
11b3(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi phyir/ /sa bon myu gu'i lcugs sogs bzhin/ /yang na nang gi bdag nyid kun/ /bdag med nyid kyis lus can ni/ dngos dang yid sogs gtan tshigs phyir/ /dper na phyi rol bum sogs bzhin/ /bdag bcas nyid de rgyu can/ /rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur/
11b4(mdo 'grel): rtag rnams kyang don byed nus min/ /de phyir yod nyid la sogs srid/ /bum sogs la mtshungs bdag med pa gzhan dag gis ni gson lus la/ /bkag pa gang yin de yang/ /kho bo cig gis 'dir bsgrub bya/ /da ltar bdag ni ma grub na'ang/ /de la rnam
11b5(mdo 'grel): bzhag byas pa gang/ /de kun gnas med nyid yin te/ /mo gsham la ni rnam gzhag bzhin/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las rigs pa can dang bye brag pas kun tu brtags pa'i skyes bu brtag pa ste bdun pa'o// //gzhan dag bdag ni ldog
11b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /rjes 'gro bdag nyid can gyi ni/ /sems pa'i ngo bo nyid du 'dod/ /sems pa'i blo yi mtshan nyid can/ /dper na sprul 'khyil gnas skabs na/ /ldog cing de ma thag tu ni/ /drang po'i gnas skabs byung na yang/ /sprul nyid du ni rjes 'jug 'gyur/ /de bzhin?
11b7(mdo 'grel): bdag ni rtag tu ni/ /sems pa'i rang bzhin can yin yang/ /ngo bo ma lus ldog pa dang/ /kun gyi rjes su 'jug pa'ang min/ /'on kyang 'di yi bde sdug sogs/ /mtshan nyid gnas skabs ldog 'gyur zhing/ /de dag ldog cing skye 'gyur yang/ /sems nyid rjes su 'jug
12a1(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /gtan du 'jig na byas chud zos/ ma byas phrad pa dag tu 'gyur/ dngos gcig la'ang sdug bsngal med/ /bde sogs longs spyod med par 'gyur/ /byed po nyid dang za bo dag/ skyes bu'i gnas la de mi brten/ /de phyir
12a2(mdo 'grel): skal ldan de nyid phyir/ /byed pa po nyid de'i 'bras thog /rnam pa de lta'i skyes bu 'di/ /ngo shes pa ni yod pa'i phyir/ /rtog par 'gyur te 'di nyid kyis/ /bdag med pa la rab tu gnod/ /bdag rig byed do zhes bdag blos/ shes pa po ni rtogs byed na/ /gal te
12a3(mdo 'grel): de ni 'ga' yin nam/ /gcig tu 'jig pa'i shes pa yin/ /gcig tu mi rtag nyid du 'gyur/ /gal te de yul bdag yin na/ /de tshe ma lus 'tsham par 'gyur/ /skad cig ma'i shes phyogs la/ /thams cad shin tu 'brel par dka' / 'di ltar sngon ni nga nyid kyis
12a4(mdo 'grel): shes 'gyur da ltar dus yang yin/ /nga nyid rig par byed ces pa'i/ /blo gang skye bar 'gyur pa ste/ /'on te de yis yul shes pa'i/ /skad cig ma ni gang yin brtag /'das pa 'am ni da ltar ci/ /gnyis ka 'am ni 'on te rgyun/ /de la dang po'i shes pa'i
12a5(mdo 'grel): yul/ shes par gyur zhes bya bar rigs/ /shes par byed ces de mi rigs/ /gang phyir da ltar de rigs med/ /da ltar ba ni yul nyid na/ /rig pa 'thad par byed do zhes/ /shes 'gyur zhes bya brdzun yin te/ /de nyid phyir ni de yi ni/ /gnyis ka bzung brtag de mi
12a6(mdo 'grel): bya ba gang phyir gnyis ka shes gyur dang/ /da ltar gnyis ka shes byed min// rgyun yang de mtshungs bya min te/ /gnyis ka yang ni med phyir ro/ /'di ni shes par gyur min zhing/ /da ltar kyang min dngos med phyir/ /de phyir bshad pa las gzhan ba'i/ /spyod
12a7(mdo 'grel): yul gar la nga 'di snyam/ /'jug phyir brtag pa'i dngos ldan phyir/ /bdag 'di 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /nga zhes pas bzung 'das pa yi/ /shes byed da ltar yang 'jug ste/ /nga yi shes pas rtog bya'i phyir/ /de la rig par byed po bzhin/ /shes bya
12b1(mdo 'grel): de yang la rtsad yod/ /shes byed phyir dang de nyid phyir/ /kha rtsad shes pa po bzhin no/ /shes pa de dag bsgrub bya nyid/ /rgyud gcig dang shes pa po yi/ /nga shes shes pa nyid kyi phyir/ /kha tsang de ring yod pa kun/ /don mtshungs can yin blo gcig bzhin/ /de lta bu
12b2(mdo 'grel): 'dir dpyad bya ste/ /gal te sems ni rtag gcig pur/ /'dod pa de ltar yin blo yang/ /de yi rang bzhin nyid thob 'gyur/ /blo dag dang ni skyes bu ni/ /des kyi sems kyi rang bzhin phyir/ /rtag nyid dang ni gcig nyid 'dod/ /gal te tha dad yul rten can/ /dper
12b3(mdo 'grel): na ma ni rang bzhin gyis/ /rtag tu sreg par byed las can/ /sreg bya'i don nye gyur pa sreg/ gzhan du min gzhan gyi tshe na'ang/ /dper na gsal pa'i me long dang/ /ji ltar shing gi sngo dang ni/ /gang zhig len nyer gyur pa/ /de yi rnam pa der thob byed/ /de bzhin rtag pa'i
12b4(mdo 'grel): sems nyid kyi/ /skyes bu lus la gnas pa rnams/ /dbang pos blangs pa'i lus la sogs/ /'dzin byed 'di ni kho bos blo/ /nye phyir nye bar 'thob byed pa'i/ /byed pa 'jig phyir blo 'jig can/ /ji ltar bsreg bya nye med phyir/ /me ni rtag tu sreg byed min//
12b5(mdo 'grel): de la rtog pa'i blo bdag nyid/ /blo ni ngo shes par byed de/ /bum pa glang po la sogs blo/ /de tha dad phyir 'jig rten 'dod/ /tha dad don rjes 'bras rnams kyis/ /blo de nyid ces brjod mi bya/ /don tha dad la mi brten na/ /ngo shes med pa ma yin no//
12b6(mdo 'grel): 'o na glang po sogs stong pa'i/ /sa la sgro 'dogs byed pa yi/ shes pa gang dag rab 'jug pa/ /der ni tha dad ci la brten/ /gal te yul gzhan sogs yod pa'i/ /gsal ba rnams ni rgyu mtshan yin/ /gang phyir yul dus gzhan gyi bdag /thams cad du
12b7(mdo 'grel): ni dmigs pa yin/ /'o na yul de dang 'brel pa/ /de ltar de dag la med nyid/ /de phyir der yang rang bzhin des/ /ci phyir de ltar snang bar byed/ /khyod kyis gzhung gi blo rnams ni/ /blo min phyi rol tu rjod byed/ /brjod par 'dod pa'i yul dang yang/ /glang
13a1(mdo 'grel): po rta sogs gnas pa med/ /gal te don kun rig ba med/ /ngo bor blo ni rtag gnas na/ /thams cad tshe na kun rig pa/ /des na ci phyir rig ma yin/ /sgra yi khyad par can blo gang/ /de nyid ro gzugs sogs yul can/ /'di yin
13a2(mdo 'grel): phyi rol gal te min/ /tha dad rang gi tshig gis bstan/ /bsreg bya'i dngos po ma lus pa/ /me yang rtag tu sred byed pa'i/ /bdag nyid can min gzhan du na/ /ma lus thal bar byed par 'gyur/ /bsreg bya'i don nyid nye ba na/ /de ni de bsreg bdag nyid rigs/ /de lta na ni don rnams kun/ /cig car
13a3(mdo 'grel): nyid sreg thal mi 'gyur/ /utpal sngo sogs 'brel pa las/ /me long dang ni shel la sogs/ /de gzugs brnyan du 'khrul bskyed pa'i/ /rgyu yin skad cig gis 'jig can/ /gzhan du khyad par bcas pa dang/ /cig shos gnas skabs gcig
13a4(mdo 'grel): nyid phyir/ /rtag tu de yi rnams pa 'am/ /de dang bral bar snang bar 'gyur/ /brtan gnyis phyir dang gting med phyir/ /lus can lhan cig mi gnas phyir/ /me long dbus kyi gzugs brnyan ni/ /nam yang 'dzin par byed ma yin/ /log gnyis gnas
13a5(mdo 'grel): pa dag gis kyang/ /shel rdo bzhin du dkar po ru/ /mthong 'gyur 'di yi phyir 'dis kyang/ /gzugs brnyan thob par 'gyur ba min/ /gal te de yi gzugs brnyan thob/ /de la don dam par yod na/ /khyad par so sor shes sogs ni/ /tha dad par ni thal bar 'gyur//
13a6(mdo 'grel): de phyir sna tshogs bsam mi khyab/ /nus can de dag la 'di 'khrul/ /blo la 'khrul pa'i dngos po yang/ /mi rigs tha dad bral phyir ro/ /ma rtogs ngo bo las ldog pa/ /blo kun dag la mtshungs pa yin/ /sgro btags pa yi gcig shes nyid/ /sna tshogs nyid
13a7(mdo 'grel): la'ang 'jug par 'gyur/ /gnas skabs rnams kyi tha dad kyi/ /tha dad pas stong nges gnas pa'i/ /brtan pa'i rang bzhin can bdag la/ /gang gzhan gyis ni kun brtags ni/ /kho bo'i skyes bu sdug bsngal sogs/ /gnas skabs thob par byed
13b1(mdo 'grel): na yang/ /shel dang rdzas yod nyid sogs kyis/ /ngo bo 'dod par mi byed nyid/ /gnas skabs gzhan ni skye 'gyur tshe/ /snga ma shin tu 'jig mi 'gyur/ /phyi ma'i rjes mthun don du na/ /spyi bdag nyid la thim par 'gyur/ /rang gi ngo bos gnas skabs dag /
13b2(mdo 'grel): phan tshun du ni 'gal pa nyid/ /spyi yi bdag ni thams cad du/ /'gal med par ni shes par bya/ /de la gal te skyes bu las/ /gnas skabs gcig tu tha dad min/ /de dag skye 'jig yod pa na/ /'di la'ang de dag de bzhin 'gyur/ /'gal
13b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i chos dang 'brel 'gyur na/ /gcig tu tha dad nyid 'gyur te/ /ji ltar khyed kyi skyes bu rnams/ /rang bdag so sor nges pa bzhin/ /gal te khyed kyi gnas skabs rnams/ /rang gi ngo bos skyes bu la/ /zha thim 'gyur sogs 'byung
13b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshe/ /sdug bsngal sogs de 'ang myong bar 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi ngo bo 'pho 'gyur ba/ /gzhan 'pho bar yang mi 'dod cing/ /de yi bdag nyid 'pho 'gyur na'ang/ /de phyir bdag ni skye ldan 'gyur/ /gal te byed po za bo dag /gnas skabs
13b5(mdo 'grel): la brten ma yin na/ /de phyir skabs ldan de nyid phyir/ /byed po sogs nyid yod mi 'gyur/ /de phyir rtag smras brjod bya nyid/ /bdag la bzlog par bya ba nyid/ /rang gi ngo bo'i 'gyur ldan phyir/ /de ni chad par 'gyur ba yin/ /sprul yang skad cig 'jig
13b6(mdo 'grel): nyid phyir/ /'khyog pa la sogs thob 'gyur gyi/ /rten dngos yin na skyes bu bzhin/ /gnas skabs bzhin dang 'brel ba med/ /nga'o snyam pa'i shes pa 'di/ /dmigs pa med pa nyid du ni/ /thog med sems can du lta ba'i/ /sa bon stobs las
13b7(mdo 'grel): 'gar nyid 'jug /gang phyir 'du byed 'ga' zhig nyid/ /de yi rang gi ngo bor zhe na/ bdag po nyid ni thob byed pa/ /de phyir kun tu 'jug mi 'gyur/ /gzhan du khyed kyi skyes bu la'ang/ /brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pa yin/ /de phyir tha dad nus yod
14a1(mdo 'grel): pas/ /thams cad rtsod pa med par 'gyur/ /rtag pa dmigs pa'i phyogs med par/ /de bas nga'o snyam pa kun/ /cig car nyid du skye 'gyur te/ /nus rgyu rnam par gnas phyir ro/ /mi rtag dmigs pa nyid la'ang/ /gsal
14a2(mdo 'grel): bar snang 'gyur de'i phyir/ /gzhan dag dmigs don yod pa ru/ /brgal zhing rtag pa don med do/ /shes pa po la ngo shes ni/ /bag chags kyis ni byed rigs kyi/ /de ma yin la de shes pa'i/ /shes min 'di ni 'khrul rgyu min/ /de phyir nga snyam shes
14a3(mdo 'grel): 'khrul pa/ /mi 'dod gnod med phyir zhe na/ /ma yin bshad ma thag pa yi/ /rigs pas de la gnod mthong phyir/ /dbang phyug sogs la dang rnams kyi/ /de rgyu sogs su 'khrul pa ni/ /bag chags tsam gyi ngo bo las/ /ji ltar sna tshogs skye par
14a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /de ltar gang tshe nga'o snyam/ /dmigs med nyid du gnas pa yin/ /de phyir nga zhes kyis gzung ba'o/ /shes byed 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ /de phyir tshad ma thams cad la/ /dpe ni 'ga' yin yod ma yin/ /gtan tshigs rnams kyang
14a5(mdo 'grel): gzhi ma grub/ /bstan pa rnams la ci rig sbyar/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu phye ba las spyod pa bas brtags pa'i bdag brtag pa ste brgyad pa'o// //gzhan ni shes pa'i blo yi ni/ /rang dngos khyad par yin par sems/ /de
14a6(mdo 'grel): dag sems la bdag nyid kyi/ /rang gi ngo bor rtog par byed/ /gtso bos bstabs pa'i 'bras bu la/ /de ni longs spyod 'ga' zhig byed/ /de la byed pa nyid yod min/ /rang bzhin kho na der 'dod do/ /de la 'ang gal te sems gcig 'dod/ /gzugs
14a7(mdo 'grel): dang sgra sems sogs dag gi /rang bzhin tha dad dang ldan par/ /shin tu gsal shin ji ltar rigs/ /sems ni rang bzhin gcig pa can/ /dus kun tu ni gnas pa la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs don rnams kyi/ /longs spyod por ni ji ltar 'thad//
14b1(mdo 'grel): lta 'dod la sogs tha dad rnams/ /de yi longs spyod rgyu mtshan du/ /'byung min de ltar 'byung yin na/ /skyes bu skye ba dang ldan 'gyur/ /gang phyir sems las tha dad pa'i/ /lta 'dod la sogs de mi 'gyur/ /de la skye dang 'jig thob na/ /skyes bu la yang 'di bzlog
14b2(mdo 'grel): dka' / /gal te dge dang mi dge ba'i/ /las ni bdag gis byas nyid min/ /de phyir 'di yi longs spyod kyi/ tha dad pa ni ga las skye/ /gal te 'dod dang rjes mthun par/ /rang bzhin gyis rab ster byed de/ /de dag gi ni 'brel pa 'di/ /zha bo long ba bzhin du gnas//
14b3(mdo 'grel): gal te de ltar 'dod pa la/ /sred pa yod kyang ci yi phyir/ /'grub par mi byed rang bzhin ni/ /gzhan la cung zad ltos mi 'gyur/ /don la longs spyod dus su yang/ /gal te 'di la 'gyur med na/ /'di ni za bo nyid min zhing/ /rang bzhin yang ni phan byed min
14b4(mdo 'grel): rnam par 'gyur ba yod gyur na/ /rtag pa nyid ni nyams gyur 'gyur/ /rnam 'gyur rnam pa gzhan nyid na/ /gnas skabs na yang de ji ltar/ /yul gyi rnam pa can blo ni/ /thog mar rab tu 'jug byed cing/ /de yis nges par byas pa'i don/ /skyes bu yis ni rtogs
14b5(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /de ltar 'di yi za bo nyid/ /gzugs brnyan skye ba'i sgo can te/ /skye bu 'di yi rang ngo bo/ /nam yang 'dod med min snyam na/ /brjod par bya ste gzugs brnyan ni/ /de yi bdag nyid du skye 'gyur/ /skye ldan du nyid du 'gyur zhing/ /tha dad min na za bo
14b6(mdo 'grel): med/ /sems nyid bdag nyid can gtso bo/ /sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i khyad par la/ /lta 'dod sogs kyi rjes mthun par/ /ji ltar yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gtso bos tshad ma la sogs pa/ /byed pa shes pa rnam shes dang/ /bza' par mi shes zhes bya bar
14b7(mdo 'grel): 'di las mi rig gzhan ci yod/ /gtso bor blo dang ldan nyid phyir/ /'di la kun dga' med ce na/ /'o na blo ldan nyid yin na/ /skyes bu bzhin du sems nyid thob/ /blo dang rnam zhen sa dang ni/ /de bzhin rig dang rig byed dang/ /sems dang nyams myong zhes bya ba//
15a1(mdo 'grel): thams cad sems kyi brjod byed yin/ /skye ldan 'jig pa'i rtags dag gis/ /sgra dri ro sogs bzhin du ni/ /blo ni sems pa med pa yi/ bdag nyid can du 'dod ce na/ /sgrub byed rang rgyud nyid 'dod na/ gtan tshigs 'di dag gnyis ka la/ /ma grub thal 'gyur
15a2(mdo 'grel): brjod 'dod na/ /bzlog pa la ni gnod pa med/ /sems pa nyid la'ang bdag gis sgrar/ /zhen na'ang nga la gnod pa med/ /gal te rtag nyid bsgrub dka' ste/ /mig sogs 'bras bcas nyid phyir ro/ /gal te sems pa nyid rtag na/ /mig dang don sogs 'bras med 'gyur/ /gal te me ni rtag gyur
15a3(mdo 'grel): na/ /bud shing don med 'gyur ba yin/ /mal cha dang ni bstan bzhin du/ /'dus pa'i gtan tshigs de nyid kyis/ /mig la sogs pa rnams la ni/ /gzhan don nyid gang rab bstan nas/ /gal te khyad par byar rung gi /de nyid de dag la sgrub na/ /'dod bsgrub
15a4(mdo 'grel): gang phyir de dag ni/ /'jig pa'i shes pa phan byed 'dod/ /'gyur med phan la phan byed nyid/ /sgrub na dpe ni bsgrub bya yis/ /stong pa yin te de dag kyang/ /g.yo ba nyid la phan byed rigs/ /gal te phyir ni gzhan don du/ /de dag la ni rab sgrub pa/ /de
15a5(mdo 'grel): lta na yang sgrub don med/ /sems la phan byed grub phyir ro/ /phan bde du ma smos pa'i phyir/ /tshangs pa nyid 'dir brjod pa yin/ /bya ba yi ni yul nyid na/ gzhan gyi don ni sgrub byed min/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las/ /ser skya bas kun
15a6(mdo 'grel): tu brtags pa'i bdag brtag pa ste dgu pa'o// //rgyal dpog pa bzhin rgyal ba pa/ /rdzas dang rnam grangs ngo bo yi/ /ldog dang rjes 'gro bdag nyid can/ /skyes bu shes pa'i mtshan nyid smra/ /de la'ang rdzas ni rnam grangs dang/
15a7(mdo 'grel): gal te 'brel du gyur med na/ /de la khyad par med pa'i phyir/ /de ni 'gyur ba can mi 'gyur/ /yul dang dus dang rang bzhin dag /tha dad med phyir gcig tu brjod/ /grangs dang mtshan nyid ming dang don/ /tha dad phyir na tha dad phyir/ /gzugs sogs rnams
15b1(mdo 'grel): dang bum pa zhes/ /grangs dang ming gi rnam dbye dang/ /'bras bu dang ni rjes su 'jug ldog /mtshan nyid dang ni don rnam dbye/ /rdzas dang rnam grangs dag gi yin/ /de ltar gcig tu khyad med can/ /rdzas min rnam grangs tha dad kyis/ /bdag nyid khyad par 'gyur zhe na/ /des
15b2(mdo 'grel): par khyad par ldan pa yi/ /rang bzhin dbyer med gcig nyid do/ /de lta yin na tha dad nyid/ /de ltar yang ni sgrub dka' ste/ /rnam grangs sogs kyi dngos dag bzhin/ /de ltar rdzas dang rnam grangs dang/ /dngos kun gcig nyid du gnas na/ /rdzas ni mdog dang ldan
15b3(mdo 'grel): gyur te/ /rnam grangs dag gi rang dngos bzhin/ /gal te rnam grangs de kun yang/ /rdzas bzhin rjes 'gro'i bdag nyid ni/ /thob gyur de dag rdzas dang ni/ /bdag nyid gcig tu gnas phyir ro/ /de yi phyir na rnam grangs las/ /tha dad med phyir bdag sogs
15b4(mdo 'grel): rdzas/ /gnas pa cung zad yod min te/ /rnam grangs rang gi ngo bo bzhin/ /skye dang 'jig par gnas pa yi/ /rnam grangs rnams kyang cung zad med/ /rdzas las tha dad med pa'i phyir/ /rdzas de nges pa'i bdag nyid bzhin/ /de phyir rjes 'gro med 'jig
15b5(mdo 'grel): pa 'am/ /thams cad rtag la nyid 'od kyis/ /gcig bdag nyid las ldog pa dang/ /rjes 'gro 'di dag med pa nyid/ /dmigs su rung ba'i rang bzhin can/ /rnam grangs la rjes 'gro bdag nyid/ /rdzas ni so sor snang ba med/ /de phyir khar
15b6(mdo 'grel): par bzhin du med/ /sna tshogs don byed rung pa dang/ /mtshungs sogs shes pa'i rgyur gyur dag /da lta'i rnam pa'i don gyi brda/ /sgra dang shes pa'i spyod yul dag /skye dang 'jig pa'i chos can gyi/ /rnam grangs kho na 'ba' zhig dag /yang dag
15b7(mdo 'grel): yod 'gyur de yi phyir/ /bdag med gsal snang dri ma med/ /'on te rdzas dang rnam grangs kyi/ /ngo bo yang dag 'dres par gnas/ /dngos nyid can de dbyer med pa/ /'dod de mi yi seng ge bzhin/ /dngos nyid can zhes brtan pa 'di/ /sna tshogs
16a1(mdo 'grel): don gyi rgyu mtshan can/ /yin te dngos po'i sgra yang ni/ /rang bzhin rjod par byed phyir ro/ /mi yi seng ge'ang gcig pu ni/ /gnyis bdag can du 'thad min te/ /gang phyir rdul phran du ma yin/ /'dus bdag can de de ltar shes/ /
16a2(mdo 'grel): de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las/ /nam mkha' i gos can gyis kun tu brtags pa'i bdag brtag pa ste bcu pa'o// //sa dang me chu la sogs par/ /de shes brtags pa'i 'jug pa 'di/ /de bdag can nyid bdag yin
16a3(mdo 'grel): zhes/ /gzhan dag kyang ni rjod par byed/ /gzur pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i/ /'di ni cung zad yod min te/ /de phyir 'di dag thams cad ni/ /rnam shes 'gyur bar yang dag gnas/ /de dag gi ni lta ba dang/ /de gzhung rtag nyid brjod pa'i phyir
16a4(mdo 'grel): nyes pa chud ldan rtag brjod phyir/ /de dag nyes pa chud ldan te/ /gzugs sgra la sogs shes pa rnams/ /tha dad nyer mtshon gsal ba yin/ /shes pa'i bdag nyid gcig nyid ni/ /gzugs dang sgra dang ro sogs rnams/ /cig car
16a5(mdo 'grel): rtog par thal bar 'gyur/ /rtag la'ang gnas skabs gzhan med do/ /gzugs sogs rnams kyi rig pa las/ /tha dad shes pa dmigs pa med/ /de ni skad cig tha dad na/ /tha mi dad du gnas pa ci/ /phyin ci log tu ma log pa'i//
16a6(mdo 'grel): shes pa tha dad yod min na/ /skyes bu shes nyid bdag nyid can/ /de phyir 'ching 'grol ji ltar yin/ /rnal 'byor goms pas rnal 'byor pa/ /ci zhig bzlog cing ci zhig sgrub/ /gang phyir de dag phyin ci log /spang bar nus pa ma yin no/ /de
16a7(mdo 'grel): dag nyid du rtag gnas phyir/ /de nyid shes pa'ang skyed bya min/ /de phyir khyed kyi rnal 'byor ni/ /goms pa 'di kun 'bras med 'gyur/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las/ /u pa ni sha de kas brtags pa'i bdag brtag pa ste bcu
16b1(mdo 'grel): gcig pa'o// //bde gshegs par sems 'ga' zhig kyang/ /gang zag tha snyad sgo nas ni/ /de nyid gzhan yin sogs bral ba/ /bdag tu rab tu brjod par byed/ /mu stegs lta bar thal 'gyur phyir/ /gang zag phung po la gzhan
16b2(mdo 'grel): min/ /du ma sogs 'gyur phyir de nyid/ /ma yin de phyir brjod med legs/ /de dag la smra gang zag ni/ /don dam par med de nyid dang/ /gzhan nyid sogs par brjod med phyir/ /nam mkha' i pad+ma la sogs bzhin/ /dngos po dngos po las gzhan nam/
16b3(mdo 'grel): gzhan min par yang mi 'da' nyid/ /de phyir brjod du med pa gang/ /dngos po med par rtog pa la/ /tha dad tha dad med rnams rtogs/ /dngos la brten pa yin pa'i phyir/ /de nyid gzhan sogs brjod med pa/ /rang bzhin med pa la rig kyi/ /dngos
16b4(mdo 'grel): po la ni yod min zhes/ /de lta bu yis bkag pa gang/ /de ni dngos po gzhan bzhin du/ /de las gzhan du gsal bar brjod/ /de nyid min pa bkag pas kyang/ /de nyid du ni rjod par byed/ /de phyir dngos de dngos po ni/ /de nyid gzhan 'ga' mi byed na//
16b5(mdo 'grel): gang zag phung po las gzhan yin/ /zhes pas 'di ni gzhan min brjod/ /phung po gang zag min zhes pas/ /de ni gzhan 'di yin par gsal/ /'gal ba'i chos dang 'brel pa ni/ /dngos po tha dad par brjod do/ /phung po gang zag dag la yang/ /de
16b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin ci phyir tha dad med/ /'di ltar tshor ba la sogs las/ /gang zag brjod du med par brjod/ /de las gzugs dang 'du shes sogs/ /de nyid gzhan nyid du brjod par bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po dang/ /mi rtag nyid du brjod byar 'dod/ /de ltar gang zag
16b7(mdo 'grel): min phyir yang/ /de las gzhan du gsal nyid yin/ /don byed par mi nus pa yang/ /yod pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid de/ /skad cig ma nyid ma nges yin/ /de ldan brjod med dngos nyid yin/ /lung dang 'gal ba dag la ni/ /bdag nyid chen pos brtson par byas/ /med pa
17a1(mdo 'grel): pa ni dgag pa'i phyir/ /brtse ldan gsung ni sna tshogs yin/ /tshogs pa la sogs thugs kyi ni/ /khur khyer la sogs ston mdzad pa/ /khyad par sgo nas bkag pa ni/ /lta ba de yod rnams la mdzes/ /de kho na nyid bsdu ba'i rab tu byed pa las/
17a2(mdo 'grel): gnas ma'i bus bdag rtags pa ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //yang na gang phyir skad cig ma/ /'jig pa rab tu grub nyid kyi/ /rang bzhin la sogs sun phyung bas/ /gnas med nyid la 'bad 'di byed/ /bshad dang 'chad par 'gyur ba yin/ /rig sogs khyad
17a3(mdo 'grel): par med par ni/ /dag pa'i don du de yi phyir/ /skad cig 'jigs pa gsal bsgrub bya/ /byas dang ma byas nyid sgo nas/ /'ga' zhig phung po gnyis su 'dod/ /skad cig skad cig ma yin pas/ /gzhan gyi dngos rnams la 'dod 'di/ /de la byas pa'i dngos po gang/ /de kun skad
17a4(mdo 'grel): cig mar 'jig can/ /thams cad dag ni 'jig pa la/ /bltos med nyid du gnas phyir ro/ /gang zhig dngos gang yin pa la/ /rgyu gzhan la bltos med nyid de/ /de ltar rang rgyud las skye phyir/ /de ni de las des zhes bya/ /dper na rang 'bras skye ba la/ /gegs byed med pa'i
17a5(mdo 'grel): tshogs pa bzhin/ /skye ba can ni thams cad kyang/ /'jig pa la ni bltos pa med/ /gal te 'di bltos med yin na 'ang/ /yul dang dus gzhan la 'gyur na/ /de dag la ni bltos nyid phyir/ /bltos med thal ba nyid 'gyur na/ /skye ba can kun 'jig pa la/ /thams cad du ni bltos pa
17a6(mdo 'grel): pa med/ /'jig pa'i rgyu rnams rnam kun tu/ /de la cung zad byad med phyir/ /'di ltar 'jig par byed pa'i rgyu/ /dngos la tha dad med pa yi/ /'jig pa'i byed por mi rigs phyir/ /dngos po rang rgyu las skye phyir/ /'di la sgra'i sogs kyang mi rigs/ /'jig pa'i zhes bya ba'i
17a7(mdo 'grel): dngos po yi/ /dngos po'i 'jig byed ces bya ba brdzun/ /gzhan nyid la sogs rnam rtog dag /don de la yang 'jug phyir ro/ /dngos po'i ngo bo med bdag nyid/ /'jig pa zhes bya'i ming gzhan can/ /'jig byed ce na de la yang/ /byed pa rigs pa ldan ma yin/ /med pa yang ni
17b1(mdo 'grel): 'bras nyid na/ /myu gu sogs bzhin dngos nyid du/ /thal 'gyur ba skyed bya'i ngo bo ni/ /rgyu mi nus pas bskyed phyir ro/ /de ltar dngos med sgrub sgo nas/ /byas yin ma yin dgag rten phyir/ /gang yin de la tha dad sogs/ /slar yang rnam rtog 'jug par 'gyur/ /'on te bya ba bkag par
17b2(mdo 'grel): 'di/ /dngos nyid byed pa ma yin nyid/ /de lta na yang rgyu med grub byed po min na rgyu nyams phyir/ /'o na dngos po yod dus su/ /'jig pa 'di yod ma yin nyid/ /sngon min yun ring kyang min/ /dngos po'i de ma thag tu 'di/ /de lta na yang dus nges phyir/ /'di ni rgyu ldan
17b3(mdo 'grel): rig pa yin/ bltos med pa la ris 'ga' dang/ /'brel pa su ni phyung ba yin/ /dngos po'i de ma thag tu ni/ /'byung ba'i phyir dang ma byung las/ /'byung phyir 'di ni rgyu ldan rigs/ /dper? na skad cig gzhan bzhin 'dod/ /mo gsham gyi ni bu bzhin du/ /rgyu med phyir
17b4(mdo 'grel): 'di cung zad med/ /yang nam mkha' bzhin rtag 'gyur te/ /gang phyir rnam pa gzhan med do/ /med pa yin na 'jig med phyir/ /dngos po thams cad rtag par 'gyur/ /'dus byas thams cad 'jig pa yi/ /shes pa'ang rgyu mtshan med pa can/ /rtag pa nyid na'ang
17b5(mdo 'grel): 'jig pa med/ /lhan cig gnas 'gyur 'gal med phyir/ /skye ba med la'ang 'jig bshad pa/ /rig pa'i rjes 'brangs nyid ma yin/ /de lta bu la gzhan dag gis/ /ji lta bu zhig 'jig par rtog /skad cig mar gnas chos rnams kyi/ /dngos nyid
17b6(mdo 'grel): min nam 'on te na/ /dngos po'i ngo bo ldog 'gyur pa/ /zhig myong can la de ltar brjod/ /de 'dir 'jig pa'i rang bzhin gang/ /chos rnams skad cig mar gnas pa'i/ /dngos med de ltar brjod dam ci/ /gzhan la brgal zhing rtag pa mtshungs/ /'on te
17b7(mdo 'grel): dngos po'i rang ngo bo/ /ldog pa 'jig pa'i ming yin na/ /snga ma la ni rtag bya ste/ /'gal ba cung zad med pa nyid/ /skad cig mar gnas dngos gang la/ /'jig pa zhes ni rjod byed na/ /de ni rgyu dang rnam par 'dod/ /gzhan dngos med phyir rgyu med can/ /dngos po'i
18a1(mdo 'grel): de ma thag 'byung nyid/ /de 'dra de la yod min te/ /g.yo ba dngos po'i rang ngo bo/ /dngos dang lhan cig skye phyir ro/ /de phyir 'jig pa yod pa'i phyir/ /'dus byas thams cad rtag pa min/ /'jig pa zhes pa'i blo dag kyang/ /rgyu mtshan
18a2(mdo 'grel): med par thal mi 'gyur/ /zhig pa nyid ni bdag med phyir/ /de ma thag 'byung yod pa min/ /ma byung byung ba ldan pa yang/ /nam mkha' i pad+ma la sogs bzhin/ /zhig 'gyur zhes bya de ltar 'dir/ /dngos por ma gyur zhes bya yi/ /don 'di rtogs par byed yin
18a3(mdo 'grel): gyi/ /bsgrub pa 'ga' yang mi 'dod do/ /mi 'ga' zhig la bong bu zhes/ /de ltar ming tsam byas pa na/ /bong bu'i chos rnams thams cad ni/ /'di la thos 'gyur ma yin no/ /zhig pa zhes bya'i dngos po ni/ /dngos po bcom pa zhes bya ba/ /sgrub pa
18a4(mdo 'grel): na yang dngos 'di la/ /cung zad kyang ni skye med phyir/ /'di ni ji ltar ldog par 'gyur/ /'jig pa dngos po zhig bdag nyid/ /ji ltar dngos po'i ngo bo dang/ /bral phyir med pa nyid 'dod kyi/ /dngos po ngo bo min phyir min/ /'di la ldog pa'i dngos nyid
18a5(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /sgrub pa'i sgo nas rjod mi byed/ /dngos po yi ni rjes 'jug pa/ /skad cig las phyir 'gegs par byed/ /de phyir 'di yi rnam gzhag gi /ngo bo sgrub pa cung zad med/ /de phyir 'di la brtag pa yi/ /rnam rtog byed pa gnas med do/ /nam mkha' la
18a6(mdo 'grel): sogs dngos gang dag /ma byas par ni yang dag 'dod/ /dngos po 'jug pa yod min te/ /de dag yod nus bral phyir ro/ /skad cig skad cig min sogs rtogs/ /de tshe de la gnas med do/ /gang gis dngos nyid skad cig ma 'am/ /gal te rnam pa gzhan
18a7(mdo 'grel): du 'gyur/ /skad cig gnas pa'i rang bzhin gang/ /dngos po skad cig ma ru brjod/ /brtan pa'i ngo bor gnas pa yi/ /dngos nyid skad cig pa ma yin/ /skyes ma thag tu mi gnas pa'i/ /dngos po'i ngo bo gang yin de/ /skad cig tu brjod gang
18b1(mdo 'grel): la/ /yod pa skad cig mar 'dod do/ /don la tha dad med na yang/ /de 'di la 'di ces gnod med/ /'dod pas sbyar ba'i brda tsam gyi/ /dngos po rjod par byed pa yin/ /byung ma thag tu mi gnas pa'i/ /dngos la de ltar brjod 'dod pa/ /de la sgra ni rkyen bcas pa 'am/ rkyen
18b2(mdo 'grel): med rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur/ /gal te nam mkha' dus la sogs/ /de dag yod 'gyur de ltar na/ /de dag kyang ni byas bzhin du/ /skad cig 'jig 'di las mi 'da' / /'di ltar gang dag yod ces pas/ /de kun skad cig 'jig can de/ /dper na 'dus byas
18b3(mdo 'grel): dngos po dag /de ltar de ma thag grub bzhin/ /nam mkha' dus dang dbang phyug sogs/ /'di yang khyod kyi yod par 'dod/ /de dag skad cig ma nyid dang/ /bral na med par thal bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir brtan pa'i dngos po rnams/ /rim gyis sam ni cig
18b4(mdo 'grel): car duAng/ /don gyi bya ba byed min pa/ /de phyir de dag med par 'dod/ /rgyu ni nye ba med pa'i phyir/ /'bras bu rnams ni sdod pa ni/ /nus pa'i rgyu ni yod gyur na/ /de dag sdod pa gang gis byas/ /'on te 'ang rtag pa rim can gyi/ /lhan cig byed rnams  
18b5(mdo 'grel): yod 'gyur na/ /'di ni gang dag la ni bltos so/ /'bras bu'i tshogs rim rten par byed/ /'di legs 'on kyang de la ni/ /lhan cig byed de rnam yod pa/ /rung ba'i ngo bo'i rgyu nyid phyir/ /don gcig byed pas yin nam ci/ /rung ba'i ngo bo'i rgyu nyid na/ /dngos
18b6(mdo 'grel): de dag gis byas 'gyur na/ /de yang bya bar mi nus phyir/ /de rang bzhin du rtag gnas pa/ /'di yi rang bzhin byas na yang/ /'di yi rtag pa nyams par 'gyur/ /de las khyad par tha dad na/ /'di ni byed por ji ltar 'gyur/ /de yod na ni 'bras bu
18b7(mdo 'grel): dag /skyed pa'i phyir dang de med na/ /mi skyed phyir de de ltar na/ /de nyid rgyu nyid rnam par gnas/ /'on te de dang 'brel pa'i phyir/ /de la'ang rgyu nyid yod pa na/ /de dag la 'brel gang yin 'dod/ /tha dad phyir na de bdag men/ /de ni de las 'byung ba'ang
19a1(mdo 'grel): min/ /cig car bar du thal phyir ro/ /de las kyang ni 'bras bu rnams/ /cig car nyid du skyed par 'gyur/ /de la'ang gzhan la bltos pa med/ /thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur/ /de las 'bras bu dus gcig na'ang/ /'brel pa med phyir
19a2(mdo 'grel): brtag mi bya/ /gal te 'brel pa 'du ba yin/ /de la'ang 'dir ni dpyad bya ste/ /de ni de la 'gyur ba'am/ /de lta ma yin zhes bya ba/ /'du ba can du 'dod dam ci/ /gal te rtog pa dang po 'dzin/ /de las byung ba de nyid thob/ /de yang de ma thag bsal zin/ /gal
19a3(mdo 'grel): te na ni de la 'di/ /phan mi byed par 'dod gyur na/ /dngos gzhan kun kyang de bzhin du/ /'du ba can 'gyur khyad par med/ /tha dad tha dad med rnam rtog /so so dag tu bkag pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid can khyad par ni/ /dngos po de la bsal ba yin/ /
19a4(mdo 'grel): gang zag la sogs rtag rnams su/ /phung po gnyis ni bstan pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo gnyis can khyad par med/ /gnyis med bdag nyid can yang med/ /'on te lhan cig byed pa yin/ /rkyen la 'jug pa mi bltos la/ /de lta na yang de bral 'di/ /byed
19a5(mdo 'grel): pa ma yin mdza' rgyu bzhin/ /de yi bdag gi rang bzhin 'di/ /de dag nyid ni nye ba na/ /byed po nyid yin te phyir de/ /yod na'ang kun tshe 'bras bu min/ /de lta yin na 'on kyang ni/ /tshogs pa na re rang bzhin 'dod/ /gang de ma tshogs na 'dod na/ /der 'brel rang
19a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin yod na ni/ /de dag kyang na 'di gnas phyir/ /bral ba'i ngo bo'i gzhan yin na/ /gcig pa nyid ni nyams par 'gyur/ /de phyir de ltar bltos pas kyang/ /'bras bu rnams ni rim skye'ang min/ /cig car mi 'dod nyid dang ni/ /de 'bras rim gyis
19a7(mdo 'grel): mthong phyir ro/ /gal te 'bras bu ma lus rnams/ /cig car byas nas nus pa yi/ /bdag nyid don de ldog 'gyur na/ /'di ni skad cig 'jig can grub/ /de dngos can ni rjes 'jug na/ /slar yang 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur/ /cung zad mi byed ngo bo ni/
19b1(mdo 'grel): ji ltar yang ni nyid du 'dod/ /nus pa kun gyis stong nyid phyir/ /rgyu skar lam gyi pad+ma bzhin/ /skad cig yin par thams cad med/ /gang phyir na ba dngos mtshan nyid/ /nus pa'i mtshan nyid dngos nyid 'di/ /gcig ste khas len mi byed na/ /gal te de ltar gzhan dag gis/ /dngos po'i mtshan (nyid gzhan ston gyi/ /gal te dngos po'i mtshan/)
19b2(mdo 'grel): nyid ni/ /yod nyid dang 'brel 'dod de min/ /'du sogs ma grub phyir dang ni/ /ji ltar gzhan gyi gzhan mtshan nyid/ /don byed don du gnyer byed pa/ /g.yeng ba med pa'i blo can gyi/ /don la dpyod sogs bya ba grub/ /rigs kyi smyon pa nyid kyis min/ /myos par gyur
19b3(mdo 'grel): pas kyang ma yin/ /de la gang dag 'ba' zhig la/ /la lar dus 'gar ji ltar yang/ /nye bar 'khor gyur de nyid la/ /yod nyid rnam pa gzhag rigs pa yin/ /de yi dngos can don nyid la/ /skad cig ma nyid rab sgrub byed/ /thams cad sdud phyir khyad par ni//
19b4(mdo 'grel): de nyid la ni brjod par bya/ /mo gsham gyi ni bu lta bu'o/ /nus pa ma lus stong pa dang/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs kyi yang/ /nam yang rgyu nyid ma yin pa/ /de la mkhas pas yod nyid kyis/ /rnam gzhag 'di ni yod mi bya/ /rgyu med phyir ro 'bras
19b5(mdo 'grel): bu dang/ /ngo bo 'bras sogs ma mthong phyir/ /de la skad cig ma nyid du/ /bsgrub pas don ni cung zad med/ /de la brgal zhing rtag pa yang/ /byed pa'ang 'bras bu med pa yi/ /'on te nam mkha' i pad+ma sogs/ /rang gis shes pa'i rgyur gyur phyir/ /don gyi bya ba
19b6(mdo 'grel): byed nus kyang/ /de dag dngos por yod ma yin/ /nam mkha' i chu skyes pa de sogs la/ /der rtogs bag chags tsam las ni/ /'byung ba dmigs pa med nyid ni/ /shes pa 'di ni rab 'jug byed/ /med pa rgyu nyid yin na ni/ /rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar
19b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /rtag tu khyad par med nyid phyir/ /dngos med bltos pa ci yang med/ /skad cig pa yi dngos rnams kyang/ /ji ltar don byed pa nyid yod/ /thog ma'i lhan cig byed rnams ni/ /phan tshun khyad par byed min te/ /skyes na bdag kun grub phyir dang
20a1(mdo 'grel): ma skyes rang bzhin med phyir ro/ /khyad par med las khyad par ni/ /'byung nas 'bras bu cis mi 'byung/ /gzhan las khyad par can de min/ /brgal zhing rtag pa mtshungs phyir ro/ /khyed la lhan cig byed pa'i tshogs/ /thug pa med par
20a2(mdo 'grel): yang 'gyur ro/ /de ltar gang phyir de dag ni/ /rim dang cig car don bya med/ /mi 'gyur de phyir de dag ni/ /skad cig ma nyid rten don med/ /de ltar lhan cig byed byas pa/ /gang tshe la lar khyad med na/ /de tshe de phyir dus kun tu/ /rgyun dang khyad par med pa nyid/
20a3(mdo 'grel): de tshe de phyir rgyun la yang/ /gal te 'jig pa rgyu med ni/ /'di ni thog ma nyid du 'gyur/ /gal te thog ma 'di med na/ /mdza' yang de ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /gal te dngos po 'jig pa la/ /rang gi rgyu las rgyu gzhan ni/ /mi 'dod na ni de ga la//
20a4(mdo 'grel): 'ga' zhig tu ni ji ltar lags/ /smras pa thog ma'i gnas skabs rnams/ /phan tshun phan pa byed nyid na/ /de dag don cig byed nyid kyis/ /lhan cig byed rnams su 'gyur te/ /phan tshun phan byed min na yang/ /'di dag khyad par yod gang
20a5(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /rang gi nyer len stobs las byung/ /skyed byed tshogs pa'i tha dad yin/ /'di las brtsams nas gang skyes pa'i/ /khyad par de dag des byas pa'i/ /de la dgongs pa de dag ni/ /dngos de'i rang bzhin can yin phyir/ /dngos rnams
20a6(mdo 'grel): skad cig so sor ni/ /nus pa nges par bsam mi khyab/ /'byung ba brtag par bya min te/ /me la sreg par byed nyid bzhin/ /rgyun chad ngo bo gang yin pa'i/ /'jig pa rgyu dang ldan pa min/ /der ni mthar yang 'byung yod min/ /de ltar skye ba bkag
20a7(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ /gyo mo la sogs mi 'dra ba'i/ /skye ba rgyu dang bcas pa 'di/ /de yang thog mar skyes min nyid/ /de tshe rgyu ni med phyir ro/ /dngos po skad cig ma rnams ni/ /rnam gnyis kha cig 'grib pa'i rgyu/ /grang ba sogs kyi me sogs bzhin
20b1(mdo 'grel): gzhan dag de lta min pa yi/ /thog mar smras pa rgyu 'bras bu/ /yin na de nyid ma mthong ba'i/ /'jig rten pa yis 'gal ba ni/ /rnam pa du mar mngon par zhen/ /dngos po rnams la gnod bya dang/ /gnod byed ngo bo don dam par/ /yod min de nyid phyir na
20b2(mdo 'grel): yang/ /'gal ba rtog pa zhes bshad do/ /'o na dbang po bya ba ni/ /yod na mi g.yo gnod med can/ /de nyid 'di yin zhes bya ba'i/ /ngo shes pa ni nye bar skye/ /de phyir skad cig gis 'jig pa/ /bsgrub phyir bkod pa'i gtan tshigs ni/ /kun la mngon sum
20b3(mdo 'grel): gyis gnod 'di/ /bzlog dka' bar ni thal bar 'gyur/ /ngo shes par ru gyur na ni/ /mngon sum yin par mi 'thad do/ /gang phyir de ni rnam rtog bcas/ /dngos po'i ngo bo bstan bya min/ /ngo shes pa ni 'khrul pa ste/ /mngon sum mtshan nyid de las gzhan/ /tha
20b4(mdo 'grel): dang min pa'i zhen pa yis/ /tha dad dngos la 'ang 'jug phyir ro/ /mngon sum de las gzhan pa yin/ /gal te 'di ni sngar rtogs pa'i/ /rnam pa'i spyod yul can 'gyur na/ /'di ni sngar nyid skye 'gyur te/ /de don can phyir sngon blo bzhin/ /de ltar ma yin des na 'di/ /don
20b5(mdo 'grel): de 'dzin byed 'dod min te/ /de shes dus su mi skye'i phyir/ /yul gzhan gyi ni blo bzhin no/ /tha dad min pa'i zhen pa yis/ /tha dad dngos la'ang 'jug phyir ro/ /sgong gi 'khrul pa'i shes pa bzhin/ /'di ni 'khrul pa gnas pa yin/ /bya ba bsgrub pa'i don la yang//
20b6(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa'i phyir dran sogs bzhin te/ /byed pa'i don ni rnam nyams phyir/ /'di ni tshang mar rig ma yin/ /da ltar dus su yod pa nyid/ /snga ma'i blo yis shes pa nyid/ /de phyir dran pa la med gang/ /khyad par 'di la yod min te/ /gang phyir sngar ni shes tsam la/ /de
20b7(mdo 'grel): yin zhen byas dran pa skye/ /de nyid 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /ngo shes par ni khyad par can/ /the tshom phyin ci log gang dang/ /de dag spangs nas ngo shes pa/ /tshang ma nyid ni thob par byed/ /shes par gyur la med phyir ro/ /cig shos kyis ni rtog don yang/ /mngon 
21a1(mdo 'grel): sum gyi ni bcad pa la/ /cig shes skye ba srid pa min/ /tshad ma gtso bo bstan pa yi/ /nges par gzung ba'i don nyid la/ /ci shos stobs chung dag gis phyir/ /bzlog par su zhig zhen par byed/ /'o na da lta yod de nyid/ /gang tshe khyod kyis
21a2(mdo 'grel): tha dad 'dod/ /de tshe sngar yod dngos po la/ /tha dad khyod kyis ma bstan to/ /yod pa gzhan nyid ma yin na'ang/ /ji ltar snga bla shes pa yin/ /de shes min na dngos po nyid/ /ma dmigs pa ni thal bar 'gyur/ /rjes dpog la sogs kyi spyod yul/ /mngon sum
21a3(mdo 'grel): gyis ni gnod pa ni/ /rjes dpag la sogs tshad ma yin/ /gnod phyir rab rib can sogs bzhin/ /don la mi bslu ba nyid du/ /mtshungs na 'dis cig gtso? bo yin/ /de yod min na rjes dpag sogs/ /tshad mar gyur pa ma yin nyid/ /'o na gtan tshigs thams
21a4(mdo 'grel): cad kyi/ /thams cad nye bsus khyab pa la/ /rjes su dpag pa 'dis gnon cing/ /dam bca' i don la gnod pa'ang/ /brjod 'dod nyi zla sogs pa yi/ /yul can shes pa gang yin gzhan/ /de dus dang 'brel nyid sogs kyi/ /yul can du ni 'jug byed de/
21a5(mdo 'grel): sa las byung yul can min pa/ /de shes nyid du brjod pa'i phyir/ /dper na dang po'i shes pa ni/ /rang dus nyid sogs yul can bzhin/ /gzugs nyid sogs pa rten kun dang/ /de dag gis ni rten kun dang/ /de rnams gang la yang dag brten/ /'ga' 
21a6(mdo 'grel): zhig de yi yul gang yin/ /'ga' zhig de ltar skye 'gyur ba/ /de dag skyes ma thag tu ni/ /'jig la rten pa nyid min te/ /gzhal bya nyid dang brjod bya nyid/ /gtan tshigs phyir ni mkha' pad bzhin/ /rnam par spyod pa'i yul gyur pa'i/ /shes pa rim
21a7(mdo 'grel): gyis 'byung gang dag /de rnams thams cad yul cig can/ /yin no zhes ni brjod bya ste/ /gnod med rtem? gcig can yin te/ /brjod pa 'thun par sbyor ba'i phyir/ /dper na da lta'i skad cig na/ /gcig la du ma'i blo rnams bzhin/ /re zhig gtan tshigs
21b1(mdo 'grel): dang po la/ /dpe ni sgrub byas stong pa ste/ /yul nyid rgya nyid yin pa'i phyir/ /shes pa'i rang gi dus can min/ /gang tshe nyi ma sogs pa'i sgras/ /'dod pa tsam gyis 'byung dag rnams/ /mar me sogs la sbyar bya ba/ /de shel dag gis 'khrul pa nyid/ /rig sogs rang bzhin
21b2(mdo 'grel): med pa nyid/ /skad cig gis 'dod can 'dod min/ /de med par ni sgrub pa'i phyir/ /sgrub byed brtan pa don med yin/ /sgra mtshungs pa yis brjod bya nyid/ /mar me la sogs shes pa la'ang/ /'jug pa de phyir de yi ni/ /gtan tshigs 'di ni 'khrul par 'gyur/ /de dag la ni gzhi
21b3(mdo 'grel): mthun nyid/ /gnod 'gyur du ni rtog zhes na/ /brjod par 'dod pa'ang gnod pa 'di/ /gsal bar ci yi phyir ma mthong/ /rtsod pa'i gnas su gyur pa yi/ /blo rnams don zhig yul can min/ /rim gyis 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir/ /glog dang mar me sogs blo bzhin/ /don gcig
21b4(mdo 'grel): las 'byung shes rnams la/ /rim gyi 'byung ba 'gal ba yin/ /gzhan gyis tha dad bya min pa/ /de la bltos pa 'gal phyir ro/ /gtan tshigs de rnams thams cad la/ /ldog la the tshom tha? nyid de/ /mi mthun phyogs la bzhugs pa la/ /gnod byed bstan pa med
21b5(mdo 'grel): phyir ro/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu phyed pa las brtan pa'i dngos po brtag pa ste bcu gsum pa'o// //dngos po thams cad skad cig ma'i/ /mi rtag nyid dang 'brel de'i phyir/ /las dang de yi 'brel pa dang/ /rgyu rnams 'bras sogs ji ltar 'bras//
21b6(mdo 'grel): dge rnams dag la skad cig gang/ /byed po nyid du brtag byed pa/ /'di ni 'bras bu byung dus su/ /rjes su 'jug pa nyid ma yin/ /'bras bu 'byung che skad cig gang/ /longs spyod por ni brjod bya/ /de ni las byas nyid min te/ /don sngar mi srid phyir ro/ /las dang de yi
21b7(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu dag/ byed po gcig gis ma bzung phyir/ /byas pa chung zos ma phrad zos ma phrad gang/ /thal bar 'gyur ba shin tu 'gal/ /bdag med sgra yi phyogs la yang/ /bdag med phyir ni 'bras med pa'am/ /bdag las gzhan phyir bya bar ni/ /sngar nyid du ni rtogs
22a1(mdo 'grel): byed pa/ /de phyir rtog ldan 'brel 'dod pa/ /ge ba dang ni mi dge ba'i/ /bya ba rtsom la mi 'jug nyid/ /'bras bu ring du gnas pa yin/ /dngos po 'bras bu byed nus pa/ /ma 'ongs ma yin 'das ma yin/ /de ltar ba yang de snyed kyi/ /dus
22a2(mdo 'grel): su gnas pa ma yin no/ /dngos po bdag nyid ma thob pa/ /gzhan gyi yan lag phyir nus min/ /'gas pa ma yin de yin no/ /'bras bu med nus gnas pa'am min/ /skad cig snga ma gzhan zhig la'ang/ /rjes 'gro med par brten byed na/ /phyis 'byung skye bar 'thad?
22a3(mdo 'grel): min te/ /rgyu mtshan med pa nyid phyir ro/ /'jig dang skye ba dus mtshungs na'ang/ /rgyu 'bras dag ni yod pa min/ /phan tshun bltos ba med phyir te/ /de yi bya ba ma bzung phyir/ /bum pa'i gzugs ni zhig pa na/ /dri la sogs pa'ang skyes pa na/ /ji ltar de 'bras mi 'dod
22a4(mdo 'grel): ltar/ /gzugs gzhan rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /de phyir 'bras bu 'byung ba la/ /sngon du gang gi bya ba mthong/ /de nyid de yi rgyu yin gyi/ /de ma thag pa tsam ni min/ /gal te 'di ni 'dor bsdus na/ /rgyu zhig pa las 'bras 'byung na/ /zhig pa brjod du med
22a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /'di ni rgyu med nyid du 'gyur/ /ma zhig pa las de 'byung na/ /skad cig du mar gnas pa'i phyir/ /de tshe dngos rnams skad cig nyid/ /ji ltar nyams par 'gyur ba min/ /skad cig gnas pa'i ngang tshul can/ /bum sogs mig gi mthong min te/ /gang
22a6(mdo 'grel): phyir zhig pa rtog ma yin/ /yun ring 'das pa'i dngos po bzhin/ /dngos rnams rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por yang/ /mngon sum dang ni mi dmigs pas/ /mgu bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /'di mthong ba las 'di mthong la//
22a7(mdo 'grel): 'di yang mthong na ma mthong bar/ /rim ldan 'gyur ba'i mtshams sbyor ba/ /byed por rnam par gnas pa gang/ /skad cig gis 'jig dngos rnams la/ /ngo shes pa yang 'brel par dka' / /skyes bu gzhan gyis mthong ba'i don/ /gzhan gyi ngo shes 'gyur
22b1(mdo 'grel): ba min/ /sgra la sogs pa tha dad la/ /shes pa po zhig yod pa'i phyir/ /'dra ba las ni ngo shes 'gyur/ /gnyis tha dad na rgyu med can/ /gal te mtshams sbyor byed pa'i rgyu/ /don zhig yod pa ma yin na/ /gzugs mthong ba na ro sogs la/ /mngon 'dod sogs de ji ltar
22b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /srid pa'i btson rar chags sogs kyis/ /'ching bas bcings pa'i skad cig gzhan/ /ma bcings gzhan ni gral 'gyur ba/ /zhes bya 'di yang rtogs ma yin/ /bcings pa grol ba nam yang ni/ /mi srid gcig tu 'jug phyir ro/ /de phyir thar pa don gnyer
22b3(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /dal ba don ni med par 'gyur/ /'ching ba sogs kyis bcings gyur pa/ /grol pa thob par byed pa mthong/ /ma bcings grol ba thob byed pa/ zhes bya 'di 'dra mthong bas gnod/ /bcings dang grol ba 'di dag ni/ /gzhi gcig de bzhin gnas pa'i phyir
22b4(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pa'i de dag bzhin/ /de bzhin thams cad mdzes par gnas/ /rnam pa de dag nyid kyis ni/ /dngos rnams skad cig gis 'jig la/ /gzhi gcig pa ni med pa'i phyir/ /dran pa la sogs mi srid do/ /'di la mngon par brjod bya ba/ /bdag med rnams  
22b5(mdo 'grel): la rgyu 'bras nyid/ /gnas pa yin na 'di dag kun/ /gnod pa med par grub pa nyid/ /ji ltar myu gu la sogs la/ /rjes 'gro can gyi bdag med la/ /sa bon sogs kyi nus des? pa/ /de bzhin nang gi bdag nyid can/ /dngos su 'am ni brgyud pa yi/ 'gal ba kha cig
22b6(mdo 'grel): nus bcas yin/ /de phyir las 'bras sogs rnams kyi/ /'brel pa nyid ni 'thad ma yin/ /byed po nyid sogs rnam gzhag ste/ /rgyu gcig nyid du brjod 'dod pas/ /rtog pas sgro btags nyid 'dod kyi/ /yang dag gnas pa'i yang dag min/ /rdzas 'gro med
22b7(mdo 'grel): na rgyu 'bras nyid/ /khyad par can de mi 'thad de/ /rgyud gzhan las ni ming rnams dang/ /gang zhig rgyu 'bras mi 'thad bzhin/ /'o na sa bon myu gu sogs/ /rgyu 'bras nges pa nyid mthong ste/ /de la rjes 'gro'i bdag nyid can/ /cha shas phra mo yod ma yin/ /sa bon
23a1(mdo 'grel): myu gu sogs pa la/ /zhing sogs khyad par med yin na/ /tha dad mi rigs gcig bdag phyir/ /tha dad rjes 'gro med pa grub/ /de phyir las 'bras sogs rnams kyis/ /yod dang med pa bsgrub don du/ /rgyu 'bras grub dang ma
23a2(mdo 'grel): grub phyir/ /gzhan gyis rab tu 'bad par bya/ /de la brjod bya skad cig ma/ /gnyis pa la ni 'bras skye zhing/ /dang por rgyu ni rgyes gyur pa/ /de ni de tshe zhig pa 'ang min/ /de ni skad cig pa nyid phyir/ /'bras bu'i skad cig dus gnas phyir ro/ /gnas na 'ang don
23a3(mdo 'grel): med gang gi phyir/ /de la 'bras bu de grub yin/ /slar skyes slar yang de yis ni/ /skyed par nus min skye bar ni/ /ma byung ba las byung dngos phyir gzhan du na ni gnas pa min/ /de phyir ma zhig pa yi rgyu/ /skad cig dang por byung ba las/ /de yin
23a4(mdo 'grel): skad cig ma yin phyir/ /cir car thal ba yod ma yin/ /skad cig gsum la sogs pa la/ /dper na rnams par smin pa'i rgyu/ /zhig las 'bras bu brjod pa yin/ /gal te dang por de 'byung na/ /cig car du yang thal 'gyur te/ /lhan cig 'byung rgyu bzhin
23a5(mdo 'grel): de yang/ /rigs pas 'thad min gang gi phyir/ /med pas sngar ni nus med phyir/ /nus pa'i tshe na 'bras 'byung phyir/ /rgyu 'bras dag ni cig car nyid/ /'gal bar gsal ba nyid yin te/ /skam pas bzung ba bzhin du ni/ /rgyu 'dis rang gi 'bras
23a6(mdo 'grel): bu 'dis/ /bzung nas skyed par byed pa min/ /gang phyir cig cang ba ru 'gyur/ /'dod ldan bud med la bzhin du/ /'bras bu rang bzhin la brtan par/ /'khyung nas skye ba ma yin na/ /gang gis de dag ci dgar 'gyur/ /cig car pa nyid 'gal ba yin/ /gang phyir rgyu
23a7(mdo 'grel): de rang nyid kyi/ /'bras bu sos bsdams bzhin bzung nas/ /skyed pa yin na cig car bar/ /'gyur na de ni de ltar yin/ /'bras buAng rang bzhin de la ni/ /'dod ldan sdug bsngal/ 'khyud bzhin pas/ /skye ba yin na cig car ba/ /'gyur na de yang de ltar min/ /rang
23b1(mdo 'grel): gi rgyu las 'byung ba ni/ /skad cig dang por gang byung ba/ /skad cig gnyis pa nye ba yi/ /de ma thag tu gang byung yin/ /bya ba med pa'i dngos la yang/ /de ni de yi skyed byed yin/ /'dod pa tsam las byung ba yi/ /brda ni rjes su sgrub byed yin/ /skye pa las ni dus
23b2(mdo 'grel): gzhan pa'i/ bya bas 'dir ni ci zhig dgos/ /gang phyir yod las 'bras byung ba/ /yod pa nyid ni de yi bya'o/ /de ma thag par gang nges pa/ /de nyid bltos pa yin zhes brjod/ /rtag tu 'bras bu 'byung ba dang/ /ldan pa'i rgyu yi bya ba'o/ /de yod pa na 'byung ba
23b3(mdo 'grel): tsam/ /bya ba zhes kyang kun tu rtag/ /de dang ldan pas rgyu nyid de/ /de phyir de ldan de nyid mchog/ gang phyir sa bon myu gu sogs/ /yod na yod par mthong nyid kyi/ /bya ba dngos po yod pa las/ /cung zad kyang ni mthong ma yin/ /nus pa ma mthong bzhin du
23b4(mdo 'grel): yang/ /rgyu nyid du ni rtogs byed na/ /'di dang bye brag ci yod na/ /gzhan yang ci phyir rgyur mi 'dod/ /ji ltar gzhan ni med na yang/ bya ba 'bras bu rgyur 'dod bzhin/ /gzhan yang ci phyir rgyu ma yin/ /yang na dngos bcas mthong bar ni/ /'dod na 'ang
23b5(mdo 'grel): 'di ni kho bo cag/ /mthong bar 'dod yin rgyu med na/ /de la dngos po yod pa yang/ /ci ya phyir na khas len byed de/ /ji ltar skye ba can blo nyid/ /tshad ma nyid du nges smra ba/ /de bzhin dngos po thams cad la/ /de rgyu nyid du ci ni 'dod/ /ji ltar blo ni skad cig
23b6(mdo 'grel): lan/ de bzhin skye ba can gzhan yang/ /bsgrubs pa de phyir 'gro ba 'di/ /de bzhin kho na bya bral ba'o/ /rgyun gyis 'jug pa'i dri la sogs/ /phan tshun rgyur 'dod kho na ste/ /de rgyu nyid du thal 'gyur te/ /'di la gnod pa can min no/ /gang yang rung ba'i rgyu rnams kyi/ /gzhan
23b7(mdo 'grel): gyi de ma thag 'byung ba'ang/ /de bzhin des pa la 'dod pas/ /brtan par 'dod la skyon 'di yang/ /gang zhig gang la bya ba dang/ /bcas te de yi rgyur 'dod na'ang/ /gang la yang dag nges gang yin/ /de rgyu yin par 'dod pa yin/ /mngon sum dang ni mi
24a1(mdo 'grel): dmigs pas/ /yod na yod par grub 'di dag gal te rnam bcas rnam shes kyi/ /dngos rnams rig par khyod 'dod dam/ /'on te rnam med pas dngos rnams/ /rnam par rig par khyed 'dod pa/ /skad cig gis 'jig phyogs la'ang de/ /mtshungs bar
24a2(mdo 'grel): nye bar mtshon par bya/ /snga ma'i rang gi rgyu rnams dang/ /gzugs sogs rig pa'i rang bzhin gyi/ /rnam par shes pa thams cad nyid/ /dus mnyam nyid du skye ba yin/ /gal te rnam shes rnam pa dang/ /bcas na sems ni sna tshogs 'gyur/ /rnam pas
24a3(mdo 'grel): mtshan pa nyid min 'ang/ /nye ba na gnas rgyu med pa'o/ /zhen de'i lan 'dir cung zad/ /khyed kyis kyang ni smra bar gyis/ /'di la khyed cag lan gang yin/ /de ni kho bo cag gis 'gyur/ /gal te rgyu ni 'brel bu dag /skyed par mi 'dod? de lta na/ /byas 'jig
24a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur na 'di yin te/ /rgyun gyis rgyu nyid 'gyur ba yin/ /gal te rgyu ni med par yang/ /la lar 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur na/ /ma byas pa thob par 'gyur na/ /de min nus pa des phyir ro/ /skad cig gis 'jig rnam rtog gis/ /byas pa 'jig tshogs phas rgol  
24a5(mdo 'grel): ba/ /des ni mi 'dod pa nyid du 'gyur pa cung zad yod ma yin/ /mi 'jig yod pa lta ba rnams/ /rgyun la gcig bar mngon sems pas/ /skad cig cig phye'i rnam rtog gis gis /ji ltar yang ni 'jug mi 'gyur/ /skad cig re re rnam 'jig pa'i/ /de kho na nyid rnam
24a6(mdo 'grel): rtogs shing/ /rgyu yi nges pa rig nas ni/ /dge pa'i las ni rtsom par 'gyur/ /'bras bu 'bras bu can nyid dag/ nges pa'i khyad par can nyid kyi/ /sems gang yin pa'i dran pa sogs/ /kun la'ang gnod pa med pa yin/ /de la rgyu 'bras gyur pa yi/ /ma rig
24a7(mdo 'grel): la sogs pas bcings 'dod/ /de dang bral zhing dri med pa'i/ /blo nyid bur pa yin par 'dod/ /thams cad skad cig pa nyid kyi/ /bcings dang grol ba rab grags pa/ /bzhi gcig pa nyid yin par ni/ /'jig rten pa'ang grub pa min/ /bdag la bye
24b1(mdo 'grel): brag thams cad du/ /med phyir byed pa zab po/ /bcings sogs 'di 'dra la gnod kyi/ /gzhan du mi rtag pa nyid do/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las/ /las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa brtag pa ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //rdzas la sogs pa'i don grub ni/ /dam pa'i
24b2(mdo 'grel): don du yod pa'i phyir/ /ris sogs dngos med nyid du ni/ /sngar bstan rigs pa ma yin zhes/ /rkang mig pa dang gzigs zin pa/ /lung tsam pa ni smra byed pa'o/ /rdzas la sogs pa dgag pa 'di/ /mdor bsdus pa ni brjod par bya/ /sa la sogs pas phye ba yi//
24b3(mdo 'grel): rdzas dgu tha dad par 'dod pa'i/ /sa la sogs pa grangs bzhin ni/ /rtag dang ma rtag gis rnam gnyis/ /re shig sa sogs bdag nyid kyis/ /gang 'dod pa yi rdul phran rnams/ /de rnams rtag pa 'od la sogs/ /rtsol ba gang yin dang 'jig 'dod/ /de la rdul phran
