24b4(mdo 'grel): rnams rtag pa/ /yin par rigs pa ma yin te/ /dngos po ma lus pa yi yul/ /skad cig gis 'jig bsgrubs phyir ro/ /rtag tu gong bu ma lus pa/ /cig car skye ba kho nar 'gyur/ /de rnams phrad pa la sogs pa/ /bltos min bye brag med phyir ro/ /rdul phran
24b5(mdo 'grel): skyed ga bor 'dod pa/ /yod pa chos su rtog min te/ /don yod la dmigs tshad ma yin/ /yul gur ma yin zhe na ni/ /gang gis thags mkhan sogs mthong bas/ /rdul phran rgyu ni mi 'grub min/ /gang phyir snam bu sogs thams cad du/ /rdul
24b6(mdo 'grel): phran bdag nyid kho na'o/ /yod 'dzin tshad ma med tsam gyis/ /med pa ma grub ma yin te/ /gang phyir tshad ma log pa ni/ don med yin pa nges pa med/ /de rnams rtsom pa'i cha shas can/ /yon tan cha shas thams cad ldan/ /mthong ba min
24b7(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyi na/ /des na tshad ma can grub min/ /shel gong nye bar bsgyur ba yi/ /bsgyur ba snang ba ma yin nam/ /chu skyar?  sogs pa'ang de gzugs su// 'dzin pa nyid duAng mthong min nam/ /ral gra'i nang gi skyes bu la/ /de yi gzugs sogs mi shes
25a1(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /skyes bur shes pa mthong ba dang/ /gos dmar blo yang yod ma yin/ /gzugs sogs utpal la sogs las/ /gcig tu tha dad pa yin te/ /des na de ni nag pa'i las/ /rta bzhin rnam par gcod phyir ro/ /sa la
25a2(mdo 'grel): sogs dang gzugs dri sogs/ /shin tu tha dad 'gyur ba ste/ /gcig dang snga ma'i tshig dbye bas/ /zla ba skar ma'i tha dad bzhin/ /byed po nas sogs tha dad par/ /snal ma snam bu tha dad bzhin/ /'gal ba'i chos dag sbyor bas na/ /ka ba bum pa'i
25a3(mdo 'grel): dngos bzhin no/ /gong bu'i don yod ma yin na/ /shing sogs mthong ba nyid mi 'gyur/ /de yi ngo bo las gzhan pa/ /gzhan gyi bdag nyid mthong min te/ /gzhan gyi rnam pa rigs pa'i blo/ /mi rigs shin tu thal 'gyur phyir/ /de bzhin dkar po la sogs
25a4(mdo 'grel): par/ /rig pa nyid kyang srid par 'gyur/ /de phyir dud la ser sogs kyi/ /blo bzhin blo 'di 'khrul pa yin/ /ral ka nang chud skyed bu yi/ /shes pa de rjes dpag pa ste/ /de yi gtan tshigs su 'gyur pa/ /ral ka nyid ni mthong phyir ro/ /skad dang gur gum sogs
25a5(mdo 'grel): rnams pas/ /gos rnams skad cig pa nyid pas/ /snga ma'i gzugs ni zhig pa yin/ /sngar yang chu sogs ltos bcas las/ /gzugs de nyid las dkar po yi/ /gzugs gzhan du yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lcags sogs sngon po sogs bzhin
25a6(mdo 'grel): du/ gnas skabs de nyid kyi gzugs la/ /rang dngos rjes su 'jug phyir ro/ /drug pa'i chog la sogs dbye ba/ /'dod pa tsam gyis 'byung ba ste/ /de phyir dngos rnams de nyid kyi/ /ngo bor rnam gnas rig ma yin/ /'di ltar drug po la gzhan pa'i/
25a7(mdo 'grel): yod nyid tha dad nyid mi 'dod/ /de rnams sde tshan gcig nyid don/ /gzhan yang khas blangs pa min no/ /yod pa shes pa'i tshad ma yi/ /yul du de nyid 'dod pas na/ /drug po'i yod nyid yin zhe na/ /khyed la drug las gzhan thal 'gyur/ /de drug chos can du
25b1(mdo 'grel): brjod de/ /chos ni de dag las gzhan par/ /'dod pa nyid yin zhe na yang de dang de yi 'brel 'dod gang/ /sa sogs des phyir phrad pa yang/ /mi rigs gzhan yang 'du ba yang/ /'brel pa gzhan ni khyod 'dod min/ /'brel ba mi 'thad de rnams kyis/ /chos su ji ltar
25b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba yin/ /de las byung tsam gyis zhes na/ /gzhan yang de dang 'dra 'gyur la/ /de'i yang yod pa nyid yin na/ /tha dad pa can gyis dbye ba/ /thob 'gyur de la'ang gzhan yin pas/ /mdza' med par ni thal bar 'gyur/ /chos gzhan la ni 'jug pa yis/ /der ni
25b3(mdo 'grel): chos can nyid thob na/ /de nyid thob na/ /de nyid kyi phyir rdzas sogs nyid/ /chos can nyid du 'dod mi 'gyur/ /gal te snga rol snal ma las/ /snam bu tha dad sgrub byed na/ /sgrub par byed pa don med nyid/ /de bzhin bzlog par dka' ba yin/ /snal ma de rnams gnas
25b4(mdo 'grel): skabs kyi/ /bye brag gzhan ni thob pa na/ /khyad par can don byed nus pa/ /snga ma las gzhan mtshan nyid kyi/ /bya ba gcig nyid lam kho la/ /so sor shes pa po bstan na/ /mangs dang nus med 'bras med pa'i/ /skyon rnams bsal bar 'dod pa yi/ /tha snyad
25b5(mdo 'grel): 'dogs pa po rnams kyis/ /gang dag ma lus pa rnams la/ /tha snyad nyung ba'i bsam pa yis/ /tshig gcig gis ni brjod pa yin/ /byed po nus pa tha dad la/ /yongs su gyur sogs chos ldan phyir/ /de rnams dus gcig nyid du ni/ /snam bu nyid du 'grub
25b6(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /rdul phran rnams ni phan tshun du/ /bstangs pas skye ba nyid yin na/ /de rnams dbang po'i spyod yul nyid/ /min pas dbang po las 'das min/ /rdul phran sngo sogs rnam pa'i dngos/ /ngo bo nyid yin brtags pa min/ /sngon po sogs su snang ba yang//
25b7(mdo 'grel): mig sogs shes pas rig pa yin/ /gal te'ang de rnams shar nyid dang/ /gzhan nyid du 'byed mtshan nyid min/ /de lta'ang sbyar ba'i btung ba bzhin/ /gnas la mngon sum gyis gnod min/ /dngos po 'di rnams thams cad nyid/ /rgyun las log pa'i rang
26a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du/ /mthong ba yin yang rang bzhin du/ /rnam pa thams cad des pa min/ /brtags min dbang rton rtogs bya ba'ang/ /cha shas don med rang mtshan nyid/ /gang las tha dad nges pa la/ /rgyu yod na ni de 'byung 'gyur/ /ji ltar mar me 'bar
26a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i rgyun/ /'dra bar 'byung la gcig par 'dra/ /de bzhin phra ba du ma rnams/ /rgyun mi 'chad rnams blos gcig rtogs/ /dbye ba mi rtogs de rnams la/ /mngon sum du 'dod min zhe na/ /mar me sogs te ji ltar mthong/ /de bzhin cha shas can cis 'dod/ /'di rnams
26a3(mdo 'grel): rdul du ma nges na/ /sngon po la sogs rnam pa'o zhes/ /de lta bur yang rtogs bya bar/ /'di ni ji ltar 'gyur ba yin/ /gang phyir de la'ang rgyu med de/ /shes pa de ni yul med min/ /gong bu yul gcig ma yin te/ /gcig dang gong bu nyid 'gal phyir/ /gong bu gcig
26a4(mdo 'grel): dngos nyid yin na/ sbrang ma'i rkang pa g.yogs tsam gyis/ /de dag thams cad g.yogs par ni/ /'gyur te dbye ba med phyir ro/ /cha gcig tu ni dmar ba yang/ /thams cad la 'gyur dmar po bzhin/ /'gal ba'i chos dag sbyor ba yang/ /sna tshogs nyid du thal
26a5(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /gcig gi dngos nyid ma yin na/ /thams cad sgra 'dir ci zhig bya/ /de yang du ma'i yul yin na/ /yan lag can ni du ma yin/ /gos dang lus dang ri sogs gang/ /'jig rten la grub ma yin nam/ /de nyid yan lag can nyid du/ /khyed cag gis
26a6(mdo 'grel): ni smras pa yin/ /gos dmar kun tu thams cad dang/ /lhag med de bzhin ma lus pa/ /de la thams cad rab 'byor ba/ /'dod pa tsam gyis 'byung ba yin/ /de 'dra mngon par 'dod pa ni/ /kho bo cag kyang smra ba ste gos kun dmar por 'gyur sogs pa/ /smra la
26a7(mdo 'grel): bar du gcod pa med/ /brtags nas de brjod yin zhe na/ tshig gzhan du ni thal 'gyur zhing/ /gtso bo phal bar 'dod dag gi /tha dang blo yang yod ma yin/ /sbyor ba kun la khyab byed pa/ /'jug pa nyid ni ma yin phyir/ /thams cad dmar por thal ba min/ /thams
26b1(mdo 'grel): cad g.yogs par 'dod pa'ang min/ /rdzas ni cha shas med min nam/ /ci'i phyir ma khyab par rnam gnas/ /rang dngos de ltar gnas na ni/ /de nyid kyi phyir tha dad grub/ /yul mang la gnas pa des na/ /gnas gcig byed pa nyid ma yin/ /de phyir snam bu la sogs pa/ /du ma'i ngo bo nyid
26b2(mdo 'grel): du grub/ de nyid don ni mi shes pa'i/ /'jig rten gong bu gcig snyam sems/ /rnam rtog de la bltos nas ni/ /phra rab rdul zhes 'dir brjod pa 'am/ /rgyu mtshan rnam bltos min par yang/ /brda yi rjes 'gro ldan pa yi/ /dbul la'ang phyug po zhes brjod yin/ /'di na de 'dra'i
26b3(mdo 'grel): ming du gnas/ /snal ma dang ni lag pa sogs/ /cha shas can gcig rjes 'jug min/ /dper na du ma nyid grub pa'i/ /re lde snam bu rtsig sogs bzhin/ /gal te 'ang mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas/ /gcig phyir yan lag du ma la/ /rten min rdul bzhin 'jug par ni//
26b4(mdo 'grel): mi rigs gnod can tshad ma'o/ /gcig 'jug gnas de 'ang cha shas kyi/ /rten gzhan la ni 'jug pa na/ /dngos de nyid kyis sam gzhan gyis/ /rnam pa gzhan yod min pas so/ /de la 'di ni de nyid kyis/ /gzhan la 'jug par brtag min te/ /de dbang
26b5(mdo 'grel): byas pa nyid kyis ni/ /gzhan du der 'jug yod ma yin/ /dper na khu 'jo ba'i ma ma/ /gzhan gyi dbang bya yi rten 'gyur/ /de bzhin gcig gis dbang byas pa'i/ /rdzad ni gzhan gyi rten byed min/ /gang phyir de 'brel rang bzhin no/ /de min
26b6(mdo 'grel): yul la'ang 'jug pas na/ /de ni yul gcig nyid thob bam/ /gcig bdag nyid 'gyur dbyer med phyir/ /gzhan nyid bdag nyid kyis 'jug na/ /rang bzhin tha dad pa yi dngos/ /tha dad bdag nyid nyid yin pas/ /gcig ni du
26b7(mdo 'grel): mar gnas 'grub min/ /de de rnam la 'du ba yi/ /bdag nyid kyis 'jug yin zhe na/ /skyo ba nyid kyis 'di 'gro 'am/ /de yang rnam par dpyad bya yin/ /gzhan yang bdag nyid thams cad kyis/ /'jug na du ma nyid thob 'gyur/ /phyogs
27a1(mdo 'grel): gcig gis na 'tha' med 'gyur/ /de gcig min pa'am gang du 'ang min/ /rang rgyud pa'ang thal 'gyur pa'i/ /bsgrubs pas gang zhig 'jug pa na/ /de ni rang nyid kyis mthong ba/ /yin na 'brel par 'gyur ba yin/ /ma lus pas sam phyogs
27a2(mdo 'grel): gcig gis/ /'jug pa gang du 'ang ma shes nyid/ /gang gi yod pa min phyir rdzas/ /med pa 'am gzhan du 'gyur ba'o/ /de ni la lar mthong ba ni/ /rdzas la sogs pa bsal ba bzhin/ /de bzhin der ni ma mthong na/ /tha dad par rgol mi rigs so/ /de dag tsam gyis 'jug pa nyid
27a3(mdo 'grel): med par brjod 'gyur zhe na 'ang de/ /mi rigs 'di na 'di zhes pa'i/ /blo yi mngon sum gyis grub pa'i/ /de ni mngon sum 'dod min na/ /gnod pa can 'ga' brjod pa'i rigs/ /gzhan du gzugs sogs shes pa yang/ /mngon sum min pa nyid du 'gyur/ /'di la 'jug
27a4(mdo 'grel): pa de med par/ /dbyer med tshul gyis sngar bstan zin/ /'di la zhes pa'i shes pa med/ /de'i ngo bo mi snang phyir/ /ma lus pa dang phyogs gcig pa'i/ /sgra dang don 'di bshad mdzad pa'i/ /cha shas med 'di'i 'jug pa ci/ /de ni de las gzhan duAm/ /ji ltar
27a5(mdo 'grel): gnod la sogs bzhag pa'i/ /dpal 'bras la sogs ji bzhin pa'am/ /stan ni du ma la 'jug pa'i/ /nag pa sogs mthong lta bu yin/ /bum pa mar me la sogs bzhin/ /'jig pa la sogs gtan tshigs kyis/ /sgra rnams 'ga' zhig la brten
27a6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de ni nam mkhar 'gyur ba yin/ /nyi sogs bya ba'i rdzas rnams las/ /tha dad pa yi rgyu mtshan ni/ /gzhen na gzhen min sogs shes pa/ /ji ltar bum sogs shes bzhin no/ /skra dkar gnyer ma lus rtsub sogs/ /gyur la sogs pa'i shes phyir
27a7(mdo 'grel): 'dir/ /gang las mtshan nyid mi 'dra rgyu/ /de ni 'du shes bya bar 'dod/ /shar dang gzhan sogs blo rnams las/ /phyogs nyid rjes su dpog pa yin/ /shes pa rim gyis skye ba las/ /yid kyang rjes su dpag par 'dod/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i shes
27b1(mdo 'grel): ba ni/ rim gyis skye phyir gzugs sogs las/ /gzhan pa'i rgyu la bltos pa ste/ /dper na shing rta sogs bzhin no/ /zin sogs 'byung ba chen po rnams/ /rgyu nyid yin par khas len na/ /sgra rnams de rnams la brten par/ /'grub phyir snga ma sgrub byed min/ /mkha' 
27b2(mdo 'grel): gcig rtag pa khyab byed pa/ /'du ba nyid du 'grub min te/ /'di rnams rjes 'gro mtshad phyir/ /de bzhin min sogs thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan dang gzhan min sogs shes pa'i/ /rgyu ni brda'i bye brag las/ /byung ba'i yid las byung ba dag/ yin phyir dus dang phyogs
27b3(mdo 'grel): de dag/ cha shas med gcig dngos yin phyir/ /gzhan dang gzhan sogs srid pa min/ /de dang 'brel pa can dbye bas/ /zhe na de dag 'bras med 'gyur/ /mig la sogs pa la gzhan pa/ /drug po de ma thag 'byung ba'i/ /shes pa gang yin de yid du/ kho bo cig
27b4(mdo 'grel): kyang 'dod pa yin/ /yin nyid rtag na shes pa rnams/ /cig car pa nyid thob par 'gyur/ /des 'dir sngar smras gtan tshigs su/ /'dod pa rnam par nyams bcas 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas pa dang phyi rol pas/ /bstan pa'i yid 'grub mi 'grub pa/ /gzhan gyis mdor
27b5(mdo 'grel): smra A bcas dang/ /gzhan du yang ni bzlas nas so/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las rdzas kyi tshig gi don brtag pa ste/ bco lnga pa'o// //rdzas rnams bkag pa de las ni/ /de bzhin brten par 'dod pa yi/ /yon tan la sogs kun
27b6(mdo 'grel): la nyid/ /med par 'gyur ba kho na'o/ /'brel pa can rnams pa bkag pa na/ /'du ba'ang gang la gang zhig yin/ /de lta na'ang bye brag tu/ /dgag pa 'di ni brjod par bya/ /sngon po la sogs rags pa'i rdzas/ /gal te gcig pa nyid 'dod na/ /bu ga'i snang bas ? 'od
27b7(mdo 'grel): bsal bzhin/ /gsal ba ci phyir snang min/ /yangs pa'i phyogs na gnas pa yi/ /sngon po la sogs mthong ba dang/ /gsal 'gyur min pa de yi tshe/ /de las de de tha dad 'gyur/ /de min gzhan la blo log cing/ /glang po sogs las tha dad pa'i/ /
28a1(mdo 'grel): grangs ni snang bar khyed 'dod de/ /shes las snang ba yod nyid min/ /'dod pas rab tu sbyar ba yin/ /brda ni yid byed rjes 'gro ba/ /bum sogs gcig sogs rnam shes 'di/ /shes pa sogs bzhin 'jug pa ste/ /de
28a2(mdo 'grel): rnams rdzas nyid min pa'i phyir/ /rnam 'byed rdzas ni gang zhig yid/ /ma 'khrul pa yi de nyid kyis/ /shes de brjod pa rigs min nyid/ /de ni rdzas dang 'brel pa las/ /gcig nyid yin dang don gcig la/ /'du phyir yon tan la sogs
28a3(mdo 'grel): la/ /rnam shes gcig tu 'dod ces na/ /de ltar gcig pa'i shes pa nyid/ /yin yang gnyis sogs blo gang yin/ /tshig gi don drug sogs gang la/ /de rnams la bltos rgyu gang yin/ /don gcig la ni 'du sogs kyi/ /shes pa
28a4(mdo 'grel): 'di ni med par 'gyur/ /des na 'di ni 'khrul 'gyur te/ /mi la me yi blo bzhin no/ /glang po la sogs shes de las/ /gzhan pa las byung dmag gi blo/ /mtshan nyid mi 'dra las bsgrubs pa/ /snam bu sngo sogs blo bzhin
28a5(mdo 'grel): 'dod pas sbyar ba'i brda dang ni/ /yid la byed sogs thabs yin na/ /blo de 'dod yin de nyid kyi/ /blo la sogs 'ang grangs su 'gyur/ /gal te blo la bltos pa las/ /grangs 'grub par ni smra ba yang/ /brda la 'jug pa tsam gyis ni/
28a6(mdo 'grel): de ci yi phyir mi 'dod/ /tshe dang ring sogs dbye ba yi/ /bong tshod gang zhig rjod byed pa'i/ /don de 'ang de bzhin min dngos kyi/ /dbye ba nyid las ci mi 'dod/ /khang bzang phreng ni ring po dang/ /chen por ji ltar snang ba yin/ /de la 'di 'dra'i
28a7(mdo 'grel): bong tshod kyi/ /ngo bor rtog pa ma yin no/ /don gcig la ni 'du ba yis/ /de ltar bstan pa yin zhe na/ /gang phyir phan tshun tha dad pa/ /so so bar brjod de'i yan lag/ dang bral gzhan las gzhan de bzhin/ /gang dang phrad? dang dbye ba
28b1(mdo 'grel): yang/ /gzhan la rjes su nges pa dang/ phrad sogs blo dag gi ni rgyun/ /brtags pa de dag don med nyid/ /phrad pa yod pa ma yin na/ /sa bon chu dang zhing la sogs/ /rtag tu 'bras bu 'byin par ni/ /thal 'gyur bye brag med phyir ro/ /zhing dang
28b2(mdo 'grel): sa bon chu sogs rnams/ /bltos dang bcas par shes byas te/ /rang 'bras rtag tu mi 'jig phyir/ /'phyin pa 'khor lo'i chu bzhin no/ /de rnams gang la ltos gyur pa'i/ /dngos po phrad pa yin par 'gyur/ /de ni bye brag dngos gyur
28b3(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /tha dad nyid ces shes bya ste/ /phrad snga 'dod pa gang dag dang/ /phrad la longs spyod pa zhes brjod/ /de las gzhan pa yongs spangs nas/ /de nyid longs spyod pa 'di'o/ /dngos 'di bar chad med pa 'am 'di ni bar chad dang
28b4(mdo 'grel): bcas zhes/ /'di 'dri'i blo yi dbye ba dag /'di dag med gang las 'dir rig /gang 'dir bar chad bcas blo la/ /bar chad med pa'i blo nges dang/ /bar chad med la'ang gang gzhan pa/ /'di gnyis log pa'i shes pa ste/ /log pa'i
28b5(mdo 'grel): shes pa thams cad cing/ /don gyi gtso bo'i rjes 'jug la/ /gtso bor 'dir ni brjod bya ba/ /brjod pas de dag kyang 'grub 'gyur/ /gdub 'khor can zhes blo 'di yang/ /rgyu gang gis skye mi la ni/ /gdub 'khor yod pa'i
28b6(mdo 'grel): phyir zhe na/ /de ni rtag tu thar bar 'gyur/ /gzhan du mthong ba yod pa la/ /gzhan du dgag pa nyid rigs kyi/ /phrad pa gang duAng ma mthong ba/ /de ko ji ltar dgag tu zung/ /nag pa gdub 'khor med de bzhin/ /de phyir dngos rnams yod nyid yin/ /dgag dang
28b7(mdo 'grel): sgrub sogs gang yin pa'i/ rnam par dbye ba'i gnas yin zhes/ /smra la skad cig pa nyid kyis/ /chu sogs bye brag med pa ste/ /bar chad med pa sogs yod kyang/ /gnas skabs gzhan la bltos bcas yin/ /gal te rgyu la sogs de rnams/ /phrangs
29a1(mdo 'grel): tsam la bltos bcas na/ /phrad pa thag nyid 'bras 'byung 'gyur/ /de min mthar yang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /bar chad med par 'byung ba las/ gnas skabs bye brag thob pa la'ang/ /gang dag 'di longs spyod mthong ba'ang//
29a2(mdo 'grel): dngos de dag gyad de bzhin 'grub/ /bar du chod dang gzhan nyid bar/ /skye ba'i rgyu las bar chad dang/ /bcas dang bar chad med shes pa/ /log pa'i shes pa thams cad kyang/ /chos mthun la bltos min par yang/ /'khrul rgyun la yod 'ga' zhig/
29a3(mdo 'grel): gzhan du 'gyur ba'i sems la ni/ /zla ba gnyis sogs blo bzhin no/ /bar chad med sogs la byung ba/ /gtso bor 'dir ni yod na'ang/ /gnas skabs bye brag las skyes pa/ /gdub 'khor can zhes pa blo 'di/ /nag pa dang ni gdub 'khor bzhin/ /phrad pa
29a4(mdo 'grel): dang ni 'dra ba yi/ /gnas skabs khyad par can las so/ /de 'drar mthong bzhin gzhan du min/ /phrad pa nyid du mthong min las/ /nag pa gdub 'khor med sogs pa'i/ /pha rol po yi 'dod pa las/ /phrad pa'i dngos po'i blo skye min/ /phrad pa'i blo ni gang yin pas/ /khang
29a5(mdo 'grel): bzang sogs la phrad blo 'byung/ /yang na dngos po du ma nyid/ /yod la snal ma mang po la/ /sogs yul can blo bzhin du/ /tha dad par ni skye bar 'gyur/ /bya ba yang ci rigs par/ /tshad ma gnyis kyi brjod bya ste/ /gcig ni du ma 'jug pa'ang/ /mi rigs gnod pa can yin no/ /pha
29a6(mdo 'grel): rol pha rol min brjod sogs/ /rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan gang yin pa/ /pha rol nyid dang pha rol min/ /'di yin phyogs dus yi rgyu yin/ /dper na sngon po sogs dngos rnams/ /rim gyis 'byung dang gnas pa las/ /gzhan pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis dben pa'ang/ /de ltar bstan cing gzhan de bzhin/
29a7(mdo 'grel): grangs dang phrad pa la sogs kun/ rdzas las tha dad min pa min/ /de ni rnam gcod byed nyid kyis/ /dbyug pa sogs bzhin 'dod ce na/ /de rnams kun rdzob tu yod par/ /smra bas 'dod pa sgrub byed yin/ /gang phyir kun rdzob tu yod par/ /de nyid gzhan nyid kyis brjod min/
29b1(mdo 'grel): 'on te brjod bya nyid min pa'i/ /tshogs la sogs pa 'gog byed pa/ /gang phyir nges pa'i chos nyid de/ /gzugs sgra dri ro sogs bzhin no/ /de ni de kho na nyid du/ /dngos med nam mkha' i pad+ma bzhin/ /chos nges pa nyid mi 'grub ste/ /de rnams rtogs pa sgro btags pa'o/ /gang phyir
29b2(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' i pad? sogs kyis/ /de skad smras nyid ma nges pa'o/ /tha dad min dang tha dad pa'ang/ /dngos po nyid la rnam par gnas/ /grangs sogs rdzas las tha dad pa/ /de ltar bsgrub bya yin zhe na/ /gzhi nyid ma grub pa yi phyir/ /grangs sogs rnams ni mi 'grub bo/ /bsdus pa
29b3(mdo 'grel): sogs las tha dad pa'i/ /rdzas nyid de ltar brjod bya ba/ /rang dngos nyid las tha dad pa/ /rnam par nyam par sgrub par 'gyur/ /byas pa'i shugs ni rnams gsum du/ /bstan te shugs su brjod pa dang/ /goms pa brjod dang gnas 'jig pa/ /'di dag ma lus mi 'thad
29b4(mdo 'grel): de/ /dngos rnams skad cig pa yin phyir/ /byas pa gang yang yod min no/ /byas pa'i shugs kyi bka' can las/ /gang gi rgyun ni rgyur yin/ /goms pa brjod pa'i byas pa'i shugs/ /sems kyi bag chags bdag nyid rigs/ /bdag gi yon tan nyid de ni/ /mi rig de ni
29b5(mdo 'grel): bsal phyir ro/ /gnas su 'jog byed dngos nyid du/ /mi rigs skad cig gi 'jig phyir/ /gnas don 'byung ba nyid gyur las/ /de yi ngo bo nyid du gnas/ /rang gi rgyud nyid las byung ba/ /skad cig gcig ni gnas pa rnams/ /snga ma snga ma'i nus mthu las/ /rgyun gyis
29b6(mdo 'grel): rjes su 'jug pa yin/ /de ni gzhan du 'byung min pa/ /de phyir 'di yi 'jog byed gang/ /'di yi mthong ba'i rgyu nyid min pa gzhan yang byas pa'i shugs su 'gyur/ /gos sogs skye ba 'di nyid la/ /'jog byed yon tan du 'dod na/ /de bzhin byas shugs yon
29b7(mdo 'grel): tan yang/ /thams cad du yang yod mi 'gyur/ /yid dang bdag tu sbyor ba dang/ /gong du rgyas par bkag pa'i phyir/ /ma mthong ba la pha rol pos/ /smras pa mtshan nyid ldan mi rigs/ de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las yon tan gyi tshig gi don brtag pa
30a1(mdo 'grel): ste bcu drug pa'o// //dngos rnams skad cig gcig gis la/ /bdeg pa la sogs las yod min/ /skye ba'i yul du zhen pa nyid/ /de las gzhan thob yod ma yin/ /skye ba'i las ni gzhan pa'i dus/ /las kyi dus shes pha rol smra/ /shin tu myur bar
30a2(mdo 'grel): zhig 'dod pa/ /mar me la sogs dngos la yang/ /rgyab ma mdun sa'i yul dag las/ /bral dang phrad pa'i 'byung dag la/ /'gro ba can nam gzhan kun yang/ /las kyi gzhir ni rab brtags las/ /gang skyes nam duAng skad cig kyang/ /gnas min g.yo ba'i bdag nyid
30a3(mdo 'grel): do/ /de ni rdul phran tsam gyis kyang/ /yul du 'pho ba yod ma yin/ /rtag pa'i dngos po thams cad ni/ /'gro la sogs par shin tu yang/ /bsgrub dka' gnas skabs thams cad du/ /'di la bye brag med nyid do/ /gal te 'gro bo sogs dngos de'i/ /dngos yin
30a4(mdo 'grel): rtag tu 'gro sogs 'gyur/ /skad cig gcig kyang mi g.yo bar/ /gcig tu gnas pa ma yin no/ /gang du 'gro sogs med pa yang/ /'dis ni rtag tu thob 'gyur na/ /snga ma'i ngo bo mi 'dor phyir/ /'gro sogs rtsom pa'i dus bzhin no/ /'on te 'gro min sogs dngos po'i/
30a5(mdo 'grel): dngos yin rtag tu 'gro mi 'gyur/ /skad cig gcig kyang 'gul bar ni/ /'gyur ba nyid ni ma yin no/ /gang phyir 'gro sogs yin na yang/ /mi g.yo'i bdag nyid phyir yin te/ /snga ma'i ngo bo mi 'dod phyir/ /g.yo min ngo bo'i dus bzhin no/ /gal te 'gro min dus
30a6(mdo 'grel): gcig tshe'ang/ /gzhan du yang ni 'gyur yin na/ /phan tshun 'gal ba'i bdag nyid dang/ /'dres pas tha dad nyid du 'gyur/ /de dag shin tu tha dad pa'i/ /bdag nyid du ni nges pa ste/ /'gal ba'i chos dag 'dre ba'i phyir/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo'i dngos bzhin no/ /
30a7(mdo 'grel): mthong ba nyid du mngon 'dod pa'i/ /las ni dngos po las gzhan min/ /'di ni mthong ba nyid kyang min/ /rigs pa'i rdzas 'brangs yod ma yin/ /mi brtan nyid dang brtan nyid la/ /de lta'i 'gro sogs rnam yod min/ /thob dang gzhan pa'i yul dag las/ /byed dang
30b1(mdo 'grel): phrad pa'i rigs ma yin/ /rgyun mi 'chad par skye ba yin/ /'dra ba gzhan dngos rnams kyi/ /yul gzhan nye bar thob pa la/ 'gro bar 'khrul yin sgron ma yin/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las/ las kyi tshig gi don brtag pa ste rab tu byed pa bcu bdun
30b2(mdo 'grel): pa'o// //rdzas la sogs pa bkag pa ni/ /rigs rnams kyang ni bsal ba yin/ /de dag thams cad tshig gi don/ /gsum la gnas par kun tu brtags/ /de la rigs 'di rnam gnyis su/ /pha rol pos ni khas blangs pa/ /ma
30b3(mdo 'grel): lus pa la rjes 'jug pa/ /yod par brjod pa spyi nyid dang/ /bye brag yod par mngon brjod pa'i/ /rdzas la sogs pa'i spyi nyid de/ /rang gnas rnams su rjes 'jug pa'i/ /sems kyi rgyur gyur dngos las so/ /rigs mi mthun pa thams cad dang/ /rang gi gnas
30b4(mdo 'grel): kyi bye brag las/ /log pa'i blo yi rgyu nyid de/ /de rnams de ltar gnas pa nyid/ /bye brag nyid ni kha cig gi /log pa nyid kyis rgyu rnams te/ /rtag pa'i rdzas su gang gnas rnams/ /bye brag ces ni brjod pa yin/ /gang gi stobs kyi rdul phran las/ /sogs la rnal
30b5(mdo 'grel): 'byor pas blo 'byung/ /'di ni de dang mtshan nyid ni/ /mi 'dra bar ni so sor gnas/ /yod nyid ba lang nyid sogs rigs/ /mngon sum gyis kyang rab grub ste/ /dbang po'i bya ba yod pa la/ /yod sogs shes pa 'byung phyir ro/ /rjes su dpag pa'i stobs kyis
30b6(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /'di dag yod par shes bya ste/ /shes pa'i bye brag gis/ /rgyu mtshan gzhan las byung ba'o/ /ba lang glang po sogs rnams la/ /glang sogs sgra dang shes bye brag /brda dang dbyibs dang ril bo sogs/ /tha dad don gyi rgyu mtshan no/ /ba lang la sogs yul
30b7(mdo 'grel): nyid la'ang/ /de yi sgra blo yod pa las/ /gzhan phyir dper na de nyid la'ang/ /lcags kyu be'u bcas blo sgra bzhin/ /ri bong rwa sogs rnam shes kyis/ /bye brag la ni rnam 'phrul phyir/ /de yi ngo bo brjod rnams kyang/ /chos mi mthun par lta bar byed/ /ba lang sogs rjes
31a1(mdo 'grel): 'jug shes pa'ang/ /ril po las gzhan par skye ste/ /bye brag ldan phyir sngon po las/ /sogs pa'i shes pa lta bu'o/ /ba lang nyid ni ba lang las/ /don gzhan tha dad blo yul phyir/ /de bzhin gzugs dang reg sogs bzhin/ /
31a2(mdo 'grel): brjod pa nag pa'i rta bzhin no/ /de kun snying po med pa ste/ /gzhung lugs tsam du smra ba rnams/ /'di las shes byed tshad ma ni/ /cung zad tsam yang ma mthong ngo/ /dbang po bya ba yod pa yi/ /rjes byung yod sogs shes pa ni/ /'grub pa min te de rnams ni/ /brda la 'jug pa
31a3(mdo 'grel): nyid phyir ro/ /dper na sna tshogs pa yin/ /bsal la sku ru rang shing sogs/ /re re'am ni sbyar ba 'ang rung/ /nus pa sna tshogs nyid du 'ang rigs/ /de rnams la ni spyi zhes pa'i/ /nus ldan cung zad yod ma yin/ /yun ring mur ba'i dbye ba yis/ /nad rnams zhi bar
31a4(mdo 'grel): thar phyir ro/ /zhing sogs dbye bas 'ga' zhig la'ang/ /gcig gi ngo bo la rtag pa'i/ /khyad par can spyi yod spyi yi/ /skyu ru ra'i shing sogs de yod/ /de ltar shin tu tha dad kyang/ /kha cig nus pa nges pa yis/ /mtshungs par bsre ba
31a5(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa'i/ /rgyu nyid thob kyi gzhan du min/ /bya ba tsam la mkho ba yi/ /brjod par 'dod pa'i sgra de yang/ /brda ru byas pa de la 'am/ /yang na ci 'dod gzhan yang ngo/ /dgal dang bzho sogs ngo bo yi/ /bya ba'i dbye ba la mkho ba/ /
31a6(mdo 'grel): ba lang sogs sgra'i brda ru ni/ /tha snyad 'dogs pa po rnams byed/ /de brda yin la byed pa la/ /yod pa la sogs pa 'di ni/ /skye bar yang ni shes bya yi/ /dbang po'i bya ba'i rjes thogs min/ /rtog med rnam pa'i shes pa
31a7(mdo 'grel): nyid/ /dang po nyid du skye 'gyur zhing/ /de nas brda rnams yid byed la/ /de las de dran de rnams las/ /gzhan du son pa'i sems la ni/ /dngos po'i gtan tshigs kyang 'bras med/ /phyogs de phyi rol la min te/ /bsgrub byas stong par
31b1(mdo 'grel): ston pa yin/ /dngos su de yi rgyu min te/ /phyi yi lcags kyu be'u sog bzhin/ /rang gi mtshan nyid 'di la ni/ /rjong dang rnam rtog 'jug yod min/ /gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid ni/ /dag kun spyod yul las 'das dngos/ /nang tsam la ni brten nas 'di
31b2(mdo 'grel): kun rdzob nyid du dmigs byed de/ /lcags kyu la sogs phyi dngos por/ /nges pas 'jug par 'gyur ba yin/ /las dang yon tan tha snyad dag /med pa rgyur ni gang smras pa/ /med pa'i shes par bye brag ni/ /de yang mi rigs nus pa yi/ /rgyu nyid
31b3(mdo 'grel): las ni dngos po nyid/ /gzhan yang yod sogs bye brag dang/ /med las med pa'i shas pa thob/ /ril las tha dad blo yin pas/ /shes pa de dag rnams dang ni/ /mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba mi 'grub/ /des ni gtan tshigs mi 'grub 'gyur/ /gang phyir rjes
31b4(mdo 'grel): 'jug ldan shes pas/ /sgra dang gsal bar snang bcas la/ /mdog dbyibs yi ge'i rnam pa yis/ /stong pa rigs yin zhes smra byed/ /spyi yang sngon po la sogs pa'i/ /dngos nyid yin na yon tan dang/ /'di la dbye ba ci zhig yod/ /sngon po sogs la
31b5(mdo 'grel): gcig nyid ni/ /rjes 'jug par yang snang ba yin/ /snang bzhin yin yang 'di yi ni/ /dbye ba shes 'gyur min zhe na/ /de yi stobs kyis de dag ni/ /sgra blo ji bzhin gsal 'jug 'gyur/ /spyi yi shes pa pha rol po/ /nges pa'i bdag nyid nyid
31b6(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa/ /nges pa med par mi rigs te/ /mi 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur/ /rgyu mtshan gzhan nyid las grub kyang/ /rjes 'jug gcig pu mi brtan las/ /tha dad spyi ni mi 'grub ste/ /rim gyis 'byung ba nyid phyir ro/ /tshig gi don sgra
31b7(mdo 'grel): drug po yis/ /bdag nyid rgyu gzhan la bltos pa/ /gang yang yod pa sogs rjes 'jug /yod pa shes pa'i shes pa'o/ /chos can rgyu mtshan yin zhe na/ /de la'ang yod pa'i blo yod pas/ /chos gzhan de yi rgyu nyid de/ /thug med chos can nyid
32a1(mdo 'grel): kyang 'thob/ /de phyir 'di rnams kyis gtan tshigs/ /'di ni 'khrul par mthong ba ste/ /nye bar sbyor ba thams cad la/ /khyab par 'di ni sgrub pa min/ /de yi 'og tu de bstan pa/ /'di nyid kyis ni bsal ba
32a2(mdo 'grel): yin/ /thun mong du sgrub de la ni/ /'dod pa 'grub par sogs par mtshungs/ /'tshod pa po la sogs pa yang/ /rjes 'jug can zhig min na yang/ /shes pa bye brag can skye zhing/ /med la med pa'i blo yang ngo/ /'dod pas sbyar ba'i ngo bo dang/ /zhig
32a3(mdo 'grel): dang ma skyes pa rnams la/ /ji skad bstan pa de kun gyis/ /gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid do/ /'tshed pa po sogs blo rnams kyis/ /rgyu mtshan cung zad yod ma yin/ /las yod ces na de bzhin du/ /bsal ba so so phye min nam/ /phye la
32a4(mdo 'grel): rjes 'jug can gyi blo rjes 'jug yod par rigs ma yin/ /de phyir gcig tu 'dod pa'i phyir/ /gsal ba kun rjes 'jug ldan 'gyur/ /rjes 'jug gis phongs las la ni/ /gal te rgyur rtog de lta ni/ /gsal ba rnams ni de nyid la/ /ci phyir rgyu nyid du ni 'dod//
32a5(mdo 'grel): las rnams dang ni bral ba der/ /'tshod po sogs blo med 'gyur te/ /rigs bzhi las ni dus kun tu/ /gnas par pha rol po 'dod min/ /'das dang ma 'ongs las ni de'i/ /rgyu mtshan can du byas zhe na/ 'tshod pa po sogs blo sgra yi/ /rgyu
32a6(mdo 'grel): de ma yin med pas so/ /gal te las nyid kyi rigs dang/ 'brel pa'i las dang sbyor ba'i blo/ /de ni zhig pa'i las la yang/ /des pa'i rgyu ni mtshon phyir ro/ /'das pa'i las ni de yi tshe/ /mtshon du zin yang yod pa dang/ /gzung bya min te
32a7(mdo 'grel): rigs kyi ni/ /rang rten log pa nges pas so/ /dbyib pa gdub 'khor sogs rigs rnams/ /lan cig dmigs la de dang ni/ /bral yang dbyig nga la sogs blo/ /de rnams la ni 'jug pa min/ /'on te'ang 'tshed pa po la sogs/ /rigs
32b1(mdo 'grel): gzhan du ni smra byed na/ /skyes ma thag la de sbyor bas/ /'tshed po la sogs blo ru 'gyur/ /de tshe yod sogs blo bzhin du/ /'du ba can rnams med ce na/ /phyis kyang de la de bzhin du/ /'gyur te bye brag med phyir ro/ /de dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin no/ /yon tan
32b2(mdo 'grel): ldan min de dag la/ /'du ba 'di ni de lta na/ /phyis de'i bdag nyid ji ltar 'gyur/ /gal te gsal ba mi rtag pas/ /khyad par can gyur de lta na'ang/ /rigs kyi yon tan mi ldan pa'i/ /ngo bo nam yang 'dod mi 'gyur/ /'tshod pa la sogs bya ba las//
32b3(mdo 'grel): gtso bo sgrub par 'dod pa yi/ /'tshed pa bo sogs zhes pa de'i/ /gtso bo'i 'tshod po gzhan yod min/ /gtso bo zhes bya 'di ci zhig /rjes 'jug min phyir nus pa min/ /rdzas dang las dang yon tan sogs/ /bdag nyid nyid du de rtag min/ /de dang rigs
32b4(mdo 'grel): mi 'dra ba las/ /log pa'i ngo bor nges pa tsam/ /brda yi bye brag la ltos pa/ /me la sogs pa'i blo yin no/ /brda nyid ji lta ba nyid de/ /de phyir gcig nyid rjes 'jug pa/ /med kyang sgra dang blo nyid kyi/ /dbye ba yis ni 'jug pa yin/ /de lta na yang
32b5(mdo 'grel): med rnams la/ /med pa'i blo dang sgra dag kyang/ /rjes 'jug 'gal min de dag gi /don med brda rjes 'jug phyir ro/ /bum pa snga na med 'di'o zhes/ /de phyir dngos po'i bye brag can/ /nyid kyi mig blor shes bya ste/ /bye brag la brten spyi dbang gis
32b6(mdo 'grel): de ni kun tu rjes 'jug nyid/ /co na de lta min mtshan nyid/ /min 'dra de min la brten phyir/ /bum pa zhes bya la sogs blo/ /de rnams rjes 'jug par rigs kyi/ /med pa'o med pa'o snyam blo 'di/ /mtshan nyid mi 'dra'i phyir yin no/ /yod pa'i
32b7(mdo 'grel): dbang gis ba lang dang/ /rta'i blo byar 'dod min gyi/ /thams cad spyi ni yin bsgrub phyir/ /gcig nyid gzhan du brtag pa'o/ /gang rnams dmag sogs blo rnams kyi/ /rgyur ni grags la sogs 'dod pa'i/ /rjes mthun par 'dor min zhe
33a1(mdo 'grel): na/ /gal te de ltar yin na ni/ /'dod pas sbyar ba'i brda dbye ba/ /yid la byed pas rjes 'jug pa'i/ /blo dbye ba ni cis mi 'dod/ /bye brag shes na brdar byed pa'i/ /'dod pa de las byung ba yin/ /de byas pa las
33a2(mdo 'grel): de thos pa'ang/ /yid byed de las de blo 'di/ /rjes su 'gro ldog dag gis ni/ /de nyid kyi ni blo 'di yi/ /rgyu yi nges pa'i nges pa grub/ /gzhan 'dod thug pa med par 'gyur/ /rjes su mthun pa dang 'dra ba/ /'gyur na don gzhan du rtog na//
33a3(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid mi 'dra can blo rnams/ /'di nyid la brten pa ni mchog /'di la nus pa nges par ni/ /ldog pa rjes su 'gro ldog gi /nus pa shes pa rnams la ni/ /rtog na de yang mchog yin no/ /spyi rnams la yang rjes 'gro bar/ /byed pa dag
33a4(mdo 'grel): ni yod min te/ /rtag rnams rtag tu yod pa'i phyir/ /ldog pa nyid ni mi srid do/ /rdzas sogs min pa'i blo rnams ni/ /yon tan nyid sogs rigs pa min/ /du ma rnams ni 'du ba yang/ /grangs la sogs pa'ang yod 'gyur te/ /de
33a5(mdo 'grel): rnams la ni spyi bzhin du/ /spyi zhes bya ba'i blo ru 'gyur/ /bum pa nyid sogs pa'i spyi yang/ /bum sogs nyid la 'jug 'gyur gyi/ /med rnams la 'di 'jug min phyir/ /de rnams blo ni ji lta bu/ /rten gzhan la brten phyir gzhan du
33a6(mdo 'grel): blo dang sgra dang rigs min te/ /glang po sogs bzhin rta sogs la'o/ /'dir ni don gcig la brten min/ /dro dang grang dang lci ba yang/ /don gcig la brten blor 'gyur gyi/ /'di la 'di yang don med nyid/ /med pa gang duAng gnas pa min/ /bye brag
33a7(mdo 'grel): bye brag can nyid kyi/ /'brel pa 'di la yod ce na/ /'di la 'brel pa gzhan yod par/ /rtog par byed pa ma yin nam/ /de dag sbyor ba la brtan nas/ /bye brag bye brag can rtog na/ /de med rgyu mtshan med pa nyid/ /de ni grub pa ma yin no/ /bum pa'i snga na med pa zhes/ /
33b1(mdo 'grel): bya ba la sogs tshigs 'di yang/ /rtog pa can gyis sprul pa ste/ /brtags pa'i dpa' bo nyid sogs bzhin/ /bye brag bye brag can nyid 'di/ /gang yin dngos po la brten te/ /'brel pa gzhan zhig yod par ni/ /de las nges par brtag par bya/ /de la med pa
33b2(mdo 'grel): med pa zhes/ /'dir ni shes pa tsa med rjod pa/ /bye brag la gnas spyi yin te/ /rang gi rten rnams la gnas pa'o/ /de rnams rjes 'jug 'dod min gyi/ /gal te gzhan yod 'dod min na/ /tshig gi don las tha dad pas/ /med pa'i blo ni skye ba yin//
33b3(mdo 'grel): 'dod pas sbyar ba'i gzugs sogs pa'i/ /don la rigs ni yod min te/ /gsal ba med pa nyid kyi phyir/ /de ni 'khrul pa nyid du bstan/ /'das pa dang ni ma byung ba'i/ /rtag pa'i spyi yi yul can gyi/ /shes yod ce na 'di ni byin/ /'ba' zhig mi 'dzin na
33b4(mdo 'grel): yin nam/ /'ba' zhig dmigs pa yin na ni/ /gsal ba rnams kyir 'dir mi 'gyur/ /spyi'i gsal byed de min te/ /gangs can 'bigs byed nyid bzhin no/ /'di ni de rnams bskyed pa la/ /gzhan dbang yin pas 'brel pa med/ /rtag phyir gcig pu
33b5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa'i phyir/ /shes pa gzhan dbang nyid kyang min/ /rang rten dbang por sbyor ba la/ /sogs la bltos pa med phyir ro/ /yod pa rtag tu dmigs nyid dam/ /yang na nam yang ma yin te/ /rang gi bdag nyid shes bskyed par/ /rung ba 'am yang na mi rung
33b6(mdo 'grel): nyid/ /gal te lan cig de lta'i dngos/ /yin na rtag tu de nyid 'gyur/ /de ni dung ba'am mi rung ba'i/ /ngo bor rang bzhin gyis gang gnas/ /de ni rtag phyir g.yo min te/ /'jig par 'gyur ba gang zhig yin/ /ba lang nyid ni ba lang las/ /don gzhan tha dad
33b7(mdo 'grel): blo yul phyir/ /de ni gzugs dang reg sogs bzhin/ /brjod pa nag pa'i rta bzhin no/ /zhes 'dir 'khrul pa smra ba ste/ /'tshed pa po nyid sogs de bzhin/ /'di ni tshul gyis gzhan la yang/ /dman pa'i gtan tshigs sun kun bton/ /gzhan yang spyi ni du ma la/ /'jug
34a1(mdo 'grel): pa nyid du gang smras pa/ /de la 'jug par 'dod 'di ci/ /gnas pa 'am 'on te gsal ba nyid/ /re zhig rang dngos mi nyams pa/ /'di gnas pa yi dngos yin na/ /rten ni de byed nus min na/ /gang gis 'jogs pa po nyid 'gyur/ /de ni
34a2(mdo 'grel): ba dri dang sogs bzhin/ /'gro ba'i bgegs kyang yod min te/ /bya ba med pa nyid kyis na/ /de phyir gzhir ni brtag pa min/ /de ni 'du bar gnas zhe na/ /de ltar rnam par dpyad min te/ /des na tha dad mi grub rnams/ /rten dang rten can bdag nyid 'dod
34a3(mdo 'grel): 'bras sogs rnams kyi 'gro ba la/ /gegs byed pas mi gzhir gyur na/ /'gro ba smin pa'i spyi rnams la/ /rang gi shes pa skye rung nyid/ yin na gsal ba'i rgyu ci yin/ /gal te nus med 'di nus dang/ /ldan par gsal byed kyis byed na/ /'byung ba
34a4(mdo 'grel): mi brtan 'gyur nyid de/ /mar me gsal bya bum sogs bzhin/ /bum sogs rigs kyi bye brag kyang/ /rang gnas rnams nyid la yin na/ /thams cad la gnas rten du yang/ /'gyur te dam pa'i rigs bzhin no/ /de la yul gzhan nyid du yang/ /
34a5(mdo 'grel): dngos po 'byung ba de la ni/ /de rnams ji ltar mthong ba'am/ /gnas pa'i rten yin mi shes so/ /de dang lhan cig skye ba min/ /de rnams rtag phyir de la sngar/ /gnas min khyab pa min pas so/ /gzhan nas 'ongs min byas med phyir/ /rang gnas dbang
34a6(mdo 'grel): por sbyor la sogs/ /de ni gcig pa 'dzin pa ni/ /thams cad du yang dmigs 'gyur te/ /de yi rang dngos mi 'dor phyir/ /rtogs las tha dad min zhe na/ /de yang 'dzin par byed 'gyur ba 'am/ /de bzhin de nyid mi 'dzin par/ /'gyur ba'am tha dad nyid du
34a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /pha rol pos dag rigs dag la/ /shing sogs shes pa 'di mi 'byung/ /rim nyid dang rjes 'jug sogs phyir/ /dper na 'tshed po sogs blo bzhin/ /rtag pa skyed pa po min pa/ /gnod pa can du shes bya zhing/ /gong du phrad pa sun dbyur bar/ /
34b1(mdo 'grel): brtan pa'ang gnod pa can yin no/ /de ltar rigs 'di tha dad pa/ /gcig tu gsal ba byas pa yin/ /rgyal dpog sogs pas smras pa lnga/ /yod smra rtag par brtags par 'gyur/ /'grel par mtshal ba 'dir/ /spyi'i tshig don brtag pa ste bco brgyad
34b2(mdo 'grel): pa'o// //gang yang bye brag ces bya ba/ /mthar dbyung bar brtags de dag ni/ /rtag pa'i rdzas ni bsal ba yis/ /de yang mi srid mtshan nyid yin/ /rdul phran mkha' dang phyogs sogs rnams/ /gal te ma 'dres par gnas na/ /de phyi rang
34b3(mdo 'grel): gi ngo bos te/ /mtshan nyid mi 'dra nye bar mtshon/ /gal te 'ang de rnams bdag nyid gzhan/ /'dres par gyur pa yin na yang/ /gzhan yod na yang mi 'dra ba'i/ /mtshan nyid ma 'khrul mtshon min na/ /ji ltar bye brag 'di rnams kyi/ /mtshan nyid
34b4(mdo 'grel): mi 'bra? mtshon pa yin/ /rang nyid kho nas yin zhe na/ /rdul phran sogs la ci mi 'dod/ /ji ltar khyi sha la sogs pa/ /rang nyid kho nas mi gtsang gnas/ /de dang 'brel pas gzhan rnams kyang/ /de bzhin gal te 'dir 'dod na/ /ji ltar mar me
34b5(mdo 'grel): nu sogs 'di/ /gsal byed yin bzhin 'di yang ni/ /de gsal byed pa'i bdag nyid du/ /nges par gnas bzhin 'di de bzhin/ /mi gtsang dngos 'di kun rdzob pa/ /yin gyi de nyid don min na/ /de nyid kyang ni gzhan duAng ste/ /'di ni ji ltar 'gyur ba
34b6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /'on te 'gyur ba nyid yin yang/ /rang gi sha sogs dbang gis 'di/ /rtag pa skye ba med pa'i phyir/ /mi gtsang dngos po 'thob pa min/ /sgron ma la sogs pa yi mthus/ /skad cig pa yi don bum pa/ /rgyan la sogs pa'i shes pa rnams/ / r skyed byed dngos po thob 'gyur gyi/ /rtsod pa'i gnas gyur bye brag gi /stobs kyi mtshan nyid mi 'dra'i blo/ /de rnams dag ni 'byung min te/ /rim gyis 'byung phyir bde sogs bzhin/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las spyi dang bye brag gi tshig gi don brtag
35a1(mdo 'grel): pa ste bcu dgu pa'o// //snal ma 'di rnams la snam bu/ /smyig tshal 'di rnams lar lde/ /zhes sogs 'di yi blo 'byung bas/ /'du ba rtog par bya ba yin/ /de med blo 'di'i rgyu mtshan du/ /'gyur ba yang ni ci zhig
35a2(mdo 'grel): yin/ /rgyu mtshan gzhan ni med pa na/ /bye brag blo ni mthong ma yin/ /bye brag 'di yi blo las kyang/ /sbyor ba bzhin du tha dad min/ /'byung ba bzhin du thams cad la/ /'di ni gcig pa nyid shes bya/ /rtag pa de nyid 'byung ba bzhin/ /rgyu mtshan mi dmigs pa yang ni/ /
35a3(mdo 'grel): 'di la rgyu ni cung zad kyang/ /tshad mas nye bar dmigs pa min/ /de ltar de yi shes pa yang/ /rang gi grub mdza' i rjes 'brangs nas/ /pha rol po rnams 'jug byed kyi/ /'jig rten pa la'ang de ma mthong/ /rten dang brten par gyur pa dag /sna tshogs
35a4(mdo 'grel): pa nyid mtshan nyid 'gyur/ /kundi? sogs gnas dpal 'bras bzhin/ /'di la 'di zhes pa blo yi/ /de bzhin gang gi de rnams la/ /'di la de yi blo 'byung ba/ /snal ma snam bu sogs rnams la/ /sna tshogs nyid mtshon yod ma yin/ /dngos po rnams
35a5(mdo 'grel): la rang 'dod kyi/ /sbyor bas 'di'o zhes rtogs pa/ /'di ni rgyu la mngon sbyor ba/ /pha rol po smra de mi 'thad/ /shing las yal ga 'gro min la/ /brag ces 'jig rten pa blo 'byung/ /mi 'gror brjod las lhag yan lag /bar mtshams med par mthong
35a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /de dag la yang 'di yi blo/ /'jig rten dang 'gal smra ba yin/ /bum pa'i gzugs dang sgra la sogs/ /de yi bdag nyid du shes bya/ /gzugs dang bum sogs gnas skabs kun/ /sgra yi brjod bya nyid yin te/ /de yi bye brag brjod pa'i phyir/ /de
35a7(mdo 'grel): rnams de bzhin 'jug pa yin/ /de la brten pa'i blo 'di rnams/ /de rnams rnam pas 'jug pa ste/ /'du bas ma yin tha dad pa/ /kun kyang mthong ba min phyir ro/ /gal te dngos po thams cad la/ /dngos po gcig gyur yod gyur na/ /'jim gong sogs la'ang sni?
35b1(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /sogs pa'i shes pa'ang thal bar 'gyur/ /glang po sogs la'ang ba lang nyid/ /la sogs yod par thal 'gyur te/ /des na ba lang sogs gzugs nyid/ /'di 'gyur ba la'ang khra bo bzhin/ /snal ma rnams la snam bu dos/ /yod par 'du ba
35b2(mdo 'grel): las shes na/ /'jim gong rnams la de bzhin du/ /de yod ces par cis mi shes/ /'jim gong la de brten pa min/ /zhes na 'du bas snal ma yang/ /brten par 'dod pa ma yin nam/ /'jim gong la de ci phyir min/ /'du bas snal ma la snam bu/ /zhes
35b3(mdo 'grel): byar sgrub par byed na de/ /'jim gong rnams la bum pa yi/ /blo de rgyu mtshan med par 'gyur/ /de ltar glang po sogs gang la/ /'du bas glang po nyid sogs yin/ /de nyid rang gnas la rigs kyi/ /dbye bas ba lang nyid sogs 'gyur/ /de ni gcig nyid du
35b4(mdo 'grel): yod kyi/ /rten dang brten par dbye ba yis/ /rdzas rnams la ni de rigs nyid/ /las rnams la'ang las nyid/ /'du las byung 'di la zhes pa'i/ /shes pa rjes 'gror bstan pa'i phyir/ /thams cad la yang 'du ba 'di gcig du kho na yin zhes bya/ /rdzas nyid
35b5(mdo 'grel): la sogs rgyu mtshan rnams/ /tha dad par ni bstan pa'i phyir/ /rdzas sogs rigs kyi blo rnams kyi/ /des pa nyid du nges pa yin/ /rten dang brten pa'i nges pa yis/ /dper na snod dang zho dag kyang/ /'brel pa gcig tuAng snang ba yin/ /de bzhin 'di la'ang nges par
35b6(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /'du ba gcig pu yin na yang/ /gsal bya gsal byed nus pa yang/ /dbye bas rdzas sogs rigs rnams la/ /de ni 'gal ba min zhe na/ /gcig nyid rten dang brten par ni/ /des par bsgrub dka' ma yin nam/ /'du ba las ni rdzas nyid du/ /rdzas rnams kho na
35b7(mdo 'grel): la 'dod pa'i/ /'du ba de ni yon tan la/ /sogs la'ang yod par ji ltar 'gyur/ /yon tan rdzas sogs de dag gi /'brel pas 'di ni gcig nyid ma/ /gzhan du 'di ni yon tan dang/ /rigs sogs tha dad nyid du 'gyur/ /gsal ba so so 'ang sbyor dbye bas/ /sbyor ba
36a1(mdo 'grel): ji bzhin tha dad 'gyur/ /rdzas la nyid sogs rgyu rnams dang/ /tha dad par ni mi rigs te/ /rgyu mtshan yod na blo yin la/ /de phyir de yi nges pa'ang min/ /der brten pa nyid sogs pa nyid/ /'du ba las yin de nyid na/ /nges pa don du rigs
36a2(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ /gsal bya gsal byed nus pa yi/ /dbye ba'i 'du ba las yin na'ang/ /gzhan min pa de rtag pa rnams/ /skyed par byed pa rigs pa min/ /mar me la sogs yod pa las/ /skyes pa'i bum sogs 'di rnams kyi/ /shes pa ji ltar skyed rung
36a3(mdo 'grel): ba/ /de bzhin rigs la sogs pa min/ /kun dang zhor phrad pa yi/ /gcig tu gong du gsal ba yin/ /de yi phyir yang nges pa 'di/ /mi rigs shin tu thal 'gyur phyir/ /'di ni rtag pa nyid yin na/ /bum sogs kun kyang rtag 'gyur te/ /'du pa'i
36a4(mdo 'grel): dbang gis de rnams ni/ /rang rten la rtag gnas phyir ro/ /rang gi rtsom byed bye ba'am/ /yang na de zhig pa las sam/ /phrad pa sogs las bya ba yang/ /de rnams zhig pa yin zhe na/ /de lta min te de rnams kyang/ /rang rten la rtag 'dur 'dod
36a5(mdo 'grel): pa 'am/ /de rnams rnam par 'jig 'gyur na/ /'di la nges par 'jig par 'gyur/ /'brel pa can ni 'jug min na/ /'brel pa yod par bsgrub par 'dogs/ /phrad pa med na'ang sbyor ba ni/ /rnam par gnas pa ma yin te/ /dper na sbyor ba
36a6(mdo 'grel): yod gyur na/ /phrad pa rnam par gnas pa bzhin/ /de bzhin 'du ba yod pa na/ /'du ba can rnams gnas pa yin/ /'brel pa can gcig zhig na yang/ /'brel pa can gzhan yod pa las/ /'du ba rnam par gnas yin gyi/ /sbyor min tha dad phyir zhe na/ /gal te
36a7(mdo 'grel): de ltar bum pa sogs/ /'du ba can rnams zhig na yang/ /de rnams gnas pa'i bdag nyid gang/ /de ni rtog pa de dang ni/ /de phyir 'brel pa can gzhan la/ /rten pas rnam par gnas pa'am/ /'on te phrad pa'am bye pa ni/ /du ba bzhin du gzhan nyid yin//
36b1(mdo 'grel): de la brten pa'i mtshan nyid kyi/ /'du ba kun tu gnas yin na/ /snga ma bzhin du bum pa sogs/ /de rnams gnas pa nyid thob 'gyur/ /de rnams de ltar gnas min na/ /de rnams brten pa'i bdag nyid kyi/ /'du ba ji ltar gnas par 'gyur/ ming tsam yin na'ang de
36b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin no/ /de phyir snang na la yod na'ang/ /de rnams gyen la gnas min te/ /phyis bzhin 'di ni de rnams la/ /de bzhin dngos su gnas ma yin/ /'on te gzhan nyid phrad pa'am/ /bye ba du ma bzhin yin na/ /'brel pa can gzhan yod pa la/ /'du ba rnam par gnas 'gyur na/ /de
36b3(mdo 'grel): ltar phrad pa la sogs pa bzhin/ /'di ni mi 'gyur ma yin nam/ /de la sogs pa 'di yod pa/ /du ma'ang 'brel pa yin/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las/ 'du ba'i tshig gi don brtag pa ste nyi shu pa'o// //gal te dam pa'i don du? na/ /bye brag cung zad yod min na//
36b4(mdo 'grel): dbyig bcas dkar g.yo yod bdag nyid/ /ba lang 'di la sogs blos sgra/ /'di bdag rgyu med 'dod min na/ /'di dag yod pa'i yul gang yin/ /kun la bye brag med par ni/ /de dag 'jug mi srid phyir ro/ /smras pa blo sgra 'di dag la/ /yul ni gang yang yod yin te/
36b5(mdo 'grel): nang tsam la ni nges gnas pa'i/ /sa bon 'di rnams rgyu mtshan yin/ /sgra rnams gang dang gang dag gis/ /yul du gang dang gang brjod pa/ /de de kun tu sbyor ba ni/ /dngos su med de chos nyid yin/ /gang phyir rang gi mtshan nyid dang/ /rigs dang de 'grel rigs ldan
36b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /blo yi rnam pa'i sgra don du/ /de kho na nyid du mi 'thad/ /de la re zhig sgra mi 'thad/ /rang gi mtshan nyid rjod byed min/ /brda dang tha snyad thob pa yi/ /dus su khyab dang bral phyir ro/ /yul dus bya ba nus pa dang/ /snang ba la sogs dbye ba las/ /gcig la
36b7(mdo 'grel): gcig dngos de rnams kyi/ /gsal ba'i bdag nyid rjes su 'jug min/ /de phyir brda la mthong ba'i don/ /tha snyad la ni mthong ma yin/ /brda yi dus sum bzung ba/ /rtog pa ma yin sgra gzhan bzhin/ /gangs can la sogs gang yin pa/ /yul dus tshogs
37a1(mdo 'grel): kyis mi dbye bar/ /'dod pa rdul phran dbye ba yis/ /skad cig pa nyid du bsgrubs zin/ /rang gi mtshan nyid 'di dag kun/ /brdar bya bar ni nus min/ te/ /skye med dngos su brdar bya ba/ /mi rigs rta'i rwa bzhin no/ /skyes pa'i dus su bzung ba yang/
37a2(mdo 'grel): gang tshe tshig de rjes dran nas/ /bya byed de la brda med/ /'das nas yun ring lon phyir ro/ /gang yang skyes pa'i skad cig de'i/ /stobs kyis yin na phyi ma'i tshe/ /de la brda 'jug yod ma yin/ /'dra ba nyid kyang brtags pa yin/ /dro ba la sogs par
37a3(mdo 'grel): snang ba'o/ /de la dbang ba'i shes pa ni/ /rnam par gsal bar rigs bzhin/ /dro ba sogs las byung rnams kyi/ /don gang yin pa des bskyed blo'i/ /don de snang ba min pa'i phyir ba sgra de'i yul du ma rigs te/ gzugs kyi sgra yi ro bzhi'o/ /rnam pa
37a4(mdo 'grel): de dag nyid kyis mi/ /gsal ba dang ni rnam pa dag/ dang? gi rang gi mtshan nyid du/ /pha rol pos brtag dag kyang bsal/ /rdzas la sogs dang phrad pa dag/ dgag pa gong du bstan pa'i phyir/ /de dag sgra yi don nyid du/ /de nyid don du gnas mi rigs/ /rigs
37a5(mdo 'grel): dang de bzhin 'brel pa dag /gong du rgyas par bkag pa'i phyir/ /de 'og sgra don rnam gsum po/ /gzhan yang brtag par bya ba min/ /de la gsal ba rnam pa dang/ /rigs kyi sgra don gang smras pa/ /gang de kun kyang dngos med bar/ /mtshungs phyir de
37a6(mdo 'grel): rnams yod ma yin/ /blo ru gnas pa'i blo'i rnam pa/ /don dang blo gzhan la 'jug min/ /mngon 'dod don yang byed min te/ /de nyid don du brjod bya min/ /gzhan dag sgra yi don gzhan du/ /kho na yod can sogs par smra ba/ /de rnams kyang ni gsal ba nyid//
37a7(mdo 'grel): yin yang de lta'ang brjod bya ste/ /sgra rnams gzhan bcad don yod can/ /zhes byang brjod bya'i mtshan nyid do/ /kha lang sogs la'ang sngar ma mthong/ /lha dang mtho ris la mtshungs zer/ /sdud dang rnam grangs pa med pa'i/ /bsdus ba'ang brjod par
37b1(mdo 'grel): bya ba 'am/ /yod pa min pa dang 'dra ba'ang/ /sgra yi don du 'ga' 'dod pa 'am/ /yod min bye brag yod gang dag /rgyu yi rgyu mtshan yin pa 'am/ /brjod pa nyid las 'ongs pa'i sgra/ /brjod bya nyid ni thob pa ni/ /de 'di'i zhes byar mngon 'brel phyir/ /gang tshe
37b2(mdo 'grel): sgra la don gyis ni/ /gcig gi ngo bor byas gyur te/ /mngon par brjod pa sgra ru 'dod/ /gang yang rung don blo yi yul/ /phyi yi dngos po'i rgyu mtshan gyis/ /phyi yi dngos po zhes 'dzin te/ /sgra yi don du kha cig 'dod/ /dper na byis pa rnams dang ni/ /dud
37b3(mdo 'grel): 'gro rnams kyang goms pa las/ /so sor snang ba rgyu yin te/ /de la don yod zhes brjod 'di/ /rang gi mtshan nyid 'dod dam ci/ /'on te rigs dang 'brel dang ldan/ /blo nyid kyi ni gzugs brnyan na/ /don gcig la yang sngar bstan pa'i/ /skyon de rnams
37b4(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa yi/ /rtogs par bya ba'i dbye ba yis/ /tha snyad du ni rnam rtog byed/ /ba lang nyid sgra'i dbye bas don/ /yod tsam rtogs te yin zhe na/ /rwa dang dbyibs dang sngo la sogs/ /bye brag mi rtogs de 'dod na/ /de dang ldan 'dod bye brag rnams/ /brjod
37b5(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ba yin na ni/ /der 'byung skyon dag yod min nam/ /yod don can ni gzhan min no/ /bsdus par brjod pa yin na yang/ /dka' thub bya ba rigs sogs rnams/ /ma lus mngon par brjod pa'i phyir/ /rigs kyi dbye bar gsal brjod yin/ /des
37b6(mdo 'grel): par ma bzung gzugs rnams kyi/ /rdzas sogs rnams su gang 'dod dang/ /gang zhig 'brel pa yod pa yi/ /spyi dang slar yang gsal ba yin/ /bye brag rigs sogs ngo bo yi/ /sgra yi don ni mi 'thad phyir/ /don dang gcig par bya ba yi/ /de'i sgra 'di mi
37b7(mdo 'grel): rigs te/ /blo gnas brjod pa 'di nyid ni/ /phyi rol dag las tha dad phyir/ /de phyir blo la phyogs gzhan las/ /'di la bye brag ci zhig yod/ /blo yi rnam pa'i sgra don yang/ /gong du gsal ba nyid kyi na/ /shes las tha dad min pa yi/ /khyab byed nyid ni med
38a1(mdo 'grel): pas so/ /so sor snang ba'i sgra don yang/ /gal te phyi don yul yin na/ /gang phyir gcig bdag min phyi yi/ /ji ltar sna tshogs so sos snang/ /'on te bag chags tsam dngos phyir/ /de ni yul med yin na yang/ /phyi don rnams la shes pa
38a2(mdo 'grel): yang/ /ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur ba yin/ /gal te phyi don du des pas/ /rang dngos la de rnams su 'dod/ /de ltar 'khrul pas 'jug pa'i phyir/ /sgra don de kho na nyid min/ /thams cad nyid la thal 'gyur de phyir/ /sa bon med pa'ang mi rigs so/ /'di
38a3(mdo 'grel): rnams phan tshun tha dad pa/ /sa bon zhe na phyogs bdag nyid/ /gal te'ang 'di rnams thams cad nyid/ /skad cig pa na rjes 'gro med/ /gzhan na shes pa rigs kyis min/ /'di nyid kyi ni brjod 'dod pa'ang/ /sgra las rtogs pa bsal ba ste/ /'di ltar
38a4(mdo 'grel): sgra med med 'di la/ /gang zhig brjod 'dod gang zhig thob/ /phyi yi don la sgra 'jug pa/ /ji ltar sgra min pas brjod 'gyur/ /ming sogs de rnams kyis brjod yin/ /brjod 'dod rjes dpog rnam pa dang/ /'dri pa phyi yi dngos por ni/ /zhen pas 'di
38a5(mdo 'grel): la 'jug ce na/ /de nyid kho bo 'dod pa'ang yin/ /phyogs snga mas/ gzhan sel pa ni byed par sgra/ /khyed kyi phyogs rjod pa yin ma/ /dgag pa tsam yin snang 'di la/ /go bar byed pa ma yin gyis/ /'on kyang ba yang ba min dang/ /glang po shing sogs
38a6(mdo 'grel): bsgrub pa yang/ /yang dag ngo bor nges pa yis/ /sgra can blo ni 'jug pa yin/ /gal te pa lang zhes bya'i sgra/ /gzhan bsal don ni byed pa ste/ /ba lang gsal ba'i sgra phyi ma/ /skyed byed sgra ni btsal dgos so/ /shes pa sgra 'bras ma yin ma/ /gcig
38a7(mdo 'grel): la 'bras bu gnyis med de/ /dgag dang sgrub pa'i shes pa dag/ ji ltar gcig gi 'bras bu yin/ /ba lang sgra ni thos pa na/ /sngon du ba lang min zhes 'gyur/ /gang gis ba lang min dgag phyir/ /ba lang zhes bya'i sgra la 'jug/ /ba lang min las
38b1(mdo 'grel): ldog ba'i spyi/ /gang phyir brjod byar yongs rtags pas/ /de yis ba lang nyid dngos nyid/ /gzhan sel sgra yis gsal bar bstan/ /gang gis med pa thams cad ni/ /gzhan pa'i dngos po bdag nyid gnas/ /de las sta sor las ldog pa'i/ /bdag
38b2(mdo 'grel): nyid med pa gang yin pa/ /re zhig thun mong min bye brag/ rtog min yin phyir mi 'dod na/ /khra bo sogs la'ang spyi min par/ /thal bar 'gyur phyir de bzhin no/ /de phyir dngos kun gang yin pa/ /so sor yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ /ba lang blo de'i rgyur 'gyur
38b3(mdo 'grel): te/ /ba lang nyid las gzhan yod min/ /dgag pa tsam gyi ngo bo yang/ /sgra yi don du rtog byed na/ /stong nyid gzhan gyi rnam pa can/ /med pa'i sgra yi brjod byar 'gyur/ /de la 'ang rta sogs blo rnams kyi/ /bdag nyid cha shas 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dang ni
38b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan sel brjod bya nyid/ /brdzun pa nyid du khas len pa'o/ /ngo bo spyi ru 'gyur min na/ /sgra don dag la mi ltos par/ /sel bar brtags ba brdzun pa yin/ /blo de'ang dngos po'i ngo bo ste/ /sgra'i don rnams la skye bas na/ /brjod bya dngos po nyid du
38b5(mdo 'grel): brtag/ blo ni sel ba min pa can/ /yod pa min pa phyi don la/ /so sor snang ba'i tshig don bzhin/ /de bzhin tshig don yang 'gyur na/ /ci phyir sal bar rtog par byed/ /blo gzhan pa la rnam gcod pas/ /blor rtogs pa ni ma yin te/ /rang gi ngo bor grub
38b6(mdo 'grel): tsam las/ /gzhan pa'i cha ni 'dzin de min/ /gal te gzhan sel brjod bya na/ /tha dad spyi yi tshig rnams kyang/ thams cad rnam grangs pa ru 'gyur/ /'dres dang gcig nyid sna tshogs nyid/ /rnam rtog dang bral bdag nyid can/ /dngos po min phyir
38b7(mdo 'grel): sel rnams kyi/ /dbye ba yod ni min pa nyid/ /gal te dbye ba med pa'i phyir/ /thun mong min dngos cha shas bzhin/ /dngos min sna tshogs min nyid phyir/ /rnam grangs pa las thar pa yin/ /bsal bar bya ba'i bye brag gis/ /gal te tha dad par 'dod na
39a1(mdo 'grel): 'di ni rang las bye brag min/ /gzhan las kyang ni brtags pa yin no/ /'dres can rten tha dad pa yi/ /ngo bos phyi rol gnas pa yi/ /gsal bya gang yin de 'byed pa/ /de ni cher yang rtog pa yin/ /de bzhin rten ni tha dad pas//
39a2(mdo 'grel): 'di yang tha dad rigs ma yin/ /'brel pa can ni tha dad pas/ /dngos po tha dad 'dod ma yin/ /'on kyang dngos dang ma 'dres pa/ /gang yin gzhan las ldog pa yin/ /bye brag tshan ma thob par/ /ci yi phyir na nges pa min/ /'dra ba nyid du ma grub pa//
39a3(mdo 'grel): sel ba'i lus kyi bdag nyid du/ /shes par lus kyang nus min te/ /ba lang sogs su dbyer med phyir rta sogs gsal bya med par yang/ /chos gcig rjes 'jug dang bral bar/ /nges par bya bar mi nus pa/ /des na sel bar mi 'grub bo/ /rjes su
39a4(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa dang bral na/ /sgra dang rtags dag 'byung ma yin/ /de dag med na sel pa 'ang min/ /thun mong min pa'ang rjes 'jug min/ /sel ba yang ni ma grub na/ /lhan cig spyod pa gang na gsungs/ /de la ma mthong ba de dag/ /tshad ma nyid du 'gyur ma
39a5(mdo 'grel): yin/ /ma mthong ba tsam gyis de dag /rtogs par byed par 'gyur ba min/ /thad nyid la ma mthong phyir/ /rtogs byar bye brag 'gyur ma yin/ /'on te 'phra ba nyid med kyang/ /sel bar rtog pa yin na ni/ /'di na pa lang rta dag la/ /sel bar ci phyir rtog mi
39a6(mdo 'grel): byed/ /khra bo las ni gzhan nyid du/ /ser skya dang ni rta dag mtshungs/ /spyi ni gzhan min 'dod ce na/ /ba min gang la sel ba 'jug/ /ba min sel ba'ang dbang po yis/ /dang por nges pa ma yin na/ /gzhan la sgra ni 'jug min na/ /ci zhig mthong na
39a7(mdo 'grel): de sbyor byed/ /sngar bstan pa yi rnam pa yis/ /'di la rdzas dpag kyang yod min/ /'di dang de ni 'brel pa dag nyams myong bar yang rigs pa dag/ /ba lang min sgra brjod bya ba/ /nyid du ji ltar go bar bya/ /gang la ba lang sgras 'bral ba/ /nyams
39b1(mdo 'grel): myong tshe na mthong ba min/ /ba lang rol po gcig nyid las/ /gang gzhan yin pa de thams cad/ /de bzhin gsal ba zhes byar brjod/ /spyi yi brjod byar mi 'gyur ro/ /grub kyang gsal bya glang min pa/ /ba lang dgag bdag nyid kyang de/ /dgag pa'i tshigs gis gang
39b2(mdo 'grel): 'gegs pa'i/ /ba lang de nyid 'dir smra dgos/ /ba lang min las log bdag de/ /zhe na gcig la gcig brten 'gyur/ /ba lang grub pa sel 'dod yin/ /zhe na sel par rtog pa brdzun/ /ba lang ma grub ba lang min/ /de med pa lang ga la yod/ /rten dang
39b3(mdo 'grel): brten par gnas la sogs/ /'brel pa'ang med pa dag la min/ /thun mong yin pa'i dngos po ni/ /sel ba yis ni go bya min/ /dngos po dang ni dngos med la/ /'brel pa ji ltar brtag bya yin/ /rang gi ngo bo med tsam gyis/ /cung zad bye brag byed 'gyur min/ /
39b4(mdo 'grel): rang blo gang gis bye brag tu/ /gsal bar bya ste bye brag ste/ /sta sogs sgra rnams las byung ba'i/ /sel ba rtogs byed ma yin no/ /'dir ni bye brag tu bya'i blo/ /bye brag ma gtogs la mi 'dod/ /gzhan gyi dngos las gzhan 'dra ba/ /byed min shes pa'i bye brag gi/
39b5(mdo 'grel): gzhan 'dra pa yi shes pa de/ /ji ltar bye brag tu brjod pa/ /'on te bye brag tu bya ba'ang/ /gzhan la bye brag tu rtog na/ /de lta yin na gang cung zad/ /thams cad bye brag tu thal 'gyur/ /med pa go cha'i ngo bo yis/ /dngos su bye brag bya ba med/ /de phyir sel bas bye brag tu/ /byas
39b6(mdo 'grel): dngos khyed la brjod bya min/ /gal te sel ba ma gtogs par/ /sgra dang rtags dag 'jug rigs na/ /de bzhin shes pa po'i blo yang/ /dngos po la ni dmigs par 'gyur/ /thun mong ma yin dngos po la/ /blo ni rnam gnas ma yin te/ /rnam rtog med pa nyid phyir yang/ /de
39b7(mdo 'grel): ni go byang rigs ma yin/ /sgra'i go bya'ang bye brag tu/ /bya ba yin zhes bsgrub par dka' / /des ni sgra dang blo dag gi/ /yul ni spyi yin par 'dod bya/ /gang tshe gsal ba rnams sgra yis/ /brjod bya min phyir gsal bya min/ /de tshe spyi ni gsal byed de/ /de na dngos nyid sel ba
40a1(mdo 'grel): yang/ /med pa rnams ni bsal bya min/ /med pa dor las med yin na/ /sel ba gzhan las sel ba ni/ /bsal phyir spyi ni dngos po yin/ /gang de med pa gang yin pa/ /med ba de dang mi 'dra na/ /dngos po nyid 'gyur min zhe na/ /ba lang ba lang
40a2(mdo 'grel): mi thal 'gyur/ /gal te 'ang sgra gzhan rnams la yang/ /dngos su bsal bya nyid 'gyur na/ /yod sgra med par brjod pa las/ /tha dad bsal bya 'dod pa min/ /de la med pa dngos nyid du/ /'gyur phyir ngal ba chen por 'gyur/ /de ma grub na yod mi 'grub//
40a3(mdo 'grel): grub na 'ang rab tu grub par 'gyur/ /bag chags dbye bas phye ba yis/ /yod pa'i dngos dang sel rnams su/ /rtog pa'i rigs pa ma yin te/ /dngos med nyid la bag chags med/ /khyed kyi sgra yi dbye ba yang/ /de yi rgyu mtshan ma mthong ste/ /thun mong min sgra
40a4(mdo 'grel): rjod byed nyid/ /ma yin sngar ma mthong phyir ro/ /de la sgra gzhan sel ba la/ /spyir ni kun tu rtog byed na/ /de bzhin dngos med ngo bo'i phyir/ /sgra yi dbye ba brtag pa min/ /tshig rnams ji lta de bzhin du/ /brjod bya rjod byed dag kyang ngo/ /bsal bya'i dbye ba tha dad pa/ /yod
40a5(mdo 'grel): par ston pa'ang ma yin zhing/ /sel pa go bya go byed du/ khyed kyi phyogs la mi 'gyur te/ /dngos po min phyir na mkha' yi/ /me tog ri bong rwa bzhin no/ /gal te char dang sprin med par/ /mthong bas ma nges pas smra na/ /kho bo'i phyogs la dngos yod nyid/ /khyed
40a6(mdo 'grel): phyogs gal te'ang ga la yod/ /'ga' zhig sgra yi don sgrub pa'i/ /ngo bor khas len mi byed ba/ /de la ldog pa'ang grub min te/ /de ni de sngon 'gro phyir ro/ /gal te yang ni sel ba tsam/ brjod bya nyid du khas len na/ /smra ba rnams la utpal sngo/ /sogs
40a7(mdo 'grel): sgras tshogs pa'i don du 'gyur/ /bye brag byed dang bye brag dag gzhi mthun pa dag mi 'grub ste/ /sngon po nyid min zhig pa na/ /utpa la min pa zhig pa min/ /cig shos kyang min de yi phyir/ /brjod bya la ni bltos min pa'i/ /sgra dag bye brag bya ba dang/ /bye
40b1(mdo 'grel): brag byed par 'gyur ba'ang min/ /sel pa dag ni gzhi mthun las/ /ma yin tha dad yin phyir ro/ /don de las 'dod min zhe na/ /brten pa de dag ji lta bur/ /thun mong min pa'i dngos po ni/ /go bya min gzhan khyed la med/ /go bya min pa'i don cig nyid/ /gang du sgra dag sbyor ba
40b2(mdo 'grel): byed/ /'on te 'ang gzhan sel ldan dngos po/ /brjod bya yin par smra ba na/ /de la'ang gzhan dbang yin pa'i phyir/ /sgra yis khyab pa rnyed par dka' / /rtags dang grangs sogs 'brel pa ni/ /sel ba la ni yod ma yin/ /gsal ba'ang brda bya ma yin phyir/ /de'i sgo nas kyang
40b3(mdo 'grel): de yod min/ /a k+Sha ta'ang gzhan las ni/ /log par kun tu shes pa med/ /ma yin par ni dgag bya ba'i/ /ngo bo de la yod ma yin/ /min pa min zhes smra ba yang/ /dgag pa yang ni 'gegs pa ste/ /'tshod byed ces pa mi dgag pa'ang/ /rang dngos nyid kyis gnas pa
40b4(mdo 'grel): yin/ /bsgrub bya nyid du shes pa dang/ /de bzhin byung gyur sogs mthong ba'ang/ /sel ba grub 'dir yin pa'i phyir/ /rgyu mtshan med par thal bar 'gyur/ /sgrub pa la sogs don sogs kyang/ /gzhan sel ba la mtho min pa/ /dag pa la yang dgag yod na/ /sel ba ci
40b5(mdo 'grel): 'drar 'gyur ba yin/ /dang la sogs pa'ang dgag pa dang/ /sbyor ba med phyir sel ba min/ /dag don las gzhan sel pa yang/ /smra bar nus pa ma yin no/ /gzhan sel min pa sgra la sogs/ /brjod byar mthong ba ma yin no/ /gzhal bya shes bya sogs la ni/ /bsal
40b6(mdo 'grel): bya nyid ni gang la yin/ /bsal byar bya 'di brtag 'di yang/ /dngos po nyid rtag yin na bzang/ /shes pa'i rnam pa bkag pas kyang/ /nang gi don ni brjod bya min/ /sel pa'ang min phyir de rnams la/ /sel ba yang ni grub pa min/ /de ltar sgra rnams la sogs ni/ /bsal bya
40b7(mdo 'grel): la ni mthong min no/ /thams cad sgra ni don gang gis/ /rnam par bcad byar rtog par byed/ /thams cad min pa cung zad kyang/ /med pas gang zhig bsal byar 'gyur/ /gcig sogs thams cad min zhe na/ /rang don sel bar thal bar 'gyur/ /cha shas rnams ni bkag
41a1(mdo 'grel): phyir yang/ /logs su cha shas can min 'dod/ /de bzhin bsdus pa'i sgra de rnams/ /bsdus pa can ni rnam bsal bas/ /gzhan rnams kun kyang mi 'dod pas/ /don med pa can thob par 'gyur/ /gnyis sogs sgra 'dir 'dod na yang/ /yang
41a2(mdo 'grel): dag bsdus pa'i spyod yul can/ /gcig la sogs pa bkag pa na/ /de lta'i rnam pa der mi 'gyur/ /ba lang min min sel ba gang/ /ba lang sgra yid don du brjod/ /de ci yod pa'am yang na med/ /yod na'ang ba 'am pa min yin/ /ba lang zhe na ming tsod yin/ /don du bsgrub
41a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /go bya'i brjod bya'i a go nyid/ /yin na sgra don shin tu mtshar/ /med la 'di yang mi rigs te/ /don la sbyor sogs med phyir ro/ /ba lang sgra las su zhig kyang ba med par go ba ma yin no/ /ba lang sgra don ba min pa/ /min na spyi phyir sel bar
41a4(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /gang gis ba lang ba min pa/ /bzhed cing gang gis bsal byar byed/ /ba lang sgra ni ba min pa'i/ /gang 'di'i sel don du smra na/ /de ci ba lang las gzhan pa 'am/ /gzhan pa min par khas len byed/ /tha dad na'ang 'dir brten ni/ /'gyur ba'am yang
41a5(mdo 'grel): na mi brten 'gyur/ /brten pa yin na yon tan nyid/ /thob kyi rdzas kyi tshigs yin no/ /de phyir ba lang zhes bya'i sgras/ /yon tan tsam zhig rjod byed pas/ /ba lang 'gro dang 'dug ces pa'i/ /gzhi mthun pa nyid du mi 'gyur/ /gang gis ba min dgag 
41a6(mdo 'grel): 'di la/ /ba lang zhes bya'i sgra rjod byed/ /'on te 'di ni tha dad par/ /min las gzhan srel bar khyed 'dod/ /de phyir 'dis ni ba lang nyid/ /thob phyir lhag pa ci zhig smras/ /dngos po re re'i sel ba 'di/ /gcig pa 'am yang na du mar 'gyur
41a7(mdo 'grel): gcig pa ba lang mang yod na/ /'di ni ba lang nyid du 'gyur/ /du ma nyid na'ang gong bu bzhin/ /mdza' yas par ni thal bar 'gyur/ /des na bye brag bzhin du 'di/ /brjod bya nyid du rigs pa min/ gzhan sel pa'am brjod bya 'am ci/ /brjod bya min
41b1(mdo 'grel): par 'dod pa yin/ /brjod bya'ang sgrub pa'i ngo bos sam/ /yang na gzhan ni 'gegs pa yin/ /sgrub pa'i bdag nyid brjod bya na/ /gcig tu lta ba btang ba yin/ /thams cad du yang gzhan sel 'di/ /sgra yi don ces smra ba na/ /gzhan sel min pa 'jig pa yis
41b2(mdo 'grel): gal te gzhan sel brjod bya ni/ /de la de bzhin du 'dod pas/ /thug pa med par khyed la 'gyur/ /'on te gzhan sel pa 'di nyid/ /brjod bya min par khyed 'dod na/ /des na khyed kyi gzhan sel byed/ /sgra yi tshig la gnod byed yin/ /gzhan yang gcig
41b3(mdo 'grel): nyid rtag pa nyid/ /so so la ni 'du ba nyid/ /dngos med par brjod sel rnams la/ /smra ba snal med snam bu bzhin/ /de phyir sgra gang kho na la/ /dgag sbyor de la gzhan las ni/ /ldog pa'i cha ni 'ba' zhig 'gyur/ /rang nyid gzhan du go byed yin/ /gzhan
41b4(mdo 'grel): sel yongs su ma shes phyir/ /de dag de lta'i lta ngan 'chang/ /ngan pa'i bdag nyid rang nyid 'joms/ /gzhan rnams kyang ni 'jig par byed/ /'di ltar sel ba rnam gnyis te/ /ma yin dgag dang med pa'o/ /ma yin dgag pa 'ang rnam gnyis te/ /blo dang
41b5(mdo 'grel): don gyi dbye bas so/ /gcig tu sngo bar byed pa yi/ /gtan tshigs sngar smras gang yin rnams/ /'jigs med la sogs don mtshungs pa/ /rang bzhin gyi gzhan las tha dad/ /der rten shes pa'i snang ba gang/ /don gyi gzugs brnyan rtog pa can/ /don
41b6(mdo 'grel): gyi bdag nyid min pa la/ /don zhes bya bar nges pa yin/ /snang ba gzhan las tha dad phyir/ /gzhan las log pa'i dngos po ni/ /thob pa'i rgyu las ma 'dres pa/ /dngos po'i sgo nas 'ongs pa ste/ /rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa/ /de 'bras gang
41b7(mdo 'grel): yin rang mtshan nyid/ /de la de yi bdag nyid du/ /des phyir 'di ni 'khrul pa yis/ /de la 'di ni gzhan sel ces/ /min du bstan pa rgyur bcas pa'o/ /gzhan dang ma 'dres par med pas/ /rang gi mtshan nyid kyang de'i rgyu/ /ba lang 'di la ba min
42a1(mdo 'grel): med/ /med par dgag pa nyid yin zhes/ /gzhan sel pa 'di rab bsal ba/ /kho nar shes par bya ba yin/ /de la 'di ni dang po yin/ /sel bar sgra las ldog pa ste/ /sgra las yang dag byung ba'i blo/ /phyi yi don du zhen pa'o/ /de
42a2(mdo 'grel): yi ngo bo gzugs brnyan gyi/ /sgro ni sgra las skye ba ste/ /brjod bya rjod byed dngos 'di ni/ /rgyu 'bras bdag nyid can grub pa'o/ /dngos kyi rnam pa gcig nyid la/ /de ltar rab tu bsgrubs pa yi/ /shugs kyis med par dgag pa yang/ /rab tu rtogs
42a3(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ba yang/ /de yi bdag nyid gzhan bdag nyid/ /ming zhing 'brel yod dngos rnams ni/ /ldog pa'i dngos po rtogs pa yang/ /don gyis go 'gyur de yi phyir/ /de nyid kyis na sgra 'di yang/ /rang gi don du brtags pa yin/ /sgra 'di
42a4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis dngos su min/ /sel ba rnam pa gnyis bstan na/ /don gzhan rnam par gcod par ni/ /byed pa sgrar ni brjod pa yin/ /rang don mngon par rjod byed pa/ /zhes bya de ni 'gal ba yin/ /phyi yi don du zhen pa yis/ /'jug pa gang las
42a5(mdo 'grel): rnam rtog gi/ gzugs brnyan 'di ni skyed byed pa/ /de yis brjod ces bstan pa yin/ /rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid/ /dbyer med pa la 'di reg min/ /de tsam cha las log pa las/ /gzhan ni brjod par bya ba min/ /gzugs
42a6(mdo 'grel): brnyan de ni rtogs pa yi/ /shugs kyis gzhan dang ma 'dres pa/ /'di ni rtogs 'gyur gang gi phyir/ /'di gzhan bdag ni min phyir ro/ /nyin mo'i bza' pa'i tshig sogs bzhin/ /'di yi 'bras buAng gnyis yin te/ /dngos su ba dang shugs
42a7(mdo 'grel): kyis te/ /gang phyir rjes 'gro ldog par ldan/ /de phyir sgra ni dngos po rnams/ /rang don rjod par byed pa dang/ /gzhan las kyang ni ldog pa yang/ /gnyis ka gtso bor byed ma yin/ /so sor snang ba'ang de 'dra ba/ /spyi de ba lang nyid du 'dod/ /ba lang khra
42b1(mdo 'grel): ba sogs kun la/ /mtshungs pa nyid du nges phyir ro/ /dngos po'i snyam pa'i zhe na pa las/ /de la dngos po zhes kyang brjod/ /shes pa de ni blo bur du/ /rang sa bon las 'khrul pa skye/ /de yi rnam pa de nyid kyi/ /sgra yi don khas len par brjod/ /
42b2(mdo 'grel): spyi yi dngos po ngo bor yang/ /de ltar 'khrul pas nges pa yin/ /spyi ni dngos po dngos nyid du/ /dam pa'i don du rigs ma yin/ /blo las tha dad min ngo bo/ /ji ltar don gzhan las 'ongs yin/ /gal te 'ang tha dad min pa 'di/ /blo yi rnam pa'i ngo bo
42b3(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de ltar phyi yi dngos nyid du/ /'khrul pas de ni nges pa yin/ /de ni don min mi bltos nyid/ /de na brgyud pas 'ongs pa yin/ /des na bdag nyid dngos po nyid/ /yod nyid min par bstan pa yin/ /gzugs brnyan bdag nyid can sel ba/ /tshig las
42b4(mdo 'grel): kyang ni skyes pa ste/ /so sor snang brjod blo bur bzhin/ /kho bo cag la tshig don 'di/ /rang gi ngo bor grub tsam las/ /gzhan gyi cha ni de 'dzin yin/ /blo gzhan rnam par gcod byed pa/ /des na blo ni shes byas te/ /ji ltar yod pa min pa nyid/ /dam pa'i
42b5(mdo 'grel): don du tha dad min/ /tha dad min pa'ang de bzhin zhes/ /gang gis rnam grangs nyid du 'gyur/ /tha dad min pa'ang gcig dngos nyid/ /dngos med la de? ga la yod/ /don gcig nyid du rjod byed pas/ /rnam grangs pa ni thob par 'gyur/ /med pa'i ngo bo'ang gcig
42b6(mdo 'grel): nyid/ /rtog las sul ba ji bzhin du/ /tha dad pa'ang de bzhin no/ /de las rnam grangs ga la yin/ /rjod byed la ni dngos su pa'i/ /rnam grangs gnyis min pa'ang med/ /brjod bya'ang de rnams la med par/ /rnam pa du mar bstan pa yin/ /'on kyang du ma'ang bya
42b7(mdo 'grel): pa gcig /gal te byed par mthong ba na/ /de la chos gcig tu sgro btags/ /sna gcig kyang ni 'jug pa yin/ /dper na mig sogs 'ga' zhig tu/ /gzugs kyi rnam shes gcig 'bras byed/ /gcig pa'i dngos nyid med na yang/ /'ga' dag sgra sog sgra gcig
43a1(mdo 'grel): byed/ /bum sogs chu sogs 'dzin la sogs/ /bya ba gang yin byed pa na/ /yul de'i shes pa gang yin pa/ /gal te'ang tha dad pa de gnyis/ /gcig tu sre bar byed pa yi/ /chu nyid yin phyir gcig ces brjod/ /shes pa bzhin du 'ang de
43a2(mdo 'grel): yi rgyu/ /yin phyir don la dbye ba med/ /de la spyi yi tshigs gis ni/ /bum pa la sogs brjod pa'i sgra/ /rigs mi 'dra ba rnam gcod pa/ /gzugs brnyan gcig gi rgyu rnams so/ /de bzhin gcig nyid don du ma'i/ /byed? phyir du ma zhes brjod de/ /de 'bras min pa las
43a3(mdo 'grel): ldog pas/ /mang po nyid du yongs su btags pa'o/ /dper na thogs pa dang bcas gzugs/ /bstan du yod pa yin na yang/ /dper na sgra ni brtsal ma thag 'byung ba'i shes dang mnyan bya yin/ /de rgyu min pa'i dbye ba yis/ /kha cig la sgra 'jug pa yin
43a4(mdo 'grel): dper na brtsal las 'byung sgra dang/ /dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi yang/ /de 'bras rgyu dang bral ba las/ /kha cig la 'dir sgra zhes brjod/ /mnyan bya min dper gzugs bzhin dang/ /ma brtsal par 'byung glog bzhin no/ /de lta bu sogs dbye ba yis/ /tha
43a5(mdo 'grel): dad don gyi rgyu mtshan ni/ /ldog pa rnams las brtag bya ste/ /de bzhin de la brten pa'i sgra/ /de bzhin brda nyid de yi phyir/ /ma 'dres don du brjod bya yin/ /sgra rnams tha dad par 'jug la/ /nga la rnam grangs 'gyur ma yin/ /mang dang nyung ba'i yul rnams kyis//
43a6(mdo 'grel): brda de yin rjes 'brangs nas/ /spyi dang bye brag gis brjod bya/ /de rnams la yang 'gal ba med/ /don de rnams kyi ldog pa rnams/ /rnam rtog bzo yis sprul pa de/ /rten dang bsal bya'i dbye ba yis/ /phye ba don dam par yod min/ /phyi yi dngos nyid de rnams ni/ /
43a7(mdo 'grel): btags pa yin gyi dngos su min/ /dbye dang dbye min dngos po la/ /de kho na nyid kyis gnas min/ /rang sa bon gyi du ma las/ /bral pa'i dngos po'i brda rnams kyis/ /nus pa'i rnam rtogs gis dbye ba/ /de yi ngo bor nges pa yin/ /rang gi mtshan nyid bdag nyid de na/ /gcig gi
43b1(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid du min zhing/ /dum bur byed pa'ang ma yin gyi/ /'di ni rnam rtog 'khrul pa'o/ /chos gcig rjes 'gro med par yang/ /bsal bya dang ni sel ba'i yul/ /mtshan nyid mi 'drar rtogs min pa/ /dbye ba med par bsre bas so/ /gcig tu bsre ba shes pa ni/ /rang
43b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin gyis kyang tha dad pa'ang/ /kha cig la ni sbyor ba yin/ /gzhan pa min zhes pa min zhes bsgrubs pa yin/ /de min ngo bo las bzlog pa'i/ /dngos po tsam gyi rang mtshan nyid/ /gang yin des ni byas pa yi/ /rjes su 'gro ba 'gal ba med/ /gang na du ba men pa las/ /ldog pa'i
43b3(mdo 'grel): rang gi mtshan nyid yod/ /de na me med las ldog pa/ /rang gi mtshan nyid yod pa'o/ /dper na tshad? bang? bzhin 'di la/ /du ba min las log yod pa/ /de phyir me min las ldog pa/ /'di na yod pa rang mtshan nyid/ /mi yi rwa sogs med pa las ldog pa gang yin rang mtshan nyid
43b4(mdo 'grel): de kun bstan pa las kyang ldog/ blo dang mar me lta bu'o/ /de bzhin sgra sogs rang mtshan nyid/ /med pa'i ngo bo 'di yang med min/ /de ltar dbye bas ma bstan/ /de ltar rjes 'gror 'gyur nyid yin/ /dbye ba brjod 'dod min pa yang/ /de nyid ces ni yongs su bsgrags/ /spyi yi mtshan
43b5(mdo 'grel): nyid nyid kyis ni/ /gzhan min min 'dod phyir yang ngo/ /khra mo'i bu las tha dad par/ /ser skya'i bu dang rtar mtshungs na/ /mur 'gro yongs su dor nas ni/ /ba lang nyid la ci phyir 'jug/ de gsal byed par nus pa dag nyid/ /gal te de nyid yin 'dod na/ /bsre bar mtshungs pa
43b6(mdo 'grel): yin no yang/ /nus pa de ni rta yi min/ /de lta bu yi sre ba yang/ /dngos po gang la yod 'gyur pa/ /de la ba lang rigs med kyang/ /ba lang min pa sel ba 'jug/ /ba lang min las ldog dngos gang/ /de ni dbang pos des par byed/ /gzugs brnyan du ni nges pa ste/ /rang rig pas
43b7(mdo 'grel): ni rtogs pa'ang yin/ /'di mthong bas ni 'jig rten pa/ /de la sgra ni sbyar bar byed/ /'brel pa nyams su myong ba la'ang/ /des na 'di gsal byed par rigs/ /de lta bu yi bse? ba yang/ /dngos po gang la med gyur pas/ /ba lang min sgra brjod bya nyid/ /de ni gsal?
44a1(mdo 'grel): bar rtogs byed yin/ /so so'i bsre ba shes pa yis/ /ba lang ba lang min pa'ang 'grub/ /gcig pur grub pa'i sku nyid ni/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin de sbyor byed/ /dngos po'i dbye ba rig pa ni/ /gzhan 'dzin pa la bltos min par
44a2(mdo 'grel): de phyir gcig la gcig brten pa'i/ /skyon ni 'di la gnas med do/ /phyi yi de nyid ma shes pa'ang/ /rang bzhin nyid la rmongs phyir 'di/ /rang rnam pa la phyi'i ngo bor/ /sgra dang blo ni nges par byed/ /sgras ni de tsam du byed kyi/ /don la sgra ni rig pa'ang
44a3(mdo 'grel): min/ /bye brag can gyi don ni 'ga' / /sel bas brjod par bya ba min/ /don gzhan las ni ldog pa la/ /bye brag can ni yin zhes kyang/ /mtshan nyid mdzad pas gang gsungs pa/ /de la brjod 'dod don 'di yin/ /gzhan las gzhan pa'i dngos
44a4(mdo 'grel): gang yin/ /rgyu yis sam ni byed pa yis/ /bye brag can de tha dad pas/ /rigs dang ma 'dres par 'dres par/ /shing sogs sgra des brjod pa yis/ /zhes pa de ni skyes pa las/ /rigs la sogs pa de 'gog byed/ /gang zhig blo la rnam
44a5(mdo 'grel): gnas pa/ /de rnams 'dir rjod skyed byed phyir/ /ldog pa yin ni bye brag can/ /de rnams 'das pa thag bstan pa'o/ /don la gzhan las ldog pa yis/ /dngos po de yi cha 'ga' ni/ /rtogs pa yin zhes gang gsungs pa/ /de ni gzugs brnyan
44a6(mdo 'grel): nyid yin te/ /don gzhan las ni ldog pa yi/ /dngos po mthong ba la brten nas/ /'ongs pa de la sgro btags nas/ /de yi cha zhes bstan pa yin/ /rgyu yi don dang byed pa'i don/ /des na sngar bzhin bdag nyid kyang/ /gal te dngos rigs mi 'dra las/ /ldog dang de dang
44a7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du/ /ba lang min las ldog gzhan nyid/ /de yang bdag nyid la yod de'o/ /ldog par brjod pa'ang med pa nyid/ /'ba' zhig las ni ldog min te/ /de ni bye brag dngos las kyang/ /yin phyir dngos po'i blo mi nyams/ /dbye bar bye brag byed 'di yang//
44b1(mdo 'grel): rnam par rtog pas sprul pa ste/ /de phyir chos 'di nyer 'dzin pas/ /bye brag ldan zhing bzhag pa yin/ /des na de ni dbyig sogs bzhin/ /bye brag byed par skye ba ste/ /so sor snang ba'i sgra yi don/ /de nyid sems pa pos bstan to/ /mthong dang rnam rtog dbye mi shes/
44b2(mdo 'grel): 'jigs? khyi'o snyam du sems/ /de phyir 'di ni zhen pa las/ /gsal ba rnams ni brjod byar byed/ /de nyid don du sgra rnams kyang/ /brjod bya min par bsgrubs zin to/ /'dis sgra'i brjod bya yin pa'i phyir/ /gsal ba rnams kyang gsal bya nyid/ /spyi ni sel pa nyid kyang
44b3(mdo 'grel): dngos po min/ /med la med nyid bsal kyang zhes/ /de ltar byed min 'di dngos phyir/ /dngos ni de bdag min pa'i phyir/ /de ni bsal bya nyid 'dod gang/ /gang zhig de yi bdag nyid min/ /de ni de yi bsal byar brjod/ /yod pa med pa'i dngos yin pas/ /de'i sel
44b4(mdo 'grel): dngos po med ma yin/ /rang bzhin dbang phyug sogs rnams kyi/ /dngos rnams bskyed bya min smra ba/ /rang bzhin dbang phyug sogs bskyed byar/ /dgos po grub pa ma yin no/ /de phyir med pa'ang dngos po nyid/ /min phyir ngal ba ga la yin/ /de grub na yang yod pa yod?/ /des
44b5(mdo 'grel): kyang med pa grub pa yin/ /ba lang min las ldog pa yi/ /ba lang mtshan nyid mi 'drar 'dod/ /de phyir dngos nyid ba lang 'di/ /de la ba min thal 'gyur min/ /dngos med yul la dang sems tsam gyis/ /sprul pa'i rnam rtog sna tshogs pa'i/ /dbye
44b6(mdo 'grel): bas sbyar ba rnams la bzhin/ /bag chags yod pa nyid yin no/ /des na 'ang bag chags dbye ba yis/ /phye ba 'am yod pa'i dngos nyid du 'ang/ /rtog par byed cing sel ba rnams/ /rtog pas sbyar ba rnams bzhin no/ /don gzhan sel ba'i brjod bya 'di/ /ji 'dra
44b7(mdo 'grel): ba ni bstan zin cing/ /sgra gzhan gyi ni sel ba yang/ /de 'dra nyid du rtogs bya min/ /dngos po nyid du nges pa'i phyir/ /sel pa dag ni dngos nyid min/ /kun rdzob lam du rab grub phyir/ /de nyid don du 'dod bsgrub yin/ /dam pa'i don du brjod bya dang/ /rjod byed
45a1(mdo 'grel): cung zad kyang yod min/ /skad cig gis 'jig dngos rnams la/ /khyab par byed pa sbyor ba min/ /de la go bya go byed nyid/ /de nyid don la brten nas ni/ /sel ba dag gi dngos nyid min/ /kun rdzob pa ni 'gags she na/ /de lta na
45a2(mdo 'grel): yang 'khrul pa nyid/ /bzlog par dka' ba thal bar 'gyur/ /rtog pas sbyar ba'i don dang ni/ /de rjod byed pa'i sgra dag kyang/ /de rnams la spyi brjod bya dang/ /de yi rjod byed yod ma yin/ /sgra yi rang gi mtshan nyid ni/ /skad cig gis 'jig rjod byed min/ /de
45a3(mdo 'grel): phyir de gnyis gzugs brnyan rdzogs/ /kun rdzob par ni 'dod par bya/ /gsal par dga' ba gnas pa yin/ /bsgrub pa'i ngo bo'i sgra yi don/ /gang gis khas len par mi byed/ /gang tshe sgra las shes pa ni/ /skyes pa'i don du zhen pa ste/ /sgra rnam
45a4(mdo 'grel): rang rjod byed pa yi/ /shugs kyis gzhan las ldog pa yin/ /de sngon 'gro ba can gyi ni/ /ldog pa 'di yang rigs pa yin/ /sgrub pa yod min gang gsungs pa/ /spyi la sogs pa med phyir te/ /sgra rnams dang ni rnam rtog rnams/ /dngos su yul med nyid
45a5(mdo 'grel): phyir ro/ /utpal sngon po sogs sgra las/ /gcig nyid kun tu snang ba ste/ /sngon min utpal min sogs las/ /ldog pa yin gzugs brnyan no/ /gzhan sel pa dang ldan dngos so/ /brjod byar kho bo cag 'dod de/ /gzhan las ldog pa'i dngos
45a6(mdo 'grel): po las/ /gzhan pa'i ldog pa'i de la med/ /de phyir rigs pa sogs bzhin pa'i/ /gzhan dbang skyon dang 'brel pa med/ /blo gros bzang pos gsungs pa ni/ /sgra don logs pa min pas mi/ bye brag byed dang bye brag tu/ /bya ba bzhin mthun
45a7(mdo 'grel): pa nyid de/ /de phyir sel ba sgra yi don/ /rnam par gnas pa 'gal ba med/ /sngon po'i sgra sogs 'ba' zhig kyang/ /gzugs brnyan bye brag can yin te/ khu byug utpal bung ba sogs/ /yid gnyis bcas bzhin 'jug pa ste/ /si ka stang zil
45b1(mdo 'grel): sogs sel bas/ /bye brag can gyi yul la yang/ /de ni utpal yi sgra/ /rnam par bzhag par nges pa dang/ /gnas gzhi mthun pa la sogs pa/ /de ltar 'dir ni bsgrubs pas na/ /rnam gzhag de kun pha rol po'i/ /phyogs la bsgrub par dka' ba yin/ /'di
45b2(mdo 'grel): ltar sgra gcig gis rang gi/ mtshan nyid thams cad du bstan la/ /de skad bstan pa de la yang/ /ci phyir bye brag gzhan blo med/ /gang gi don du phyi ma'i sgra/ /sbyor byed dngos po de la ni/ /thang du brjod min zhe na/ /de ni du mar thal par 'gyur/ /sngon po'i rigs ma
45b3(mdo 'grel): yon tan nam/ /sngon po'i sgra yis rtogs she na/ /gzhan la utpal yi rigs/ /utpal sgra yi des pa yin/ /de ltar de dag dbye ba yis/ /ba kul utpal sgra bzhin du/ /bzhi mthun pa la sogs pa rnams/ /shin tu 'thad pa ma yin no/ /yon
45b4(mdo 'grel): tan de rigs dang 'brel pa'i/ /rdzas ni sngon po'i sgra rtogs pa/ /yin no zhe na de lta na/ /utpa la'i sgra don med 'gyur/ /de dag gang kho na dang 'brel/ /de nyid utpal rigs ldan na/ /sngon po'i sgra nyid kyis te bstan/ /utpa la'i sgra don med 'gyur/ /yon tan
45b5(mdo 'grel): de'i rigs 'brel las gzhan/ /utpal rigs ldan yin zhe na/ /utpal dang sngon po'i sgra/ /gzhan gzhi tha dad par 'gyur ro/ /'on te utpa la nyid dang/ /'brel pa'i ngo bo nyid dang ni/ /yon tan de'i rigs dang 'brel rdzas/ /sngon po'i sgra yis mi ston
45b6(mdo 'grel): na'o/ /utpal dang 'brel ngo bo nyid/ /de bdag min par 'gyur na yang/ /gang zhig utpal nyid 'brel pa/ /de gnyis dang 'brel kho na ste/ /sngon po'i sgra yis de brjod pa'i/ /sgra yi shes pa'i yul du ni/ /bdag nyid kun de cha shas min/ /utpal sgra de
45b7(mdo 'grel): don med yin/ /cha shas las ni grol ba la/ /zas dang cha shas rnam rtog med/ /dag don yongs su ma shes phyir/ /'dir ni 'di dag brjod 'dod yin/ /dang po'i sgra nyid kho na yis/ /de ni thams cad du gsal byas/ /bdag nyid ci yang ma dor bar/ /ji 'dra de 'drar de
46a1(mdo 'grel): bstan te/ /rnam grangs de dag nyid kyis ni/ /de la sgra gzhan dag gis yang/ /brjod la 'bras bu yod min la/ /brjod na 'bras bu nyid du des/ /kho bo cag ni sgra rnams kyis/ /phyi'i don rtogs byar mi 'dod de/ /sgra dang rnams shes dag gi yang/
46a2(mdo 'grel): yul ni phyi yi don min no/ /gang phyir de dag thams cad kyi/ /bdag nyid yul byed las gzhan pa'i/ /sgra dang shes pa gzhan der ni/ /rnam grangs pa nyid thob par 'gyur/ /sgra las rnam rtog gzugs brnyan nyid/ /rim gyis skyed par byed pa yin/ /gcig
46a3(mdo 'grel): nyid de ltar snang ba la/ /phyi yi nyid du 'ang 'khrul phyir ro/ /gzugs brnyan la ni brten nas su/ /gzhi mthun pa nyid sogs yin gyi/ /dam pa'i don du sgra 'di ni/ /yul dang bral bar 'dod pa yin/ /rtags dang grangs sogs sbyor ba 'di/ /gsal ba rnams la
46a4(mdo 'grel): 'ang yod ma yin/ /'dod pas sbyar ba'i brda dag gis/ /sprul pa yin gyi dngos la min/ /mo dang pho dang ma ning gi /rtags gsum dngos po la yod min de la sems de thams cad kyi/ /sna tshogs par snang nyid du 'gyur/ /brjod 'dod rjes 'jug nyid de
46a5(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /de yi dbang gis gcig dngos ni/ /gcig dngos nyid duAng dngos su min/ /gal te gnas pa dang skye dang/ /'jig la brten nas rtags rnams ni/ /gnas pa yin na rtags gsum nyid/ /dper med par ni thal 'gyur zhing/ /yod pa min par?
46a6(mdo 'grel): med pa dang/ /rang gzhan med dang gso ba nyid ces/ /gang smra de la gnas pa sogs/ /'brel par ci phyir rtog par byed/ /dngos 'di rnams kyi skye ba ni/ /rab tu 'byung yin 'jig pa ni/ /nyams pa nyid de gnas pa ni/ /rang dngos grub par brjod bya
46a7(mdo 'grel): stod/ /de la skye ba 'jig min pa/ /de la ci yi skye bar brjod/ /gnas la 'brel pa yod min na/ /de la skye ba ji ltar brjod/ /'jig la gnyis yod brjod min na/ /'jig pa'i dngos dang nyams pa dang/ /zhig pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba/ /de la ji ltar ston par byed
