91a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /'brel pa ma rtogs las rgyu gzhan/ /'dir shes pa la yod pa min/ /de bzhin dbang po dang mtshungs pa/ /tha snyad la ni dmigs pa ni/ /gang dag la yod de dag des/ /don rtogs gzhan min long ba bzhin/ /mi shes
91a6(mdo 'grel): pa ni thams cad la/ /snga ma snga ma'i grags pa yis/ /'brel pa grub ces de bzhin du/ /'brel pa thog ma med pa yun/ /zlos nas brjod par 'jug pa ni/ /mi rigs tha snyad yod phyir ro/ /'byin pa'i dang por byar med de/ /de 'dra'i dus
91a7(mdo 'grel): ni 'dod pa yin/ /'gro ba thams cad re 'ga' yang/ /mi 'dra bar ni 'dod pa min/ /rab tu thim pa chen po zhes/ /don dam par ni rtogs 'gyur min/ /mtshan mor ba thim zhes bya yin/ /las kun thim pa nyid kyi phyir/ /nyin
91b1(mdo 'grel): mo 'byin pa zhes bya ste/ /las rnams kun ni 'jug pa yin/ /yang na yul zhig rig rgyud ni/ /chad pa'i ngo bor rab thim yin/ /thams cad chad pa'i bdag nyid kyi/ /thim pa'i tshad ma bdag la med/ /dran pa ma nyams pa 'ga' zhig/ /'byin
91b2(mdo 'grel): dang bsdu ba'i byed po na/ /dbang phyug la sogs brtan rigs min/ /gang gis 'brel pa rtog par byed/ /go rims mi rtag pa nyid kyis/ /rjod byed mi rtag 'gyur min nam/ /tshig ni rjod byed 'dod pa ste/ /rim pa la ni rig las blo/ /kun 'gro
91b3(mdo 'grel): nyid phyir khyed la ni/ /rang nyid kyis yin rim ldan min/ /mi rtag sgra tsam gyis 'bras phyir/ /des na rim pa 'jig pa yin/ /de yi brjod 'dod dbang gis ni/ /skyes bu la de rag las 'gyur/ /des na yi ge rtag pa nyid/ /khyed la 'bras bu
91b4(mdo 'grel): med par 'gyur/ /rim pa med pa'i yi ge ni/ /ston par byed par shes 'gyur min/ /khyed la rim pa tshig nyid de/ /de phyir de ltar thal bar 'gyur/ /gang dag rim pa dang bral dang/ /yi ge dang bral tshig yin te/ /de dag la ni sgra rtag nyid//
91b5(mdo 'grel): rtogs pa de ni don dang ldan/ /re zhig go rims nyid tshig tu/ /bdag cag la ni thal 'gyur min/ /gang gis dngos po gzhan rten pa/ /de ni gsal byed mthong 'gyur min/ /de dag la ni chos tsam 'di/ /dngos po gzhan du mi 'dod
91b6(mdo 'grel): do/ /des na 'di ltar rtogs pa na/ /yi ge rnams ni go byed 'gyur/ /rim pa 'bras bu nyid min te/ /sngar grub yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir/ /smra bo 'ga' zhig rang dbang gis/ /rim pa shes par 'gyur min te/ /ji ltar gzhan dag
91b7(mdo 'grel): gis brjod pa/ /de ltar 'dir ni brjod par 'dod/ /gzhan yang de ltar nges na yang/ /'brel pa bzhin 'di thog ma med/ /des na brtser gnas brtan min yang/ /tha snyad du ni de rten yin/ /skyes bu rnams kyi rang dbang nyid/ /kho bos 'bad
92a1(mdo 'grel): pas bkag pa yin/ /'o na yi ge rnams kyis ni/ /brtser gnas brtan min de ltar grub/ /yi ge rtag pa yod yin na/ /tha snyad las ni rim par byung/ /rdul phran rtag pa yod na ni/ /ji ltar bum sogs la bkod yin/ /
92a2(mdo 'grel): de med rtsa ba med pa yis/ /bkod pa'i nges par bzung ba yin/ /gzhan gyis brjod pas bdag gis brjod/ /brjod 'dod de 'dra nges par 'gyur/ /de lta na yang brtan nyid 'gyur/ /tshad ma gzhan ni khyod la med/ /ji ltar rigs kyi bum
92a3(mdo 'grel): sogs kyi/ /tha snyad nye bar mtshon pa yin/ /de bzhin go rims la sogs pa'i/ /tha snyad rigs kyi sgo nas grub/ /ro zhig rkan la sogs pa'i rigs/ /skyes bu thams cad la gnas 'gyur/ /smra bo de dag rnams kyis ni/ /sgra tsam mtshan
92a4(mdo 'grel): nas bskul bar byed/ /ji srid yid yid sgra tsam gyis/ /rigs tha dad pa sgra la ni/ /mngon par gsal ba ni rgyud 'jug pa'am/ /yang na gsal ba de ldan yin/ /de la rkan sogs ldan pa dang/ /rnam dbye'i rim pa sngon 'gro can/ /sgra tsam
92a5(mdo 'grel): rnams la go rims 'gyur/ /rigs kyis gnyis ka'i rtag nyid kyang/ /ji ltar bskor ba sogs rnams kyi/ /dbye rigs sogs kyis mtshan byas pa/ /rim pa'i rjes dran 'gyur de ltar/ /rkan sogs sgra tsam yig rten yin//
92a6(mdo 'grel): phra ba nyid phyir gsal rnams la/ /rigs kyis chos ni nges gzung yin/ /de yi dbang gis yig rnams la/ /khyab nyid yin yang rim par 'dzin/ /da ltar sgra tsam gyis yon tan/ /thams cad rtag nyid du gnas pa/ /yi ge'i
92a7(mdo 'grel): rjes su byed pas na/ /don gyi dbye ba rtogs par 'gyur/ /yi ge rnams kyi go rims dang/ /thung dang ring dang ches rang gang/ /sgra tsam khyad par can dus kyi/ /rnam dbye de dag shes par 'gyur/ /dus ni gcig yin khyab cing rtag/
92b1(mdo 'grel): rab tu dbye ba'ang rtog par 'gyur/ /dngos po kun la yi ge bzhin/ /la lar 'ga' zhig gis gsal byas/ /yi ge rnams la gsal 'gyur na/ /de ni don rtogs yan lag 'gyur/ /gzhan du yang ni yod pa'i phyir/ /de'i rang bzhin rtag nyid yin//
92b2(mdo 'grel): de phyir dga' zhig 'jig de 'dra/ /tshig gi chos ni yod pa yin/ /des na yi ge rtag smra la/ /tshig rtag nyid du grub pa yin/ /gzhan gyi chos kyang yan lag nyid/ /rta yi shugs sogs bzhin du brjod/ /sgra kun rtag pa nyid yin/ /don gyis go
92b3(mdo 'grel): ba tshad ma yin/ /sgra ni mi rtag nyid sgrub na/ /rang gi tshig la sogs dang 'gal/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i don rtogs phyir/ /dam bca' thams cad brjod pa yin/ /mi rtag na de rang gi don/ /smra nus min zhes dpyad zin te/ des na don rtogs
92b4(mdo 'grel): pas grub phyir/ /rtag nyid ces byas gnod par 'gyur/ /don gyis rjod byed nus par na/ /khas blangs byas nas bsgrub pa na/ /sngar ni khas blangs byas pas kyang/ /gzhan gyis 'jig nyid la gnod 'gyur/ /bstan bcos so so la
92b5(mdo 'grel): brtan pa'i/ /don rtogs nus pa rnams kyis ni/ /'jig pa nyid du smra kun la/ /lung gis kyang ni gnod par 'gyur/ /sngar bshad pa kyi phyogs kyis ni/ /'jig rten kun la grags pas gnod/ /sngar bshad gtan tshigs kho na yis
92b6(mdo 'grel): rjes dpag dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur/ /rna ba las skyes ngo shes pas/ /sgra ni rtag par nges byas phyir/ /mngon sum gyis kyang 'gal ba nyid/ /snga ma kho nar gtan zin to/ /'jig pa nyid du sgrub pa yis/ /sgra de gang yin zhes
92b7(mdo 'grel): brjod dgos/ /yon tan gsum ma ma de gang zag /kho bo 'am yang mkha' i yon tan/ /'on te yig gzhan sgra bdag nyid/ /yang na brjod min rlung ngo bo/ /tshig dag bdag nyid gsal ba'am/ /yang na 'dra nyid gzhan sel yin
93a1(mdo 'grel): de rnams mi rtag nyid yod mod/ /kho bo'i de rtag nyid mi 'dod/ /ma grub khyad par nyid dang na/ /gzhi ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs 'gyur/ /'on te bdag 'dod phyogs khyod 'dod/ /rang nyid kyis ni de gnyis 'gyur/ /
93a2(mdo 'grel): 'on te sgra tsam mi rtag brjod/ /de yin sgra yin khyed cag la/ /mi rtag yin bas kun gyis ni/ /de yang rtag par 'dod dang 'gal?/ /gal te shin tu 'jig nyid du/ /mi rtag nyid du brjod pa ni/ /de yis khyad par mi grub pa'i/ /phyogs 'gyur
93a3(mdo 'grel): kho po la ni yin/ /gal te ji zhig ltar 'dod pas/ /rtag pa 'di ni brjod pa na/ /mngon par mi gsal gnas skabs las/ /de ni mngon gsal bdag nyid 'dod/ /dbang po 'ga' zhig gis bzang nyid/ /gtan tshigs su ni 'dir rtog
93a4(mdo 'grel): bsgrub par byas pa'i rigs kyis ni/ /da ltar 'khrul par rtogs par 'gyur/ /phyogs kyi chos nyid ma grub na/ /ji ltar phyir rgol ba la ni/ /gtan tshigs brjod par mi 'thad de/ /de bzhin rjes 'gro ldog pa yang/ /gal te der
93a5(mdo 'grel): bsgrubs smra ba la/ /rigs grub ma gyur de lta na'ang/ /ji srid de ni btsal ma byas/ /de srid gtan tshigs nyid 'gyur min/ /dbang po las byung nyid sogs la'ang/ /dngos po ji ltar yin dpyad bya/ /gsal las gzhan pa'am
93a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin nyid min/ /tha dad tha mi dad gsal dpyad/ /de la thun mong ming ma grub/ /mthun phyogs bsgrub par bya dang bral/ /smra ba po la ltos nas ni/ /rnam par brtag pa'i rjes 'brangs brjod/ /btsal ma thag byung shes pa ni//
93a7(mdo 'grel): byas dang mi rtag sgrub pa gang/ /skad cig ma ni ldog pa yis/ /so sor brtags dang mi brtags pa'i/ /'gog dang nam mkha' dang gsum 'os/ /de ni ma nges pa nyid yin/ /blo ni sngon song 'jig pa la/ /sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa'i/
93b1(mdo 'grel): blo/ /blo ni sngon du ma song ba'i/ /'gog pa sor ma brtags yin/ /'jig nyid phyir na de dag gnyis/ /ma byas par yang mthong ba yin/ /rang bzhin gyis grub 'jig pa yis/ /rgyu med ces ni de dag smra/ /me dang 'brel pas shing las ni/ /sol ba'i rgyu ni 'byung bar 'gyur/
93b2(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin las 'byung 'jig pa ni/ /skyes ma thag pa tsam du gnas/ /phra zhing 'dra ba'i rgyun 'jug phyir/ /nye bar mtshon par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang tshe mi mthun pa yi rgyu/ /'dra ba'i rgyun la bsnun pa na/ /mi mthun pa yi 'bras bu yis/ /de tshe rags par mngon gsal
93b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /des na rgyu las mi mthun rgyun/ /gang phyir skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de nyid kyis ni ma byas na'ang/ /'jig pa nges par gsal bar 'gyur/ /de ni tho bas bsnun sogs pa'i/ /btsal ma thag tu 'byung ba yin/ /gang phyir ma byas par ni snang/ /des
93b4(mdo 'grel): na gtan tshigs 'khrul pa yin/ /nam mkha' yang mi rtag yin na/ /gang tsha sa dang chus gang ba/ /sa brkos chu ni 'chu sogs kyis/ /de bsal bas na bsil bar 'gyur/ /de tshe btsal ma thag byung zhes/ /de la yang ni snang bar 'gyur/ /de phyir dang shes
93b5(mdo 'grel): gang brjod pa/ /gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin/ /'dir mthun phyogs kyang brtag bya ste/ /thos pa'i don ni bsgrub bya med/ /gsal ba'i mtshan nyid phyogs yin yang/ /rigs dang gzhan nyid gzhan min dpyad/ /gzhan yang chos can bdag ma grub/
93b6(mdo 'grel): de nyid chos can gzhan ma grub/ /khyad par med na mi rtag dang/ /rtag dngos de dag la mi 'grub/ /'di la rigs zhes kha cig brtag/ /cig shes 'jig pa du ni 'dod/ /'dres pa'i ngo bo gcig yin zhes/ /dngos po star ni bstan zin to/ /de ltar ma
93b7(mdo 'grel): rtag? la dpyad bya/ /'jig pa bdag cag pas byas stong/ /gzhan min khyed cag bsgrub byas stong/ /de ni sun byung tshig gi phyogs/ /gal te tshig dang don 'brel na/ /rtag pa nyid du bsgrub byas kyang/ /dag gi don la zhig byed ni/ /tshad ma nyid
94a1(mdo 'grel): du grub mi 'gyur/ /skyes bu rnams la brda yis ni/ /yon tan 'phel la sogs la bzhin/ /rgyu med kyang ni mchod sbyin pas/ /med pa'i don ni yongs brtags yin/ /gzhan yang tshogs pa can phyir te/ /skyes bu
94a2(mdo 'grel): las byung gtam bzhin no/ /'dir ni yid ches skyes bu med/ /de na rig byed tshad ma yin/ /'brel pa byar mi 'dod pa yis/ /rigs las dag kyang brtag par brjod/ /gang gis mthong don tha snyad phyir/ /brda las byung ba'i shes
94a3(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /'phel sogs las ni srid pa yin/ /rig byed las ni mi 'thad do/ /mtho ris mchod sbyin sogs 'brel pa/ /dbang po las 'das su yi mthong/ /de yang don med ma yin te/ /de yi ngan shes 'byung ba'i phyir/ /tshogs
94a4(mdo 'grel): pa can gyi sgrub pa la/ /'di 'dra'i min mthun bsgrub brjod bya/ /rig byed 'don pa thams cad ni/ /bla ma'i 'don pa sngon song yin/ /rig byed 'don pa brjod nyid phyir/ /de ltar 'don pa ji bzhin no/ /b+ha ra ta yang de ltar 'gyur
94a5(mdo 'grel): byed po dran pas gnod par 'gyur/ /rig byed po ni dran med de/ /gang de don gzhan brjod rgyu mtshan/ /'das dang ma 'ongs dus dag ni/ /rig byed byed po dang bral ba/ /dus nyid phyir na 'di ltar de/ /de ltar snang ba'i dus
94a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin no/ /rig byed la ni tshangs la sogs/ /byed po min par rtogs par gyis/ /skyes bu nyid sogs gtan tshigs kyis/ /dper na tha mal mi bzhin no/ /des na rig byed kyis ni tshig/ brdzun min par ni shes par gyis//
94a7(mdo 'grel): rang don smra po ma bltos phyir/ /tshig don la ni tshig blo bzhin/ /de byas shes pa yod dag yin/ /rtag pa'i dag las byung nyid phyir/ /de yang dag gis blo bzhin rtag /rtag pa nyid du grub pas so/ /bskul pa las ni
94b1(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i blo/ /tshad ma yin te skyon brel ba'i/ /rgyu rnams kyis ni bskyed byas phyir/ /rtag yid ches sogs dbang blo bzhin/ /de bzhin yid mi ches smras pa'i/ /dag gis bskyed phyir yul dus sogs/ /dbye sogs la ni gnod med phyir/ /yid ches dag byung  
94b2(mdo 'grel): shes par bzhin/ /rig byed tshad mar gnas pa na/ /slob dpon slob ma'i brgyud pa yi/ /thog ma med nas brtags pa yod/ /skyon med nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /nges na 'jig rten kun mig gcig/ rig byed snang ba 'dra ba la/ /gzhan dag 'ug pa
94b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du ni/ /ma mthong? chos min las skyes lo/ /gnyis skyes las ni de kun ni/ /long bar rgyal gyis spros yin/ /'dir ni srin bus yig 'drar yang/ /de dag legs bshad cung zad med/ /byed po med pa yin na yang/ /de ni bden don 'gro ba yin
94b4(mdo 'grel): de rgyu yon tan bral ba'i phyir/ /skyon med pa yis brdzun don bzhin/ /skyes bu yis ni byas pa la/ /yon tan yod ces dogs par 'gyur/ /rig byed byed po med pa'i phyir/ /bdag la yon tan yod dog med/ /des na bden dang leg don nyid//
94b5(mdo 'grel): rgyu rnams mi la brten pa'i phyir/ /shes rab snying brtse med la sogs/ /med phyir de nyid yod pa min/ /des na don med 'thog 'gyur te/ /khur ba drug sogs dag bzhin no/ /gal te bya ba byed dang ldan/ /don rnams rtog par 'gyur/
94b6(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ /de ni rang bzhin gyis don dang/ /ldan pa min yang khyed la ni/ /rtogs pa der 'gyur skyes bu yis/ /bshad pas lha mi'i bshad sogs bzhin/ /skyon med na yang bden pa'i don/ /grub min gzhan yang yod pa'i phyir/ /gang
94b7(mdo 'grel): phyir don med ces bya ba/ /phung po gzhan yang yod pa min/ /'on te rig byed rang nyid kyis/ /mi rnams la bltos med pa can/ /bden  don rnam shes skyes nus yin/ /des na 'di ni bden don 'dod/ /de lta na ni bar med par/ /shes pa
95a1(mdo 'grel): de ni brtag 'byung 'gyur/ /rgyu ni rtag tu gnas nyid phyir/ /dper na mngon 'dod skad cig la/ /yang na rnam shes gcig pu la/ /de skyes ma lus 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyu ni nus pa can yod phyir/ /rig byed
95a2(mdo 'grel): 'di ni mi rtag 'gyur/ /nus pa slar yang blo byung 'gyur/ /'on te lhan cig byed pa ni/ /bshad sogs la ni bltos pa na/ /de dag la ni rim yod pas/ /rnam shes de yang rim ldan 'dod/ /de lta min zhes nus de la/ /
95a3(mdo 'grel): nga ltos pa ci 'dra ba 'byung 'gyur/ /gal te de ldan de nus na/ /khyed la rtag ste 'di gang gis/ /gal te sngar ni nus med pa'ang/ /des dag gis ni nus ldan byas/ /khyed la skyes bus byas thal 'gyur/ /shes pa'i yan lag
95a4(mdo 'grel): skyes rten phyir/ /ji ltar srid skyes bu rnams kyis te/ /mar med 'gyur bas gsal byes min/ /de srid rig byed de gnas pas/ /khyed la shes pa skyed byed min/ /gang phyir shes pa de yi rgyu/ /skyes bu'i shes pa las byung
95a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /des na skyes bus ma byas nyid/ /yang dag don shes rgyun mi rtag /skyes bus ma byas pa nyid de/ /rig byed la yod kyang don med/ /'di yi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu gang/ /de shes skyes bu la brten 'byung/ /gal te rtag
95a6(mdo 'grel): tu nus na 'dir/ /ci ste gzhan la bltos pa yin/ /des na khyed la nus rgyu gcig/ yod kyang shes pa nyid 'byung 'gyur/ /'dir ni rang dgar skyes bu rnams/ /rig byed ji gar 'chad byed na/ /de dag rnams ni dgag pa ru/ /su zhig gis
95a7(mdo 'grel): ni nus pa yin/ /des na gti mug nga rgyal sogs/ /skyon gyis 'di dag bslad pa yin/ /thos pa phyin ci log bshad pa/ /byed ces dgos par 'gyur ba yin/ /de dag dbang po la 'das pa/ /mthong ba'i mi gcig kyang 'dod min/ /bskul ba ma ltos
95b1(mdo 'grel): mtho ris dang/ /mchod sbyin sogs 'brel shes nyid med/ /gang phyir dbang po las 'das don/ /khyed kyis dngos su mthong 'dod min/ /rtag pa'i tshig gis gang mthong ba/ /de ni mthong bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gang gis rig byed mi la ni/ /ma bltos rang nyid don brjod min/ /long ba
95b2(mdo 'grel): mkhar pa thog pa ltar/ /skyes bu'i bshad pa la bltos yin/ /de ni de yis drangs gyur na/ /lam log par ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /des na rig byed snang bzhin du/ /mig gcig 'gyur ba 'thad pa min/ /rang dgar shes pa skyed na yang/ /tshad ma nyid du gsal
95b3(mdo 'grel): ba ru/ /'di nyid la ni mi srid do/ /skyes bu la ni bltos phyir ro/ /ji bzhin don rtogs rgyu nyid ni/ /tshad ma nyid du brtags pa yin/ /skyes bu'i bshad pa la bltos pas/ /'di la tshad mas brtags legs min/ /rig byed tshad mar mi gnas pas/ /slob dpon slob ma'i brgyud
95b4(mdo 'grel): pa 'di/ /thog ma med par brtags bya ba'ang/ /skyon med nyid du rig pa min/ /gang phyir de na gcig kyang ni/ /dbang po las 'das mthong 'dod min/ /de phyir thog ma med pa yi/ /dmus long brgyud pa bstan pa yin/ /long bas long pa khrid pa na/ /yang dag lam ni
95b5(mdo 'grel): nges rtogs min/ /da lta min pas 'di la ni/ /thog med brtags pa 'bras med yin/ /yid dang rgyas pa la sogs kyang/ /gzhan las rig byed de nyid shog/ /de dag gis don 'di bkod min/ /zhes pa 'di la tshad ma'ang med/ /bden don rtag pa'i 'brel
95b6(mdo 'grel): can gyis/ /tshad ma nyid ni yin yang bla/ /dbang po ? ? 'dis sbyor pa de/ /'dir ni 'ga' yis nges pa min/ /gang phyir don de dbang 'das pa/ /der gnas sbyor de'ang dbang po 'dis/ /khyad la mi kun de dag gis/ /rang gis dbang po 'das mi mthong/ /thos pa
95b7(mdo 'grel): de yi bdag gi ni/ /don 'brel 'di yin zhes brjod min/ /skyes bus brtags pas don 'brel nyid/ /skyes bus byas pas tha dad min/ /de phyir ji ltar mi byas pa/ /phyin ci log pa nyid du dogs/ /mi rnams kyis ni nyer brtags la'ang/ /de bzhin dogs
96a1(mdo 'grel): der cis mi 'gyur/ /rig byed tshad mar gnas na yang/ /slob dpon slob ma'i rgyud pa ni/ /thog ma med par brtags pa de/ /dmus long rgyud pa 'dra bar 'gyur/ /me la sbyin sreg sogs tshig gis/ /the tshom sogs med mtho ris la/ /mngon
96a2(mdo 'grel): sum gyi ni blo bzhin du/ /mi g.yo blo skyes ma yin nam/ /rig byed kyis de byed pa na/ /ji ltar tshad ma nyid dmigs yin/ /gang phyir tshig des don de ni/ /'ga' zhig the tshom za? rtogs yin/ /phyin ci log gang gzhan bzhin du/ /the tshom skyes phyir de bzhin
96a3(mdo 'grel): min/ /rtogs pa dang ldan 'ga' zhig gis/ /de la bye brag mthong ba med/ /dbang po las 'das don la ni/ /yod med nges pa rigs pa min/ /gal te rig byed dag des na/ /gzhan las gzhan 'dra ci ste min/ /dad pas dbang med blo can ni/ /gtsang sbra can
96a4(mdo 'grel): rnams mi g.yo ba'i/ /blo nyid skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gzhan las gzhan dag la de mtshungs/ /'di ltar bde gshegs pa sogs la/ /mchod sbyin srog gcad dang ldan pas/ /ngan song sdug bsngal 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /blo ni mi g.yo skye bar 'gyur/
96a5(mdo 'grel): blo 'di la ni 'ga' zhig kyang/ /gnod pa da ltar snang 'gyur min/ /gal te la lar res 'ga' dogs/ /rig byed dag la'ang de dang mtshungs/ /gal te mi 'dod rag las pa/ /brda ni mi rtags rig byed 'dis/ /rang gis don ni gsal byed na//
96a6(mdo 'grel): de tshe tshad ma nyid rigs yin/ /de tshe gti mug nga rgyal sogs/ /skyon gyis bslad pa'i blo rnams kyis/ /gzhan du bshad par byas na yang/ /rang gi don ni 'dor mi byed/ /gang phyir de yi yul can nyid/ /blo ni myur du skyes par byed/ /skyes bu
96a7(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis 'dod pa yi/ /'di ni don gzhan gsal byed min/ /mi'i 'dod la ni bltos pa na/ /skyes bus byas dang bye brag med/ /de la rag las gsal ba yin/ /de yang phyin ci log par 'byung/ /gzhan yang skyes bus ma byas la/ /ji ltar rang
96b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin gyis bden don/ /'dod yin de bzhin brdzun nyid ni/ /ci ste dgos par byed pa min/ /bdag nyid kyis bden don rtogs pa'i/ /rgyu nyid yin pas 'di bden na/ de ltar bdag nyid kyis log par/ /rtogs pa'i rgyur yang dogs par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rig byed chad ma ni//
96b2(mdo 'grel): gang tshe khyed la gal che na/ /de tshe skyon me dbyed po sogs/ /nges par sgrub la 'bad par gyis/ /skyon med pa yi byed pa pos/ /'di byas skyon med gsal byas kyis/ /gsal bar byas na 'jig rten 'dir/ /yang dag don shes sgrub byed yin/ /shes rab snying rjes
96b3(mdo 'grel): sogs ldan pa'i/ /skyes bus byas pa'i tshig dam pa/ /de ltar legs par nges byas na/ /ji bzhin don shes rgyu ru 'gyur/ /mis ni ma byas pa tsam gyis/ /ji bzhin don shes rgyu min te/ /nags kyi me la sogs pa ni/ /log pa'i shes pa'i rgyur yang
96b4(mdo 'grel): mthong/ /me yi snang ba yod pa na/ /mtsho skyes sngon po'ang dmar snang 'gyur/ /gal te me sogs byas nyid kyis/ /de yi rgyu ru 'thad 'gyur na/ /don rnams kyis ni byas nyid kyis/ /log pa'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan nam/ /de ltar du ba me la ni/ /ji bzhin gsal
96b5(mdo 'grel): bar byed 'gyur ma ni/ /de ltar rig byed ma byas pa/ /de kho na nyid shes pa yi/ /rgyu mtshan gnas pa ma yin pas/ /de phyir 'di brtags don med yin/ /des na skyes bus ma byas nyid/ /gsal dang rtag nyid kyis grub
96b6(mdo 'grel): pa/ /sgra don 'brel pa brtags pa yang/ /don med nyid du brjod pa yin/ /de ni yod pa na yang 'di/ /ji bzhin shes don rgyu nyid du/ /mi 'dod par ni 'das ma thag /rgyas pa ru ni bshad zin to/ /des na de nyid rab spong la//
96b7(mdo 'grel): kho bo la ni char mos med/ /gnas skabs nye bar mkho min la/ /su zhig gegs ni byed pa yin/ /thos pa de la ji bzhin don/ /shes pa'i rgyu nyid 'thad pa yin/ /skyes bus ma byas yin na yang/ /de ni ma grub ces bsgrubs zin/ /phra ba'i blo
97a1(mdo 'grel): yi mi gcan gyis/ /blo rnams lam gang la dpyod pa'i/ /de yis bdag gis brlabs nas ni/ /'di ni cung zad bsdus nas brjod/ /tshad ma rnams ni log na yang/ /gzhal bya ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang phyir khyab byed dang rgyu nyid/ /
97a2(mdo 'grel): de dag la ni der yod min/ /des na thos pa'i byed pa ni/ /tshad ma lnga pos ma rtogs kyang/ /byed po mi shes rabs sogs bzhin/ /dngos med nyid kyis rtogs mi 'gyur/ /'on te don bcas nyid kyis sam/ /rnam par dbye don nyid kyis kyang/ /de rnams kyi
97a3(mdo 'grel): ni byed po dpog/ ci ste thos pa'ang de bzhin min/ /sems can kun gyis ma rtogs nyid/ /the tshom za min de re 'ga' / /su zhig tshad ma 'ga' yis kyang/ /rtogs pa yin yang the tshom 'gyur/ /srid gsum nang na gnas pa yi/ /srog chags thams
97a4(mdo 'grel): cad gsal po ru/ /rnam pa kun gyis yongs shes gang/ /des ni nges par byed 'di nus/ /rang nyid kyis ni ma rtogs nyid/ /'khrul pa yin zhes 'di lta bur/ /skyes bu gzhan gyis kun rtog gang/ /de med par ni nges pa yin/ /rig byed la 'don
97a5(mdo 'grel): par byed na/ /byed po yin zhes mngon sum rtog /de dag gsal byed rigs yin te/ /rtag la gsal ba mi srid phyir/ /dmigs par gyur pa'i rang ngo bo/ /de yi bya bas yang dag 'byung/ /de dag sngar yang yod pa na/ /dmigs pa long par thal
97a6(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /rig byed de yi 'bras bu ni/ /tha snyad sogs su rung bar des/ /de yi bya bas 'di yod phyir/ /sa bon las ni myug sogs bzhin/ /gsal byed yi ge'i dngos yod phyir/ /zlos gar gyi ni gtan sogs bzhin/ /skyes bus byas nyid
97a7(mdo 'grel): rig byed la/ /rjes su dpag pas kyang rtogs 'gyur/ /gzhan du rim dngos nyid min te/ /rtag nyid phyir dang khyab byed phyir/ /gsal bas byas pa'i rim yod min/ /rtag las gsal ba mi 'thad phyir/ /lung dang nye bar 'jal ba dag /don gyis go
97b1(mdo 'grel): la tshad nyid de/ /dgag par byas yin de na yang/ /'di dag nyer dgod rigs pa min/ /tshad ma nyid yin ldog pa'i phyir/ /rig byed skyes bus ma byas nyid/ /gang 'dod de yang dngos nyid phyir/ /sgrub pa rnams kyis bsgrub bya min/ /de dag gis thos rang dbang yin/ /skyes bu'i
97b2(mdo 'grel): bya ba mi ltos phyir/ /de yang dngos po la yod chos/ /yang na dngos bdag nyid de bzhin/ /dngos po'i phyogs ni grub don du/ /sgrub pa gang yang brjod pa yin/ /khyed la de ni bsal byas kyang/ /rang nyid dngos med grub 'gyur min/ /de yod sgrub pa gsal
97b3(mdo 'grel): byas nas/ /de yod nges par mi 'gyur ro/ /de yod pa ni ldog pa yi/ /de tsam gyis ni nges yod min/ /tshad ma rnams ni log na yang/ /don med par ni mi 'grub po/ /de na gnyis ka la phyogs ni/ /mi 'grub pa ste tsam du 'gyur/ /lus can min
97b4(mdo 'grel): phyir sgra rtag min/ /bde sogs rnams kyis 'khrul phyir ro/ /de ltar brjod kyang ji bzhin sgra/ /'jig nyid rab tu mi 'grub po/ /de na snga phyi mdza' dag la/ /gzhan gyis sgrub pa gang brjod yin/ /de ni gsal bar byas na yang/ /rig byed smra de'i don
97b5(mdo 'grel): rdzogs min/ /ma byas dang ni mi 'jigs pas/ /gal te rtag nyid 'dod pas na/ /bkag pa tsam gyi dngos dag gi /nus med la yang de mtshungs yin/ /des na nam mkha' i me tog bzhin/ /des na ji ltar mkha' i pad+ma/ /rtag pa nyid ni dngos min te/ /de bzhin
97b6(mdo 'grel): rig byed la yang ni/ /des na tshad ma nyid grub min/ /byas pa nyid dang 'jig nyid ni/ /dgag par yang ni mi 'grub po/ /sgrub par byed pa sun phyung bas/ /des na rtag nyid smra mi 'grub/ /gal te ma yin dgag bdag nyid/ /de dag gis ni rtag nyid 'dod//
97b7(mdo 'grel): de dag dngos po'i bdag nyid kyis/ /rang gi grub pa la bltos yin/ /phyogs snga ma gnyis sun phyung bas/ /dngos po'i ngo bor rtag nyid gang/ /de na bsgrub par ma byas na/ /bdag nyid kyis te sgrub 'gyur min/ /tshul gsum ngo bo nges pa ni//
98a1(mdo 'grel): sgrub pa gang zhig rab bsal byas/ /khyod kyi phas kyang nam du yang/ /de ni dgag par mi nus so/ /rig byed las ni skyes bu ni/ /mi 'jig par ni gang bshad pa/ /de la rjes su dpag pas gnod/ /gsal par bdag med bstan zin to/ /der
98a2(mdo 'grel): ni rigs sogs gzhan smras pa'ang/ /tshad mar gnod byar bsgrub byas zin/ /rjes su dpag pa de yang ni/ /'brel pa nges can sngar bshad zin/ /dngos po'i rjes 'brel pa'i de la/ /sgra tsam snying po med pas sam/ /yang na de las byung blo yis//
98a3(mdo 'grel): rmongs pa su zhig gnod snyam sems/ /skyes bu'i dag las shes pa yang/ /dbang po las 'das 'jug pa yin/ /de yang mngon sum dang mtshungs nyid/ /ci phyir khyod cag mngon 'dod min/ /'brel pa ma mthong ba yi phyir/ /dpe la ma bltos skyon med pa'ang
98a4(mdo 'grel): de la yang yod kho na yin/ /skyes bu la brten phyir 'di la/ /gnod pa yod par dogs zhe na/ /de ltar rig byed ngag la yang/ /dogs pa de yang ldog mi 'gyur/ /de ni log rtog rgyu nyid kyi/ /rang bzhin du ni 'gyur ba yin/ /mis byas sgra yi don rtogs
98a5(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /de ni bdag la chad ma min/ /zhes bya de ltar zhe sdang gis/ /mkhas pas byed pa nus ma yin/ /des na dbang 'das las sgra kun/ /stobs dang stobs min mtshungs yin na/ /gcig nyid la ni rjes chags 'di/ /rgyu mtshan gang gis sbyor
98a6(mdo 'grel): bar byed/ /'das ma thag brjod rig pa ni/ /rig byed tshad ma min pa'i rgyu/ /shes rab can rnams kyis gsungs pas/ /des na de dag bden smar 'gyur/ /log par rjes chags las skyes pa'i/ /rig byed bsam pas rmongs byas pas/ /rig byed log
98a7(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyi rgyu/ /mi shes cung zad ngo mtshar med/ /sogs po par tshig sogs rnams pa/ /mi ni bag mar legs sogs pa'i/ /de spyod rtag tu lhur len pa/ /de'i skyon cung zad mthong ba med/ /ngo shes mngon sum yin par ni/ /sngar ni bkag
98b1(mdo 'grel): ba kho na yin/ /'khrul pa'i phyir dang rtogs bcas phyir/ /de yis rtag nyid nges 'gyur min/ /'di ni ne tso'i smra ba yin/ /re skags tshig tu 'di snang phyir/ /sgra yi shes pa mang du ni/ /ldog par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo yin/ /de ni gsal byed dbye zhe na/ /gsal ba
98b2(mdo 'grel): spong pa 'chad par 'gyur/ /rigs pa 'di nyid kyis khyed la/ /thams cad 'dir ni gcig nyid 'gyur/ /des na khyad la gsal byed dang/ /gsal bar bya ba cung zad med/ /rnam dbye dang bral gcig la ni/ /dbye bar brtags pa 'gal ba yin/ /sgra 'di
98b3(mdo 'grel): dag ni skyes bus byas/ /'di dag skyes bus ma byas zhes/ /de yi rnam par bzhag pa yang/ /ngo shes rjes 'brangs byed grub min/ /gsal byed rim pa gnas pa'i phyir/ /'ga' zhig rim pa nyid du gnas/ /rim pa nges par sbyor ba can/ /de dag skyes bus ma
98b4(mdo 'grel): byas 'dod/ /skan sogs gsal byed rim pa ni/ /skyes bus byas chos 'di min nam/ /de ni 'dod la rag las phyir/ /phyin ci log tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /me nyid la sogs spyi nyid ni/ /rgyas pa ru ni bsal byas zin/ /des na der ni ngo shes pa'i/ /spyi nyid
98b5(mdo 'grel): rtag par kho bos 'dod/ /skad cig re rer 'jig 'gyur bas/ /yi ge rnams lo khyad med phyir/ /ngo shes spyi yis gang nyid ni/ /de bzhin du ni yin zad mod/ /myur dang ngal sogs cha gang la/ /tha dad blo ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de la ngo shes pa'i shes pa//
98b6(mdo 'grel): tha dad blos ni nges byas min/ /sgra gcig nyid ni grub don du/ /gtan tshigs rnams ni smras pa la/ /mi mthun phyogs la 'gal med phyir/ /so sor 'brel grub mi 'gyur ro/ /du pa'i spyi ni cha yang ni/ /bdag la brtan par grub pa min/ /de min ngo bo
98b7(mdo 'grel): las ldog pa/ /dngos po tsam ni bsgrubs pa yin/ /gang sogs gcig nyid thob gyur na/ /rigs rten 'dod pas grub pa sgrub/ /de min ngo bo yongs log pas/ /dbyer med nyid du brtags pa yin no/ /gsal ba gcig tu nyid 'gyur na/ /tshad ma kun
99a1(mdo 'grel): gyis gnod par 'gyur/ /dbang po las byung sogs rnams kyis/ /so sor sbyor yig dbye nges phyir/ /yid 'ong yid mi 'ongs sogs kyi/ /dbye gang mngon sum gyis rtogs 'gyur/ /blo rnams rim par 'byung ba'i phyir/ /tha dad 'grub
99a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur myur sogs bzhin/ /yul dang dus sogs tha dad pa'i/ /ba lang sgra gsal blo rnams kyi/ /don gcig pa min tha dad par/ /snang phyir gzugs ro sogs blo bzhin/ /drug snang la sogs dbye snang bar/ /mngon sum gyis ni nges par 'gyur/ /gsal byed
99a3(mdo 'grel): kyis chos 'di min te/ /zhes bya de ni brjod par 'gyur/ /snga de phyi de'i zhag la ni/ /ba lang sgra zhes kun 'di dag/ don gcig pa min rim 'byung phyir/ /sgra dang dri sogs pa'i blo bzhin/ /de lta min na blo kun ni/ /dmigs pa gcig tu 'gyur ba yin/ /nus ldan
99a4(mdo 'grel): rgyu ni nye gnas phyir/ /rim gyis 'gyur ba'ang 'gal ba yin/ /dngos po rnams ni tha dad kyang/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis gcig rtogs pa'i/ /nus pa nges par yod min te/ /sngar ni rab tu bstan zin te/ /gcig tu rtogs pa de la ni/ /sgra ni gcig tu nges byed pa//
99a5(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pas ni sgra gcig la/ /sbyor ba mang po snyam du sems/ /gsal ba du ma la gnas phyir/ /'brel pa 'thad par 'gyur ba yin/ /de phyir gsal ba rnams la ni/ /'jig rten thams cad pa nyid 'gyur/ /sgra don lhan cig don dam par/ /'brel pa yod
99a6(mdo 'grel): min de las ni/ /ma skyes phyir dang tha dad phyir/ /des na 'khrul pas nye bar brtags/ /khyab min srid phyir sgra don gyis gnas pa kun ni bslang ba yin/ /'di ltar de ni rgyas pa ru/ /sngar ni bstan par byas zin to/ /ba lang nyid ni rtag pa dang/ /'brel par brtags pa'ang spangs
99a7(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /rdul phran mkha' sogs kyang spangs pas/ /des na gtan tshigs kyi dpe min/ /ngo bo gcig nyid 'khrul pa yis/ /shes pa rnams kyis nges byas phyir/ /dmigs bkar ba la nyid brjod nyid/ /min nas nas ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /yang dag skad
99b1(mdo 'grel): cig ma nyid phyir/ /des tsam dus 'di brten min yang/ /shes bya de yi brtan pa ni/ /phyis ni ji ltar yang 'dod yin/ /bum sogs la yang cung zad ni/ /'jig pa'i rgyu ni yod pa min/ /zhes bya ba 'di yang bstan zin to/ /de ci sgra la 'byung 'gyur yin/ /ngo shes pa ni
99b2(mdo 'grel): slad pa ru/ /sngar ni rab tu bstan zin pas/ /yul dus sbyor ba po rnams kyi/ /dbye bas yi ge'ang dbye bar 'gyur/ /drug ldan drang srongs 'dzin dang/ /lnga pa la sogs rab dbye bas/ /ga yi gsal bas gzhan gsal bar/ /mngon sum gyis ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /gsal
99b3(mdo 'grel): par byed pa'i dbye ba yis/ /dbye ba'i gnas pa 'di rigs min/ /rtag pa la ni gsal yod min/ /zhes bya'o gnas 'chad par 'gyur/ /ga las tha dad pa yi spyi/ /yang dag par gnyid 'dod min/ /de yi phyir ni sbyor ba la/ /grub pa la sgrub bzlog par dka' / /gzhan
99b4(mdo 'grel): sel bdag nyid can la yang/ /gnyid la ni rten yod min/ /rnam pa 'di nyid kyis zhe na/ /de min rten mi 'grub thob 'gyur/ /yi ge ga min las ldog pas/ /gnyid rnam pa nyid du 'gyur/ /chos can gang la chos yin no/ /yang dag par ni rjes dpag kun/ /gnyis
99b5(mdo 'grel): ka la grub la bltos yin/ /dpe sogs rang nyid la bltos pa/ /des dpe'i chos can ma grub 'gyur/ /khyod kyis 'bad pa 'di kun gyi/ /ga yig gcig nyid bsgrub don du/ /de la khyed la mngon sum gyis/ /gnod pa bzlog par dka' ba'ang smras/ /snga de phyi de la
99b6(mdo 'grel): sogs pa'i/ /yi ge ga zhes 'di dag ni/ /rim gyis 'byung bas don gcig min/ /gzugs dang ro sogs blo bzhin no/ /des na yi ge gcig brtan par/ /gnas pa gnyis ka la mi 'grub/ /de'i phyir nyer btags nyid 'di la/ /rtag pa nyid ni
99b7(mdo 'grel): btags pa yin/ /sgra ni dmigs pa'i dus su ni/ /rna ba legs par byas pa dang/ /rna bug mdza' la gnas gyur pa'i/ /rlung rnams rtogs par 'gyur ba min/ /sgra tsam legs byas rna ba yis/ /gang tshe sgra ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /de dang nyer bsres de yis
100a1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /rtogs la mngon sum gyis gnod 'gyur/ /mngar pa la sogs la 'jug pa/ /kha dang ser po'i ngo bor yis/ /ji ltar shes pa yul med pa/ /de bzhin sgra yang shes par 'gyur/ /myur dang ngal sogs ngo bo yis/ /gzhan pa'i
100a2(mdo 'grel): sgra ni snang mi 'gyur/ /da min ngo bo de dngos nyid/ /shes phyir ji ltar yul med min/ /de ltar min na don de nyid/ /rtogs par byed pa de 'gal 'dod/ /rnam pa gzhan ni rig pa na/ /don de nyid ni ji ltar rig/ rnam pa med pa'i shes pa ma/ /khyed la phyi'i don
100a3(mdo 'grel): rnam de des/ /de yi bdag nyid phyi rol min/ /de bzhin du de ji zhig rig/ shes pa rnam bcas phyogs la yang/ /phyi rol rnam pa rjes mthun par/ /shes pa la ni snang gyur pas/ /don rtogs zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /'dir ni phyi rol rjes mthun par/ /
100a4(mdo 'grel): shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ /des na yul med pa yi sems/ /thams cad 'khrul pa yin zhes gdags/ /rtag pa la ni khyad par du/ /gsal byed yod pa rig pa min/ /de yi legs byas rjes mthun pas/ /des sgra la blo tha dad min/ /bum pa la
100a5(mdo 'grel): sogs bzung don du/ /ji ltar mig la mar me yis/ /nus pa skyed byed de bzhin du/ /sgra dmigs phyir ni sgra tsam gyis/ /rna ba la ni nus pa bskyed/ /sgra ni rtag tu dmigs rung bar/ /rang bzhin gyis ni gnas zhes bya/ /rna ba legs par ma byas
100a6(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /de ni ci yi phyir mi dmigs/ /de phyir legs byas rna ba ni/ /yod pa'i dus bzhin de yang ni/ /rung ba'i rgyu ni yod pas na/ /dmigs pa kho na yod par 'gyur/ /gal te de dmigs rung min na/ /phyogs kyang de ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /'gyur ba
100a7(mdo 'grel): rung ba nyid ldan pa'i/ /sgra gzhan skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /yang na phyis kyang shes pa ni/ /de yi stobs las byung ba min/ /legs byas rna ba la sogs las/ /de ni skye bar brjod pa yin/ /de ltar sgra ni shes bya ru/ /mi 'gyur nye bar mkho min
100b1(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /ri sogs las ni de la ni/ /khyad par cung zad kyang yod min/ /legs byas rna ba la sogs las/ /sgra la bltos med de dag gis/ /shes pa 'di ni sgra rtogs pa'i/ /rang bzhin zhes bya bskyed pa yin/ /don shes shes bya'i ngo bo 'di/ /de lta na yang sgra
100b2(mdo 'grel): 'jug 'gyur/ /khyed la de yi rnam shes kyang/ /zhes bya rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/ /de lta min na rnam shes ni/ /rjes 'jug ma yin de shes bya/ /sgra de rjes su 'jug 'gyur zhes/ /khyed la de ltar 'gal bar 'gyur/ /shes dang shes bya'i
100b3(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin ni/ /de dag lu gu rgyud bzhin 'brel/ /gcig yod pa na gnyis pa'i ni/ /thob 'gyur ma 'khrul pa yi phyir/ /legs byas rna bas bskyed pa yi/ /shes dang 'brel nyid yin na ni/ /rna ba legs par ma byas kyang/ /gsal bar shes pa 'phen
100b4(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /gal te de yi shes bya yi/ /bdag nyid sgra ni min zhe na/ /de lta na ni rna ba'i shes/ /de rtog rang bzhin 'gyur min te/ /de bdag nyid min ro sogs bzhin/ /shes pa la ni sgra dang ni/ /'brel pa gang yod gang gis na/ /de ni sgra blo'i ngo bor 'dod/ /
100b5(mdo 'grel): de bdag nyid ni dbye ldan min/ /de ni de las byung min te/ /sgra ni skyed byed nyid min phyir/ /de las byung ba'i nges pa'i phyir/ /de ni gtan du 'byung par 'gyur/ /de lta na de'i yul can shes/ /rtag tu 'byung ba 'am yang na min/ /de ltar nges par gnas
100b6(mdo 'grel): pa na/ /rna ba legs byas rtags don med/ /res 'ga' legs par byas pa ni/ /yod pa nyid na res 'ga' yang/ /shes pa 'byung 'gyur zhes bya ba/ /legs byas brtags pa mdzes pa yin/ /legs byas nus pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /shes 'bras nges par byas
100b7(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ /shes pa de yang rtag yod pa'am/ /yang na rtag tu med par 'gyur/ /rnam par shes pa res 'ga' bar/ /de yi legs byas ji ltar ston/ /rna ba legs par byas phyir lan/ /de phyir der ni legs smras min/ /gal te tha mi dad pa yi/ /nus pa rna ba
101a1(mdo 'grel): la byed na/ /de tshe nam mkha' phyogs la ni/ /rtag nyid nyams 'gyur bskyed pa'i phyir/ /dngos dang tha mi dad nyid phyir/ /legs par byas pa'ang rtag nyid yin/ /dngos po bzhin du de yis na/ /de bskyed rnam shes rtag tu na/ /tha dad na
101a2(mdo 'grel): ni de'i zhe na/ /'brel pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro/ /nus pa las zhes 'byung ba'i phyir/ /rna ba'i shes pa nyid kyang med/ /tha dad tha mi dad grol ba'i/ /phyogs ni spangs par byas zin to/ /des na rna ba legs byas phyir/ /lan ni blo dman brjod pa yin/ /de nyid
101a3(mdo 'grel): kyis ni yul dang ni/ /gnyis ka legs par byas pa bkag /de phyir rtag la gsal ba ni/ /thams cad du yang rten med yin/ /des na gsal ba la brten nas/ /ring thung rim pa sogs rnams ni/ /'ga' zhig gang dag snang gyur pa/ /de dag kun kyang
101a4(mdo 'grel): rten med 'gyur/ /ma phrad tsam du mtshungs na yang/ /thams cad gzung nyid mi 'gyur te/ nus pa nges par gnas pa'i phyir/ /khab len gyis ni lcags la bzhin/ /gal te khab len 'od 'phros pas/ /de yang drangs par gyur ce na/ /'o na 'od 'di ma
101a5(mdo 'grel): mthong bas/ /ji ltar yod par rtog par 'gyur/ /ci phyir 'od de shing sogs dang/ /phrad kyang 'dren par byed pa min/ /de nus des nyid phyir zhe na/ /ma phrad pa la 'ang de mtshungs yin/ /sbyor ba'i de ma thag tu ni/ /ring dang bar mar nyer gnas pas/ /rim pa
101a6(mdo 'grel): med pas rtogs par 'gyur/ /thams cad la ni der shes skyed phyir/ /ring dang nye sogs dbye ba yis/ /gzugs ni gsal dang mi gsal bar/ /ji ltar snang 'gyur de bzhin du/ /sgra yang myur dang ngal sogs 'gyur/ /tha dad snang ba'i blo rnams ni/ /dmigs
101a7(mdo 'grel): pa gcig par ji ltar 'gyur/ /zhe na phyi rol don smra la/ /gzugs blo la de brgal brtag mtshungs/ /phrad nas 'dzin pa'i phyogs la yang/ /rna ba'i nang du sgra'i sgra bzhin/ /'brug sgra la sogs shes pa ni/ /tha dad bar ni 'gyur ba min/ /des na skyed
101b1(mdo 'grel): byed phyir shes pa/ /tha dad min te yin bzhin no/ /gzhan du reg bya la sogs bzhin/ /rna dang ma phrad byed 'gyur min/ /yid kyang phrad par byed pa yin/ /gang brjod skad cig tsam gyis ni/ /shin tu ring ba'i don la ni/ /de dag gi sems 'jug mi 'thad/ /phyi rol dbang
101b2(mdo 'grel): po nyid phyir sogs/ /phrad nas 'dzin byed nyid sgrub gang/ /bsgrub bya'i chos mi mthun pa la/ /'gal ba med phyir de 'khrul yin/ /ldan pa dang ni rnam dbye ba/ /tha dad pa can sngar spangs zin/ /de nyid kyis ni khyad med phyir/ /'di la rtogs pa mi 'thad do/ /de
101b3(mdo 'grel): phyir shugs med pas de ni/ /ji srid shugs ni gnas pa min/ /rna ba'i nam mkhar phyin pa yis/ /de ni rna nus byed ce na/ /ci phyir lcag gis bsnun pa bzhin/ /sgra rig pa na de shes min/ /gang tsher sgra yis shes pas de'i/ /rig pa so ro bkag ce na/ /lcag gis
101b4(mdo 'grel): bsnun dang rlung gzhan par/ /de tshe rig pas brjod rigs min/ /rim gyis 'byung yang mgyogs pa na/ /cig car du ni 'khrul zhe na/ /cung zad min rnam kun tuAng/ /rlung 'di ma dmig pa yi phyir/ /'on kyang dbang po las 'das rlung/ /gzegs zan
101b5(mdo 'grel): sogs bzhin khyed cag kyang/ /brjod na bshad pa las de yis/ /reg bya thob /gyur ci phyir byas/ /yang na rlung na dbang 'das blo/ /de dang de sbyor thob 'gyur la/ /dro dang grang dang gnyis ka yis/ /reg bya rig 'gyur gzhan gyi bzhin/ /'on kyang rna
101b6(mdo 'grel): mchog la de dang/ /min ldan pas na rtogs mi 'dod/ /rna ba'i nam mkha' mi phyin ces/ /de ni ji ltar rtogs par gyur/ /de phyir gtsang sbra can mthong ba'i/ /brtags pa rgyu mtshan med yin te/ /mkhas pa rnams ni tshim byed min/ /nam mkha' cha med
101b7(mdo 'grel): rna gang brjod/ /de la skyon de sngar bstan gang/ /de dag cha med phyogs rna bar/ /'dod pa nyid la'ang mtshungs rtogs bya/ /nam mkha' gcig bu khyab phyogs la'ang/ /legs byas la brten dang gzhan gyi/ /rnam par dbye ba 'thad pa min/ /gang phyir nam
102a1(mdo 'grel): mkha' de gcig yin/ /mkha' gcig bdag nyid rna ba ni/ /rna mchog legs par ma byas med/ /de byor rten gyi dbye ba yis/ /legs par byas pa nges mi gnas/ /de bas na brten gcig la ni/ /dbang po
102a2(mdo 'grel): legs par byas thob na/ /dbang po gcig pur smra ba la/ /lus can kun gyis rtogs byed 'gyur/ /skyes bus lus kyi phyogs rnams la/ /rnam par shes pa skyed 'dod kyi/ /'on kyang khyed la mkha' gcig phyir/ /gtso bo tha dad par 'gyur min//
102a3(mdo 'grel): de phyir bdag phyogs dang bral yang/ /ma lus par ni rtogs byed pa/ /lus nyid la gnas 'dzin pas na/ /de ltar smras kyang 'gal ba yin/ /de gnyis na ni rgyu yis ni/ /'on pa nyid sogs lta bur rtogs/ /gzugs ni me long la mngon lta/
102a4(mdo 'grel): gzugs brnyan de ltar ma yin no/ /chu sogs nang du zhugs pa 'di/ /gzugs ni ring du gnas pa yin/ /rten gyi rjes su byed pa yis/ /gzugs brnyan che chung dbye ba dang/ /ldan gyi gzugs ni ma yin te/ /des na gtan tshigs ma grub min/ /mi mthun par
102a5(mdo 'grel): ni sang ba yang/ /don shes pa rin 'gyur ba ni/ /gzugs dang sgra sogs sems thams cad/ /don kun gyi ni yul can 'gyur/ /sor?  mos cung zad mnan mig la/ /gcig kyang du mar snang ba gang/ /de yang de ltar 'khrul pa ste/ /yul med nyid du 'dod pa
102a6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /'dir ni gzugs brnyan 'byung ba ni/ /sngar ni gsal bar byas nyid yin/ /gcig la lhan cig gnyis mi rung/ /lus can thogs pa dang bcas phyir/ /yul rnam pa du ma la gnas par/ /gzugs brnyan yod pa yin na yang/ /che chung sogs
102a7(mdo 'grel): rig dbye ba yis/ /gcig nyid yod pa ma yin no/ /skyes bu rnams la nges pa yang/ /gang la 'di ltar 'jug par 'gyur/ /bdag gi steng na nyi gnas zhes/ /de ni nges par 'khrul pa yin/ /gang phyir srogs chags thams cad ni/ /cig car du ni nyid
102b1(mdo 'grel): gcig nyid/ /mthong bar 'gyur ba yin pas de/ /gnyis ba nam yang ma yin no/ /des na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /gnyis pa nam yang yod ma yin/ /snang ba mi dmigs pa yi phyir/ /des na nyi ma gcig tu nges/ /de ltar sgra ni gcig nyid du/ /ji ltar yang ni nges pa
102b2(mdo 'grel): min/ /rim gyis sam ni cig car yang/ /de ni du ma nyid mtshon phyir/ /gang tshe rjod par byed mang po/ /gsogs yi ge cig car du/ /sbyor bar byed pa de yi tshe/ /dbye bar gsal bar dmigs par 'gyur/ /rim gyis kyang ni sbyor ba la/ /dbye ba mngon
102b3(mdo 'grel): sum 'ba' zhig gis/ /rtogs 'gyur ma yin 'on kyang ni/ /rtags las kyang blo'i rim snang phyir/ /sgra tsam gsal byed rag las pa/ /'di yi dmigs par zad 'gyur mod/ /'on kyang ji ltar dngos gnas pa/ /'di ni 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin/ /
102b4(mdo 'grel): de lta min na de 'dzin 'di/ /de dngos mi snang la nges 'gyur/ /nam mkha' i cha ni ma lus pa/ /sgra ni khyab cing gsal 'gyur min/ /des na sgra tsam yul tha dad/ /thos pa de cis rjes su byed/ /rang bdag nyid ni gsal ba ru/ /gsal bar 'gyur
102b5(mdo 'grel): te bum sogs bzhin/ /'di dag khyed gzhung khas blangs na/ /rgyu mtshan med par brjod pa yin/ /gsal ba med phyir gsal byed rnams/ /nus pa med phyir bsgrubs zin to/ /de 'di yin zhes shes pa ni/ /mngon sum yin par bsal zin to//
102b6(mdo 'grel): de'i phyir yul dbyes tha dad nyid/ /shes bya de ni gdon mi yin/ /'ga' zhig yul ni tha dad par/ /rim gyis 'gro bar byed pa ste/ /skad cig 'jig phyir tha dad 'gyur/ /de min 'gro ba dang ldan min/ /snga ma'i yul dang ma bral ba'i/ /rang
102b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir/ /brtags pas de ni yul gzhan du/ /phyin pas rig pa ma yin no/ /nam mkha' la ni mngon gsal ni/ /rigs min nus pa med phyir dang/ /dbang 'das phyir ro sa zhung la/ /snang ba de ni de ltar snang/ /gzhan yang sgra ni nam mkha' 
103a1(mdo 'grel): la'ang/ /mngon par gsal ba tha dad min/ /blo ni gsal yin de yang ni/ /rtag 'gyur rgyur ni nyer gnas phyir/ /gang tshe sgra la gsal byed pa/ /ji ltar yang ni rigs pa min/ /de tshe gzhan gyi khyad par can/ /sgra blo la ni 'khrul pa med
103a2(mdo 'grel): de phyir ri sogs thams cad ni/ /sgra chos min zhes gnas par 'gyur/ /gang phyir sgra tsam gsal byed nyid/ /yod na der 'gyur de yang btsal/ /shin tu tha dad can de dag/ mtshungs par gcig tu rtogs pa la/ /nus pa can yin sgra dang de'i/ /de ni ces mang
103a3(mdo 'grel): du sngar dpyad zin/ /des na don dang 'brel mthong bas/ /kun rdzob tu ni sgra rjod byed/ /'gyur zhing yang dag pa ru ni/ /rjod byed de min zhes bsgrubs zin/ /sgra las byung ba'i shes de dag/ log par snang bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rigs dang rang gi mtshan nyid
103a4(mdo 'grel): sogs/ /brjod bya rjod byed mi gnas phyir/ /des 'khrul tha snyad 'don pa po/ /yang dag par ni ba lang sgra/ /tha dad yin yang mtshungs blo can/ /gcig nyid yin pa snyam du zin/ /des na mang du ma 'brel par/ /rjod par byed pa bram ze yi/ /sgra yi
103a5(mdo 'grel): khyad par mdun byas pas/ /gang sgras de kun gzhi med yin/ /'di ltar brda la sogs pa/ /gcig nyid mi ma te myur bu la sogs/ /dbye ba tha dad blo yod phyir/ /de yi gsal ba'ang btsal byas zin/ /de la spyi gcig rjes 'gro ba/ /nye bar
103a6(mdo 'grel): mtshon par mi 'gyur ro/ /brda ni dgag pa la sogs pa'i/ /shes pa'i yan lag tu ste 'gyur/ /sgra rnams dngos su phyi rol gyi/ /don rtogs min te 'brel med phyir/ /des na brjod par 'dod pa ni/ /'di dag gis ni bstan par gsungs//
103a7(mdo 'grel): de yi 'bras bu nyid du ni/ /'di dag mngon sum mi dmigs pas/ /nges pa yin phyir des na 'dir/ /rgyu 'bras nyid du gsal bar 'gyur/ /brda yi rgyu dang 'bras ngo bo/ /gang gis nges par byas pa ni/ /de yi brjod 'dod sgra dag gis/ /rtogs
103b1(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur te yang bskyod bzhin/ /brjod 'dod la gnas don dang ni/ /sgra rnams la ni rgyu 'bras kyi/ /bdag nyid can gyi 'brel pa de/ /brda yod na ni skye bar 'gyur/ /de rnams kyi ni 'brel pa ni/ /des na brda las byung zhes brjod/ /de yis gsal
103b2(mdo 'grel): bar byed pa 'di/ /brda yi brjod ces dngos su min/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur 'gyur ba yis/ /dngos po las ni de gzhan min/ /de dag nyid ni de ltar bshad/ /rgyu 'bras nyid kyi 'brel pa yin/ /de dag kyang ni re re yi/ /bdag cag nyid du rmongs pas rtogs/
103b3(mdo 'grel): de na brda yis tha snyad kyi/ /dus kyis khyad par 'dod pa yin/ /yang dag bar ni gcig pu nyid/ /'brel pa 'dir ni yod rigs min/ /tha dad don rnams ma 'dres phyir/ /'brel med tha mi dad la yang/ /gzhan gyi gzhung lugs mi shes pas/ /
103b4(mdo 'grel): ming re la brda re 'am/ /yang na bzlas nas brjod pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la sogs gzhan gyis smras pa/ /mi byas nyid phyir de dag la/ /brda 'brel yang dag yod min/ /de ni de yis gsal byas phyir/ /zhes bya 'brel ba nyid du 'gyur/ /
103b5(mdo 'grel): 'dir ni bzlas nas brjod pa ste/ /gzhan gyis so sor rtogs pa min/ /dbang phyug la sogs bkag nyid phyir/ /'byin pa'i thog mar des byas min/ /re re la ni 'brel pa gang/ /de ni tha dad skad cig gi/ 'jig phyir mtshungs pa'i rtogs
103b6(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /tha dad pa la'ang 'gal ba min/ /de yi yul can blo rnams ni/ /rim gyis kyang ni skye 'gyur ba/ /de la'ang rim pa gsal bar smras /gzhan du de dag rim med 'gyur/ /mang po rnams la cig car du/ /brda byed pa ni yod pa na//
103b7(mdo 'grel): brda ni tha dad par 'dod min/ /sngo sogs skad cig ma bzhin no/ /smra pha po yi blo yi gnas/ /de nyid gzhan longs spyad bya yis/ /khyad par med phyir mi 'thad do/ /snga ma'i dngos ni ma spangs shing/ /khyad par ma byung ba yod na'ang/ /khyed kyi gzhan
104a1(mdo 'grel): gyi rna ba ni/ /longs mi spyod par ji ltar 'gyur/ /rtags kyi phyir dbang bltos med phyir/ /chos dang chos min dbang byas pa/ /gtan du nam mkhar rna ba min/ /thams cad longs spyod min par thal/ /nam mkha' la ni nam du yang/ /
104a2(mdo 'grel): chos min chos kyi phan mi 'dogs/ /rtag pa nyid phyir bya ba min/ /'di la dbang byas 'di ci zhig /sngags dang sman sogs nus pa yin/ /yang longs spyad byar ji ltar 'gyur/ /rtog pa nyid phyir de dag las/ /de ni khyad par thob 'gyur min
104a3(mdo 'grel): gal te rten mi rtag yin na'ang/ /skad cig mi rtag yin zhe na/ /de tshe bdag la bgos med pas/ /'on pa la sogs mi 'thad do/ /de la bogs ni yod bla ste/ /nam mkha' la ni de yod min/ /rten dang 'brel ba yod min te/ /rtag nyid yin pas
104a4(mdo 'grel): bltos med phyir/ /des na de yi sgo nas kyang/ /'dir ni 'on pa sogs mi 'thad/ /nam mkha' cha shas med yin yang/ /rtag pa nyid kyis 'di mtshungs yin/ /yul der gnas par 'gyur yang ni/ /gal te de yang skad cig ma/ /nyid min na ni
104a5(mdo 'grel): dbang las ni/ /gton par rig pa ma yin no/ /de la phyis kyang phul byung ni/ /ci zhig skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gang gis dbang las gton ba ni/ /des slar longs spyod thob 'gyur min/ /gang tshe rna ba dang sgra ni/ /legs byas de ltar 'thad min te/ /
104a6(mdo 'grel): tha dad tha mi dad rtogs pas/ /legs par bya ba mi 'thad phyir/ /legs par byas pa tha dad na/ /rna ba sgra legs byas mi 'gyur/ /de dag dar ni legs byas pa/ /'brel pa cung zad kyang yod min/ /tha dad pa la 'brel ba ni/ /rgyu 'bras nyid du 'gyur
104a7(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ /de yod na ni 'di rtag tu/ /'byung 'gyur rgyur dag gnas pa'i phyir/ /tha mi dad pa'i phyigs la yang/ /de 'drar 'di yang rtag par 'gyur/ /de yang bya bar 'dod pa min/ /de las shes pa rtag thal 'gyur/ /de phyir rlung la sogs
104b1(mdo 'grel): ba la/ /nus pa nges pa 'thad min te/ /bya ba yi ni yul med pas/ /nus pa dang ni mi ldan phyir/ /des na mngon gsal sbyor med pas/ /gzung ba bskyed bar mi 'khrul pa/ /sgra ni shes pa 'di 'bras 'gyur/ /bum sogs gsal ba'i blo bzhin no//
104b2(mdo 'grel): de phyir rtsol dang brjod 'dod pas/ /skyed dang mngon par gsal ba ni/ /nus pa'i bye brag thams cad du/ /'bras bu'i don gyi mtshungs nges 'gyur/ /nam mkha' i cha nyid sun 'byung bar/ /rigs pa 'ga' zhig ji snyed pa/ /phyogs cha la yang ma lus
104b3(mdo 'grel): par/ /de ni mkhas par shes par bya/ /yul yang legs par byed pa na/ /de yis gcig la legs byas min/ /spangs nyid phyir dang nus nges phyir/ /des na yul legs byas pa min/ /shes pa skyed rung nyid min na/ /kun gyis sgra 'di thams cad du/
104b4(mdo 'grel): nam yang rtogs par mi 'gyur te/ /de shes pa la mi mkho'i phyir/ /shes pa skyed par nus yin na/ /shes rgyu nyid du gnas pa'i phyir/ /kun gyis sgra 'di yul kun dang/ /dus kun du ni rtogs par gyur/ /de ni nus sam mi nus pa/ /rang bzhin gyis
104b5(mdo 'grel): gcig bdag nyid gnas/ /'gal ba 'am ni lhan cig byed/ /su zhig gis don 'jig byed nus/ /'ga' zhig la ni shes skyed par/ /rung ba nyid du 'di 'gyur te/ /de phyir skyed par 'gyur ba na/ /'di ni kun gyis rtogs 'gyur min/ /'on kyang
104b6(mdo 'grel): dag la nyer gnas pa/ /sgra tsam gyis gang legs byas 'gyur/ /de rnams nyid kyis sgra thos la/ /ring na gnas pas ji ltar min/ /nye bar gnas la'ang legs byas ni/ /rgyu ru yongs su brtags pa yin/ /ring du gnas na'ang de dag la/ /legs par
104b7(mdo 'grel): byas la'ang mtshungs pa yin/ /gal te sgra tsam rnams la ni/ /khyad par legs byas skyes rtogs na/ /de tshe sgra ni skyed pa ru/ /sus kyang spong bar byed nus min/ /sgra las khyad par can legs byas/ /de tha mi dad can yin te/ /sgra shes bya nyid mi
105a1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur phyir/ /des na sgra yang skye bar 'gyur/ /lan cig sgra ni legs byas na/ /bdag ni de ni nam du yang/ /spong par byed min mi rtag par/ /thal 'gyur phyir te rta dmigs 'gyur/ /gnyis ka legs byas phyogs la
105a2(mdo 'grel): yang/ /nyes pa gnyis tshig bden pa yin/ /kang phyir gang rung ma tshad med/ /snga ma'i rang bzhin rjes 'jug phyir/ /'di ltar sngar ni gsal byed kyis/ /rna ba'i yi ge legs byas gang/ /de dag 'jig min 'pho thob phyir/ /des na kun gyis
105a3(mdo 'grel): kun thos 'gyur/ /skyes bu 'ga' la thos rung par/ /rna ba yig legs byas zhe na/ /de tshe yig gzhan rtogs pa pos/ /rna ba las byung shes 'gyur min/ /de rig mi yi rnam shes ni/ /rung bar legs par byas zhe na/ /de dag nyid kyis rjes
105a4(mdo 'grel): 'jug na/ /de dag kyang ni thos par 'gyur/ /ldog na khyed la yig rna ba/ /'di dag gzhan thob ces mi 'gyur/ /des na de dag rnams la ni/ /rtag pa nyid 'dod rgyu mtshan med/ /gang phyir gzugs brnyan blo kun ni/ /dmigs pa med par
105a5(mdo 'grel): gnas pa man?/ /chu la sogs par nyi ma 'od/ /gcig ni du mar snang ba min/ /ci phyir khyed kyi phyogs la yang/ /blo rnams rnam pa med par gnas/ /phyi rol don ni rnam pa dang/ /ldan pa zhes ni khas blangs yin/ /gzugs brnyan de yang chu yi
105a6(mdo 'grel): ni/ /nang du snang bar 'gyur ba yin/ /nam mkha' i dkyil na snang ba yi/ /nyi ma de ltar gnas min na/ /de ni ci phyir de ltar snang/ /'khrul pas zhe na de nyid kyi/ /de ni gsal bar dmigs med/ de yi ngo bo'i don med phyir/ /de nyid gzhan du rtog ce na//
105a7(mdo 'grel): 'di ni legs par smras pa yin/ /'on kyang de nyid gzhan yin na/ /des na kun gyis kun rig 'gyur/ /gal te ji ltar gnas nang na/ /de yi rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /rnam pa gzhan du dmigs pa na
105b1(mdo 'grel): de ni mthong bar ji ltar 'gyur/ /gang phyir rnams bcas shes la yang/ /de shes don dang mthun pa yi/ /rnam pa yod par snang ba dang/ /shes pa de ni 'dzin par rigs/ /brgyud nas bkod par gyur pas na/ /'og na gnas pa rtogs su chud/ /gcig nyid
105b2(mdo 'grel): yin pas steng gnas pa/ /ci ste 'og na gnas snyam sems/ /gal te ji ltar nyi ma gnas/ /de ltar de ni snang gyur na/ /de rtog par ni brtags bya yin/ /gzhan du min zhes bstan zin to/ /shar du song 'jug pa yis ni/ /nub phyogs song
105b3(mdo 'grel): 'jug la bkod pas/ /gdong mtheng pa na 'khrul pa yin/ /nub phyogs lha la rtogs pa min/ /gzugs brnyan yul can rnam par shes/ /de ni rang bzhin dmigs yin te/ /de dang mi mthun snang ba'i phyir/ /ro dang sgra sogs sems bzhin no//
105b4(mdo 'grel): gang phyir me long chung ngu la/ /gdong ni chung ngur snang bar 'gyur/ /shing song thung du bya ltas nas ni/ /chu gang zhugs pa 'brel gzhan min/ /nyan pa po yang gzhan ma yin/ /ngo bo gcig tu nges pa ni/ /gnyis ka la yang rjes 'jug phyir/ /smra bo
105b5(mdo 'grel): yi sngar med pa yi/ /'brel ba nyan pos ji ltar rtogs// de yi sngon du gang dmigs pa/ /de nyid de yis byas pa yin/ /gang phyir rnam pa gcig rtogs pa'i/ /blo ni de la 'jug pa min/ /de phyir sgra sogs tha dad kyang/ /gcig pu nyid du des nges
105b6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /dum pa sogs kyi spyi yang ni/ /sngar nyid bsal bar byas zin to/ /'byung po'i mgul chings? lta bur ni/ /spyi 'ga' zhig ni snang mi 'gyur/ /'di la spyi yis chu 'dzin sogs/ /nus pa grub pa ma yin no/ /gal te spyi dang dbyer med na/ /de
105b7(mdo 'grel): dag kyang ni rtag nyid 'gyur/ /tha dad 'brel med skyon yin te/ /de las byung na mi rtag 'gyur/ /de phyir spyi las chu 'dzin sogs/ /nus pa yod par rigs pa min/ /bum sogs la nus tha dad na'ang/ /nyes pa 'di dag nyes par 'gyur//
106a1(mdo 'grel): chung 'dzin la sogs de'i 'bras bu/ /rtag pa kho nar thal bar 'gyur/ /nus pa nyid ni 'brel yin pas/ /'di tha dad mi 'dod ce na/ /nus las dbye ba med pa'i phyir/ /sgra dang don dag gcig nyid 'gyur/ /tha dad na yang de la ni/ /
106a2(mdo 'grel): de dag dang 'brel 'ga' yang med/ /de las byung na de nyid min/ /dngos la gzhan du 'gro sa med/ /gang phyir 'brel pa ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra yod par gsal byas pas/ /de phyir 'brel pa brjod dus su/ /ba lang sogs sgra brjod pa na/ /'ga' zhig
106a3(mdo 'grel): gis ni 'grel pa'i blos/ /don rtogs gzhan gyis de bzhin min/ /khyed kyi 'brel pa yod pa na/ /kun gyi ngo? ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /rtag pa'i nus pa kho na yi/ /'brel pa ru ?? khyod kyis 'dod/ /de yang tshad med la nges par/ /don rtogs skyed dam
106a4(mdo 'grel): yang na min/ /nges par tshad med pa skyed ma/ ci phyir kun gyis don ma rtogs/ /tshad bcas skyed na'ang rgyu mtshan ci/ /de nyid kyis de lta bur/ /rang bzhin zhe na brda bzung ba'i/ /sngon du 'am de ni brjod na yang/ /rtogs pa po ni gcig nyid la/ /ci phyir
106a5(mdo 'grel): rnam shes 'jug pa min/ /de shes skyed pa'i nges pa can/ /de ni nus pa gnas phyir ro/ /'on te nus pa rtogs byas nyid/ /de la skyed par des rtags na/ /rtogs par byas dang ma byas dang/ /tha dad ce na rtags nyid nyams/ /gcig nyid na ni rgyu
106a6(mdo 'grel): mtshan cis/ /rnam par dbye ba 'di brjod yin/ /gzhan yang thabs gang zhig ni/ /nus pa shes par 'dod pa yin/ /don gyis go bas shes zhe na/ /gang phyir rigs pa 'di ltar gnas/ /mngon sum gyi ni sgra dang ni/ /rgan dang sa brjod bya mthong ba yin//
106a7(mdo 'grel): nyan pa po la rtogs pa nyid/ /bya bas rjes su dpag nas shes/ /de la brten pa'i nus pa ni/ /gzhan du mi 'thad pa yis rtogs/ /don gyis go bas rtogs 'gyur te/ /tshad ma gsum can 'brel pa'o/ /gzhan du 'thad pa kho na'i phyir/ /nus pa rtogs par
106b1(mdo 'grel): mi nus te/ /gang phyir brda las byung sgra yis/ /don rtogs 'khrul pa med pa yin/ /nus pa rtag nyid phyogs la ni/ /brda sogs cung zad la ltos med/ /des na sgra don gyis rtogs pa/ /rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /brda ni gzhan ma'i ngo bo yis/ /ka li
106b2(mdo 'grel): ma ri sogs sgra bzhin/ /sgra la nges pa'i nus yod phyir/ /don gzhan rtogs par mi 'gyur te/ /gal te sna tshogs don gsal phyir/ /nus pa gcig tu 'dod pa na/ /tha dad ce na sgra gcig gis/ /cig car sna tshogs don rigs 'gyur/ /don ni
106b3(mdo 'grel): gsal bar byed nus pa/ /rtag pa kho nar gnas pa'i phyir/ /de rgyu don la rtogs pa yang/ /thams cad la ni gtan du 'gyur/ /de la brda la bltos pa can/ /nus par brtags par yin zhe na/ /de ni phan 'dogs la bltos min/ /mi g.yo bas
106b4(mdo 'grel): de phan gdags med/ /don ni gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu/ /brda ni mi la brten pa'i phyir/ /mis ma byas pa'i nus pa la'ang/ /yod? pa nyid ni srid pa yin/ /sna tshogs don ni gsal byed pa'i/ /nus pa sgra gcig la yod na/ /me la sbyin sreg
106b5(mdo 'grel): la sogs don/ /thams cad kun la nyer mkho? min/ /de 'dod phyin ci log don ni/ /gsal bar byed pa'ang srid pa'i phyir/ /des na sgra don 'brel brtag pa/ /brtag pa don med can yin no/ /brta? yang ltos par byed pa na/ /brtag sa par
106b6(mdo 'grel): nus pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /rgyu mtshan med pa'i 'brel pa 'di/ /ci phyir yongs su g.yo ba yin/ /grub pa nyer bzhag pa la ni/ /brda ni ma rtogs par bya gzhan/ /don rtogs par byed pa ni/ /de la cung zad kyang snang min/ /'di
106b7(mdo 'grel): ltar brda ni med pa na/ /tha snyad 'di ni mthong pa yin/ /de las 'bral pa grub ce na/ /brgyud pa 'di ni don med 'gyur/ /skyes bu 'dod tsam las byung pa'i/ /brda ni 'ba' zhig las kyang ni/ /tha snyad kyang na rigs yin te/ /des na 'grel
107a1(mdo 'grel): pa mi 'grub po/ /gzhan du yang ni 'thad par ni/ /tha snyad la ni dogs par 'gyur/ /dbang po las 'das 'brel pa ni/ /mi rnams kyis ni rtogs ma yin/ /thams cad kyis ni mi shes pas/ /snga ma snga ma ma grags phyir/ /'bel pa
107a2(mdo 'grel): ma grub ces bya bas/ /de ltar de cis yongs su brtags/ /des na ba lang rta sogs kyis/ /sgra ni rtag pa'i 'brel ldan min/ /brda la bltos bcas nyid kyi phyir/ /ga bi la sogs sgra bzhin no/ /rung pa'i ba lang sgra yod na/ /des nus min skyes kyis
107a3(mdo 'grel): bcad byas/ /ga bi sogs las ba lang blo/ /rtsa ba'i sgra rjes 'brangs zhe na/ /de min nyan pa sogs rnams kyis/ /legs par sbyar ba mi rtogs phyir/ /rtse ba'i sgra yis rjes 'brang ba'i/ /ji ltar don gyi blo 'byung 'gyur/ /de phyir sgra don gyis 'brel pa//
107a4(mdo 'grel): rtag par khas blangs par ma byas/ /de ni brda las byung rigs yin/ /rnam pa kun tu de srid phyir/ /yang na yul zhig rigs rgyud ni/ /chad pa'i ngo bo tha mi pa yin/ /sangs rgyas pas? 'dod 'dod med gang/ /tshangs la sogs la'ang yod par dogs/ /de yod na ni rig byed
107a5(mdo 'grel): la/ /'jig rtsa'i blo ni srid pa yin/ /log pa'i gti mug rgyags sogs las/ /phyin ci log rtog gzhan yang srid/ /de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba yi/ /rig byed gzhan nyid du ni 'gyur/ /ji srid gnod pa can ma bstan/ /de srid de ni dogs par 'gyur//
107a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan du byed pa'i 'dod yod kyang/ /sgra ni 'jug par mi 'gyur na/ /de bzhin gal te mi rnams la/ /gzhan du byed 'dod mi skye na/ /de tshe rig byed 'di gzhun? dang/ /don ni gzhan bdag nyid mi rtogs/ /gzhan du byed pa'i 'dod 'jug na/ /dogs pa ldog
107a7(mdo 'grel): par mi 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu thams cad dag gis ni/ /sngar grub rim pa bzung ma yin/ /tshig dag yi ge'i rim pa yis/ /rang dbang gis kyang byed par 'gyur/ /gzhan du khyed la rig byed bzhin/ /gzhung 'ga' byas par mi 'gyur ro/ /des na
107b1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin don med pa'i/ /gzhung tsam la yang byas med 'gyur ba ji ltar gzhan dag gis brjod pa/ /des na de ni brjod 'dod ces/ /des ni nges pa ma yin te/ des na 'brel bzhin thog med yin/ /gzhan gyis brjod pa bdag gis brjod/ /brjod par 'dod
107b2(mdo 'grel): pa de 'drar 'gyur/ /mtshungs pa'i rtogs pa'i 'khrul pa yis/ /las kyi bye brag ji bzhin no/ /dbyangs la sogs pa mi mthun phyir/ /gzhan gyis brjod pa brjod bya min/ /yi ge'i bdag nyid du snang phyir/ /gsal byar byed pa'i chos 'di min/ /des na
107b3(mdo 'grel): mi re rig tha dad/ /snang ba yin te bum sogs bzhin/ /de phyir tha dad gsal bas na/ /de yi mtshan ma ci ste dgag /rigs kyis bum pa la sogs la/ /tha snyad nye bar mtshon pa ni/ /de med pas na sngar bkag yin/ /gsal ba dang de mi ldan phyir/ /de phyir
107b4(mdo 'grel): rkang la sogs pa'i rigs/ /skyes bu thams cad la gnas min/ /des na smra po de rnams kyis/ /sgra tsam nyer mtshon bskul ba min/ /de phyir ji srid yig yod pa/ /sgra tsam gyi rigs tha dad ni/ /sgra bon? gsal ba'i rgyur 'jug pa'am/ /yang na gsal ba de
107b5(mdo 'grel): ldan min/ /des na rkan sogs ldan pa dang/ /rnam dbye'i rim pa sngon 'gro can/ /byed la sgra tsam go rims dang/ /rigs kyis gnyis ka'i rtag nyid med/ /ji ltar skor ba sogs rnams kyi/ /cha rigs sogs kyis mtshon byas min/ /rim pa'i rjes
107b6(mdo 'grel): 'jug 'gyur de ltar/ /rkan sogs sgra tsam yig rten min/ /gra ba nyid phyir gsal rnams la/ /rigs kyi chos ni nges bzung dang/ /yang de'i dbang gis don rnams la/ /khyab pa nyid yang rim mi 'dzin pa/ /des na sgra tsam gyis yon tan//
107b7(mdo 'grel): thams cad rtag nyid du gnas pa/ /yi ge'i rjes su byed pa na/ /don gyi dbye ba rtogs ma yin/ /gzhan yang ji srid la yod pa/ /sgra tsam rigs tha dad sgra la/ /mngon par gsal ba'i rgyur 'jug pa'am/ /yang na gsal ba de ldan na/ /des na
108a1(mdo 'grel): gsal byed yod pa'i phyir/ /sgra ni rtag tu dmigs par 'gyur/ /des na khyed la gsal rim gyis/ /bdag nyid yi ge'i rim rigs min/ /gsal ba dang 'brel ngo bo ru/ /rigs rnams gnas par gyur ba na/ /gsal ba rnams la'ang
108a2(mdo 'grel): rtag pa nyid/ /bzlog par dka' bar thal bar 'gyur/ /rigs dang 'brel pa'i ngo bo ru/ /gsal ba rnams kyang gnas yin na/ /rigs la'ang mi rtag nyid du ni/ /khyed mi 'dod kyang thal bar 'gyur/ /mngon par gsal bar mi 'thad par/ /snga ni
108a3(mdo 'grel): bstan par byas zin pas/ /de ltar rtogs par byed pa ni/ /khyed kyi yi ge'i rtog byed min/ /dus gcig khyab cing rtag pa yang/ /sngar ni bkag pa kho na yin/ /dngos po kun la yi ge bzhin/ /'ga' zhig gis gsal byas ma yin/ /yi ge rnams
108a4(mdo 'grel): ni gsal bya na/ /'di ni rtogs pa'i yan lag min/ /gzhan las khyad par med phyir dang/ /gzhan du med phyir de rtag min/ /des na yi ge'i go rims dang/ /thung dang ring dang ches ring gang/ /de dag dus kyi rnam dbye bas/ /sgra tsam khyad par can dus kyi
108a5(mdo 'grel): rnam dbye de dag rigs ma yin/ /de phyir khyed la rtag pa yi/ /de 'dra'i tshig gi chos yod min/ /des na yi ge mi rtag par/ /smra la tshig ni mi rtag grub/ /gal te gsal byed rkyen rnams kyis/ /'dir ni gsal bar rigs 'gyur na/ /gzhan gyi
108a6(mdo 'grel): chos kyang yan lag nyid/ /rta yi shugs sogs bzhin du 'gyur/ /sgra kun rtag pa nyid la ni/ /don gyi go ba sun byung zin/ /mi rtag kyang ni don rtogs pa'i/ /rgyu nyid du ni bsgrub par byas/ /gang zhig gang gis brjod 'dod las/ /'byung bar brjod 'dod ??
108a7(mdo 'grel): gzhan pa las/ /yi ge skye bar 'gyur ba ni/ /de yi rjes thogs las de thos/ /snga ma'i yi ge rtogs byung ba'i/ /yang dag rig pa myur thos min/ /myur du thos pa ma yin pa/ /de ni de dran la bltos nas/ /phyi nas rang nyid dran par byed/ /de dag skye dang 'dzin
108b1(mdo 'grel): ba yi/ /shes pa dag la brten nas ni/ /skyes dus byas pa'i yig go rims/ /'di ni skyed dang rgyus nyid yin/ /de phyir tshigs rnams so so la/ /yig rnams tha dad ces ni gsal/ /'dul bsnyon lcug ma shing ha la/ /zhes sogs rim ba'i bye brag phyir/ /de dag de 'dra'i rim
108b2(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /don tha dad bston byed yin/ /de nyid phyir na gsal ba yi/ /de ni don rtogs ched du ni/ /sgra bsnyams? kyis yongs su brtags/ /yi ge kho nas rtogs nus pas/ /der ni brtags pa don med yin/ /snang ba ma mthong ba yi phyir/ /'di ni med pas nges par 'gyur//
108b3(mdo 'grel): 'di ni mi snang ba yin na/ /rtag bzhin shes par byed par 'gyur/ /yod pa tsam gyis de shes la/ /rgyu yi ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir/ /de ni shes byed 'dod ce na/ /mi bzhin rtag tu shes byed 'gyur/ /de bzhin brda ni ma rtogs dang/ /yi ge rnams ni ma thos kyang
108b4(mdo 'grel): de las byung ba'i don shes ni/ /'byung rgyur nus rgyu nyen gnas phyir/ /'di ltar 'di ni rtag yod pa/ /'di la bltos pa cung zad med/ /sgra tsam brda yig rnams kyis kyang/ /de gsal ma yin ma mthong phyir/ /shes pa gsal ba yin zhes bshad/ /de
108b5(mdo 'grel): yi shes pa rig ma yin/ /des na gsal bar byed 'di la/ /brtag pa nyid kyang don med 'gyur/ /sgra tsam gyis ni legs byas can/ /yongs su smin pa skyed pa na/ /mdza' ma'i sgra dang lhan cig tu/ /sgra ni blo la snang bar 'gyur/ /de ltar de yang de yis bar? ni//
108b6(mdo 'grel): rgyu mtshan med par brtags pa yin/ /de la yang ni sgra gzhan la/ /snang bar 'gyur ba mtshon ma yin/ /gang dag gis kyang gsal ba la/ /rim gyis 'byung ba sgra tsam gyis/ /skye ba nyid dang gsal ba nyid/ /sems pa de dag la rim 'gal//
108b7(mdo 'grel): cha shas med la rim gyis ni/ /skye ba dang gsal 'thad pa yin/ /ngo bo gcig las phyi med phyi/ /de dag rtag tu 'gyur ba yin/ /cha shas bcas pa nyid yin pas/ /ji ltar yig nges don ston min/ /gsal cha'ang cis na de ltar min/ /ma mthong
109a1(mdo 'grel): gsal cha ci phyir brtags/ /gal te sgra gcig gis lhan cig /skyed dang gsal bar byas zhe na/ /shin tu gsal ba grub pa'i phyir/ /yi ge gzhan ni sbyor ba yin/ /gang phyir 'dogs dka' 'di yi ni/ /rang bzhin de ni de ltar byas/ /mtshungs
109a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i dus ldan yig gzhan gyis/ /slar yang mngon par gsal bar byed/ /de nyid dam ni gzhan gcig gis/ /ci phyir 'das nas yang dang yang/ /gsal ba zlog par mi byed de/ /de la khyed med phyir min nam/ /yul dang dbang po legs byas pa'i/ /ngo
109a3(mdo 'grel): bo gsal ba 'di la yang/ /yi ge bzhin du dgag bya ste/ /de snang sems ni yod na yang/ /de yi phyir na mngon sum gyi/ /rim gyis rtogs la phyin nas gang/ /ma lus yi ge rnam shes pa/ /de yi don shes rgyu can yin/ /tha ma'i yi ge rnams
109a4(mdo 'grel): rtogs na/ /legs byas thams cad kyis byas pas/ /yi ge rnams la gcig car du/ /dran pa thams cad skye bar 'gyur/ /rim gyis shes pa yod na yang/ /smra ba po ni thams cad kyis/ /don rnams thams cad dag la ni/ /de ni yid bsdus
109a5(mdo 'grel): shes par 'dong/ /rim par snang ba de nyid na/ /khas len byed pa min zhe na/ /brgya la sogs pa'i ngo bo ni/ /de bsdus shes pa skye mi 'gyur/ /gal te des na yig rim pa/ /sna ba yid kyi sngar shes pa/ /skye 'gyur yang na phyi nas ni/ /cig car
109a6(mdo 'grel): dran shes 'byung bar 'gyur/ /des na yi ge der gnas min/ /ring na gnas pa rtogs pa'i phyir/ /des na sgra las don gyi blo/ /'jig rten pa rnams kyis mchod 'gyur/ /rnam pa dang bcas shes pa ni/ /thams cad de ni rigs pa yin//
109a7(mdo 'grel): de lta min na 'jig 'gyur ba/ /dran pa la ni ji ltar snang/ /'on te yi ge mi snang ba'i/ /gsal ba can sngar rtogs 'gyur ba/ /gnas pa kho na dran zhe na/ /de min gsal snang thal 'gyur phyir/ /gnas pa sngar ni gsal zin te/ /
109b1(mdo 'grel): de ni gnas na'ang yi ge yi/ /nyams myong shes pa'i dus nyid du/ /dran pa skye 'gyur rgyu gcig phyir/ /ba lang zhes bya'i blo gcig nyid/ /kho bo cag gis bkag byas min/ /de 'dzin don gcig nyid dag gis/ /sgra la blo gcig 'gyur ba yin/ /ba lang sgra
109b2(mdo 'grel): la de yod kyang/ /myur phyir bar mtshams chung ba'i phyir/ /lhas byin la sogs sgra la ni/ /dbye ba gsal bar rtogs par 'gyur/ /yi ge las byung don blo de/ /de shes pa yi rjes las skyes/ /de 'dra de ni de las byung/ /du ba sogs las me blo
109b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /yig las tha dad sgra snang ba/ /shes pa rjes thogs 'byung ba can/ /don gyi blo ni rig pa min/ /des na sgra bzhin rjod byed med/ /'bras bu'i tha snyad kyi yan lag /rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa dag /thams cad du ni des byas pa/ /des na khyab pa
109b4(mdo 'grel): 'dir nges yin/ /yi ge mi rtag nyid la ni/ /rjod byed nyid du bsgrubs zin to/ /rtag pa'i bsgrub pa ngo shes dang/ /rjes dpag dag kyang bsal zin to/ /mi shes pas rang tshig sogs dang/ /'gal bar rtsod par byas pa yin/ /gang phyir rtag pa'i phyogs
109b5(mdo 'grel): la ni/ /khyed la de kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtag pa'i dag ni yod pa na/ /gsal byed rigs min dpyad zin te/ /go rim la sogs mi ldan dang/ /rtag tu ma dmigs pa yi phyir/ /chos can tha dad ma brtags par/ /bzhi ma grub pa gang brjod de/
109b6(mdo 'grel): rjes dpag mtshan nyid mi shes phyir/ /gang phyir snang 'gyur chos can yin/ /nya ba la sogs rnams la yang/ /ma dpyad rab tu grub don gang/ /shes pa la ni gang snang ba/ /de tsam chos can nyid du bshad/ /de nyid la ni rtsod pa 'di/ /smra
109b7(mdo 'grel): po rnams la 'jug pa yin/ /'dod pas bkod pa'i bye brag la/ /rtsod pa suAng yod ma yin/ /des na khyad par med bstan pa/ /khyad par du ni rnam rtog pa/ /rjes su dpag pa thams cad kyis/ /'jug pa kho na la gnod 'gyur/ /bskul ba las
110a1(mdo 'grel): ni skyes pa'i blo/ /tshad ma yin te skyon bral pa'i/ /rgyu rnams kyis ni skyed nyid phyir/ /zhes bya sogs kyang rnam dpyad bya/ /dag cing rtag pa'i don 'brel pa'i/ /bskul ba'i las ni skyes pa'i blo/ /phyogs yin zhe na gzhan brten
110a2(mdo 'grel): nas/ /gzhi ma grub par thal bar 'gyur/ /de yi gnas skabs rtag pa nyid/ /de las gzhan pa mi rtag yin/ /de yi gnas skabs nyid log na/ /ci zhig gnas par 'dod pa yin/ /dbang po 'ba' zhig gis gzung nyid/ /gtan tshigs su
110a3(mdo 'grel): ni 'dir rtog na/ /sngar gnod byas pa'i rigs kyis ni/ /'khrul par rtogs pa ma yin no/ /rang gi snang ba'i dbang shes la/ /rgyu yin dbang pos bzung bar 'dod/ /rtag pa rgyu nyid ma yin par/ /de ni rab tu bsgrubs zin to/ /de 'dra'i don la rgyu nyid ni/ /thams cad
110a4(mdo 'grel): la'ang grub pa yin/ /de lta yin na du sogs la'ang/ /kun la rnam par rtag 'di mtshungs/ /kho bo cag la kun rdzob pa'i/ /so sor brtags 'gog la sogs pa/ /btsal ma thag 'byung shes 'bras bu/ /rtsom byed nyid duAng grub pa min/ /'gog pa dag
110a5(mdo 'grel): ni 'jig bdag nyid/ /'dod min gang phyir zag bcas pas/ /so sor brtags pas 'gog pa gang/ /bral ba so so so so yin/ /skye la gtan du gags byed pa/ /'gog gzhan so sor brtags min pas/ /de phyir grub mdza' mi shes pa/ /log pa'i nga
110a6(mdo 'grel): rgyal gyis ni slad/ /rang bzhin med phyir 'gog dang mkha' / /btsal ma thag las byung ba min/ /gyo mo snang ba'i tshogs sogs ni/ /de ltar shes pa'i rgyu mtshan yin/ /don gcig rang gi rang bzhin la/ /ngo bo gnyis nyid gsal bar byas/ /de phyir rigs
110a7(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sgra/ /rtag pa bum 'di la grub min/ /de yi gnas skabs nyid spong tsam/ /mi rtag bsgrub bya nyid du ni/ /'dod pa yin te mar me sogs/ /de la dpe ni gsal ba ni/ /'bar sogs skad cig re rer yang/ /'jig nyid ma grub pa yin nam//
110b1(mdo 'grel): der ni cha shas phra mo ni/ /yul gzhan du ni song ba yin/ /sdong bu phyogs la yang du ni/ /'bar ba bsdus nas gnas pa yin/ /de la ji srid gyen song ba/ /de srid 'bar ba zhes rtogs yin/ /de yang 'das nas gang song ba/ /de ni 'od kyi bdag nyid yin/ /
110b2(mdo 'grel): de rjes la ni gang song ba/ /de na phra phyir nges bzung min/ /yan lag phyis mas lam bkag pas/ /nad ma 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar phyi mas go phye ba/ /nang ma de ltar de ltar 'gro /des na 'gro ba yin yang nges/ /rtsa sogs sreg par mi byed do//
110b3(mdo 'grel): zhe na de ni brtags pa tsam/ /tshad ma ma smras pa yi phyir/ /gzhan yang nus ma nyams de dag /rtsa dang ras bal sogs phrad na/ /sreg par byed pa thal 'gyur 'di/ /snga ma bzhin du ldog mi 'gyur/ /gzhan du nus dang mi nus pa'i/ /gang tshe? rang bzhin
110b4(mdo 'grel): dbye yod na/ /de tshe rtag dngos de dag la/ /de ni ji ltar yod par 'gyur/ /'brel pa la yang rtag pa nyid/ /sngar ni bkag pa byas pa yin/ /des ni 'brel byar mi 'dod pa'i/ /rigs pas dag rtag rigs ma yin/ /ji lta bu yi dag la ni/ /rtag pa nyid
110b5(mdo 'grel): du khas blangs byas/ /yi ge tsam gyi bdag nyid dam/ /yig rim yang na tha dad yin/ /rim med yi ge rnams la ni/ /brjod pa nyid med de yis ni/ /de dag de 'dra'i dag pa yin/ /de dag la ni rim pa'ang med/ khyab pa'i phyir dang rtag nyid phyir//
110b6(mdo 'grel): de dag la ni yul dus rim/ /me tog 'bras bu sogs dbye bzhin/ /yig bris bzhin du 'thad ma yin/ /de dag rang bzhin rim yod pa/ /mtsho ru zhes bya nyid srid na/ /phyi nas ro mtsho sogs mi 'gyur/ /brtan pa'i rim pa dang 'gal phyir/ /gang
110b7(mdo 'grel): phyir yi ge rnam rtag par/ /brjod par byas pa de yi phyir/ /rim gzhan gnas pa'i ro mtsho sogs/ /rim pa gzhan la skye mi 'gyur/ /de ltar min khyod kyis smras pa'i/ /ngo shes pa ni rtag pa dang/ /gcig nyid sgrub par byed pa po/ /'khrul
111a1(mdo 'grel): pa can du 'gyur ba yin/ /tha dad pa la 'jug pa'i phyir/ /gsal ba'i rim pa'ang ngag min te/ /brtag pa'i bkag pa gsal byas min/ /ngag ni 'thad pa ma yin pas/ /de phyir rtag pa nyid mi rigs/ /ji ltar 'phel ba la sogs sgra//
111a2(mdo 'grel): 'dod pas bkod pa'i don can rnams/ /mtho ris mchod sbyin la sogs sgra/ /de bzhin du yang bsrings pa yin/ /rang nyid kyis byas gtam ngo bo'i/ /zlos gar gtam rgyud la sogs pa/ /rtag pa'i sgra dang don 'brel pa/ /brjod 'dod yang dag par yod min/ /de la'ang
111a3(mdo 'grel): nus rtag nyid yod de/ /nges sbyor mi rtag nyid kyi phyir/ /nus pa 'khrul 'jug 'gyur zhe na/ /de la sun dbyung phyi rol don/ /med pa nyid ni ma yin nam/ /don gang la ni nus par brtags/ /rnam rtog gzugs brnyan la zhe na/ /de bzhin rig byed la yang mtshungs//
111a4(mdo 'grel): dbang po las 'das don 'brel pa'i/ /nus pa su zhig gis rtogs 'gyur/ /de phyir rig byed la nges sbyor/ /mi la reg las pa'ang rig min/ /rgan po la'ang de rtogs min/ /de dag mi shes rang bzhin gnas/ /skyes bu la brtan bshad pa las/ /rtogs pa
111a5(mdo 'grel): de ni srid pa yin/ /byas pa'i lung la brgal brtag pa/ /'di ni mtshungs pa ma yin nam/ /der min der ni dad pas sam/ /don la the tshom za bas 'jug/ mngon sum dang ni rjes dpag pas/ /yul ni rnam par brtags yod pas/ /rig byed sgra ni de lta min//
111a6(mdo 'grel): gang phyir de ni rang las shes/ /byas ba'i don can gtam gyis chos/ /ma mthong ngo bo thos las mtshungs/ /de ltar rig byed ma 'brel pa/ /gzhan dag gis 'dir smras pa yin/ /sgra don thogs med spang byas nas/ /'brel pa thog med rgyu mtshan nyid//
111a7(mdo 'grel): gzhan yod ma yin des na 'di/ /rig byed la ni 'brel sogs med/ /thabs dang bral ba nyid kyis ni/ /'brel pa byar med rjes su dpag/ bshad pa byar med rjes dpag ni/ /mthong ba nyid kyis 'gal bar 'gyur/ /rgan po rnams kyi rtogs pa ni/ /
111b1(mdo 'grel): yang dang yang du snang 'gyur ba/ /thabs yin zhes par rtogs brten nas/ /de nyams pa ni mi 'grub ci/ /gal te rig byed don la nges/ /rgan po rnams las mi bslu bar/ /grub par gyur na de dag kun/ /de ltar 'gyur gyi gzhan du nyams/ /thams cad bsdus
111b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i khyab pa na/ /grub phyir 'dus pa can nyid kyi/ /rtags la mi mthun sgrub pa ni/ /cung zad srid pa ma yin no/ /don bcas rnam dbye'i don can gyi/ /khyad par rim pa dang ldan pa/ /tshig dang dag gi tshogs zhes bya/ /yi ge kho na de ltar bshad//
111b3(mdo 'grel): don bcas rnam dbye'i don can gyi/ /khyad par rim dang ldan nyid ni/ /skyes bus ma byas la bkag zin/ /des na khyab pa gnod med yin/ /rig byed 'don pa brjod nyid la/ /de ltar khyab pa nges pa med/ /des na sgrub pa 'di la ni/ /ldog pa the tshom gsal
111b4(mdo 'grel): bar yod/ /de ltar rim pa byed pa yi/ /mi ni nus med nges byas na/ /'dir ni khyab pa 'di 'grub ste/ /de ni nges par mi nus so/ /ma lus mi yi chos rnams ni/ /mngon sum du ni byas yin na/ /nges pa kho na skye ba yin/ /'di ni thams cad khyed
111b5(mdo 'grel): la dang/ /rig byed skyes bus byas nyid du/ /yod par gsal ba srid pa yin/ /'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang/ /srog chags 'tshe dang brdzun bshad pa/ /brjod dka' nyid dang thung brjod nyid/ /'brel med nyid dang mi snyan sogs/ /rig
111b6(mdo 'grel): byed chos rnams chod smra ba'i/ /tshig la yang ni yod par snang/ /dug sel nus pa la sogs la/ /bden pa cung zad gang snang ba/ /de ni mkha' lding bya sogs snang/ /gzhan yang rnam pa 'di yis ni/ /skyes bus byas pa cung zad med/ /gang
111b7(mdo 'grel): phyir bde gshegs kyis gsungs pa'i/ /gsungs pa'ang de ltar rjes dpag nus/ de yis mngon gsal byas dngos phyir/ /des byas pa zhes brjod par bya/ /byed pa dran pa de la yang/ /de ni don brjod rgyu mtshan nyid/ /de ltar
112a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan mi 'dod ce na/ /rigs pa mtshungs phyir ces mi 'dod/ /de ltar gzhan mi 'dod par zad/ /rigs pas de bzhin dogs pa yin/ /thams cad du ni skyes bu rnams/ /phal cher brdzun ni smra ba yin/ /ji ltar de ltar yid mi chos
112a2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin 'das pa'i don bstan la/ /de ltar de yi khyed smras pa'i/ /rigs par gzhung lugs 'ga' la yang/ /byed po cung zad grub min te/ /rang nyid byas par brjod na yang/ /des na skyes bus ma byas la/ /bden par re ba 'di dor cig /gang
112a3(mdo 'grel): phyir rig byed don 'gal ba'i/ /don ni de dag las bstan yin/ /gzhan yang theg med grub na yang/ /des kyang ? ma byas mi 'grub/ /de las ma byas par 'grub na/ /lung gzhan rnams kyang ma byas 'gyur/ /'di ltar par tshig la sogs
112a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /tha snyad rnams ni gzhan brten pa'i/ /chad par smra ba'i grub mdza' yang/ /gzhan gyis 'dus byas pa las byung/ /de 'dra'i ma byas nyid grub kyang/ /yod la nan tan ci zhig yod/ /khyed kyi 'bad ba ma lus ni/ /yang dag don grub rgyur bcas
112a5(mdo 'grel): yin/ /dus nyid skyes bu nyid sogs la/ /sngar bzhin ldog la the tshom za/ /skyes bu rnams la byed pa yi/ /nus pa med par ma bsgrubs phyir/ /bsal ba bkag par byas nyid phyir/ /smra po byed por shes par gyis/ /de phyir sbyor pa gnyis po yang
112a6(mdo 'grel): dpe ni bsgrub byas stong par smras/ /mis bstan pa la ltos phyir dang/ /byas pa nyid du sgrub byas phyir/ /rang don smra po ma bltos nyid/ /chos can dpe dag la ni med/ /dag la stag nyid spangs pas na/ /chos can dang ni dpe dag la'ang/ /rtag pa'i
112a7(mdo 'grel): dag las byung nyid ni/ /gsal bar ma grub par rtogs min/ /'di ltar bskul pa skyes bu yis/ /ma byas nyid du ma nges pas/ /gtan tshigs phyi ma rnams la yang/ /the tshom za ma grub skyon 'gyur/ /skad cig mas 'jig gsal bsgrubs
112b1(mdo 'grel): pas/ /re zhig thos pa brtag pa yis/ /rang gi ngo bo la gnod par/ /des byas blo ni gang las 'gyur/ /thos pa las kyang skyes bu ni/ /'jig par mi 'gyur zhes bshad pa/ /sngar ni de la gnod bstan pas/ /de ni ma grub par gsal yin/ /lag mthil skyu ru ra
112b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin du/ /yul dang dus dang skyes bu bzhin/ /gang gis mngon sum du ni gyur/ /des bder gnod med 'di des 'gyur/ /mi yis mi shes don ngo bo/ /de nas mun pa'i dngos gnas pa'i/ /rig byed la ni dman rnams chags/ /rang gi dpyod la par tshig bzhin/ /de
112b3(mdo 'grel): yi don ni mi shes pa'ang/ /sdig pa'i rgyu mthun dang ldan phyir/ /srog chags 'tshe sogs sdig pa la/ /de bzhin 'di dag 'jug par 'gyur/ /de phyir chos la brtan nas ni/ /bskul ba tshad ma nyid ma grub/ /sgra de dag la bdag gzhan gyis/ /de don nges
112b4(mdo 'grel): par rtogs mi 'gyur/ /ye shes snang bas nang gi ni/ /mun pa'i tshogs ni 'joms byed pa/ /thos don rnam dben ston byed pa/ /tshad ma grub pa 'dod par gyis/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa la/ /thos pa brtag pa ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// //
112b5(mdo 'grel): rig byed skyes bus byas nyid du/ /de ltar sgrub par byas pas na/ /'bad mi dgos par de dag la/ /rang las tshad ma nyid kyang rtsal/ /rang las tshad ma thams cad kyi/ /tshad ma nyid ni gzung bar gyis/ /de lta bu'i dag de la ni/ /khyed kyi don ni ji ltar 'dod
112b6(mdo 'grel): de dag la ni rang bzhin gyis/ /gzhal bya rtogs sogs nus gnas yin/ /rang la med pa'i nus pa ni/ /gzhan gyis byed par nus ma yin/ /bltos pa med nyid gcig kho na/ /tshad ma nyid kyi rgyu mtshan yin/ /bltos pa dang bcas nyid rten na//
112b7(mdo 'grel): de ni 'jig pa kho nar 'gyur/ /rigs pa smra ba su zhig ni/ /rtsa ba la gnod phyogs des med/ /gang gis dag gi rang tshig gi /de grub thabs kyang 'jig par byed/ /bltos pa dang bcas tshad nyid ni/ /la lar yang ni gzhag byas min//
113a1(mdo 'grel): gtan tshigs thug pa med pa yis/ /bsgrub bya su zhig bsgrub par byed/ /de lta'i don ni 'dod ce na/ /dngos po thams cad dag la ni/ /nus pa tha mi dad pa can/ /sngar bsgrubs byas zin ma yin nam/ /gang phyir 'dod 'bras nus pa can/ /rang bzhin
113a2(mdo 'grel): nus pa med zhes brjod/ /de dag dngos bdag nyid min na/ /dngos de byed pa por mi 'gyur/ /rang rgyu'i stobs las byung ba can/ /de yang mi rtag de 'dra ba'i/ /nus pa tshad ma dag yin/ /rang bzhin gyis ni yod pa ru/ /khyed cag ji ltar 'dod pa yin/ /nus
113a3(mdo 'grel): pa rang bzhin can yin na/ /rtag pa 'am ni rgyu med 'gyur/ /de bdag nyid phyir tshad ma yang/ /rtag pa nyid dang rgyu med yin/ /rgyu med gzhan la mi bltos phyir/ /rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur/ /des na der reg las 'bras bu/ /res 'ga' pa ni rigs
113a4(mdo 'grel): pa min/ /tshad ma rnams kyi rang bzhin dang/ /'bras bu nyid ni res 'ga' bar/ /snang rung des na nus pa yis/ /rang bzhin can khyed la mi rigs/ /tshad ma rnams kyi rang dngos ni/ /gsal byed kyis gsal snang bas ni/ /skyon gzhan la ni bltos nas ni//
113a5(mdo 'grel): de 'bras rtsom par byed ce na/ /rtag dngos la ni gsal ba dang/ /rgyu gzhan la ni bltos pa spangs/ /de phyir de yi ngo bo dang/ /'bras bu rtag tu dmigs par 'gyur/ /dngos la nus pa tha dad dang/ /gnyis bdag nyid na'ang de lta na'ang/ /rtag pa'i nus
113a6(mdo 'grel): dang 'brel pa can/ /de shes rtag tu 'byung par 'gyur/ /de ltar min na rtag mi 'gyur/ /dngos gcig rjes 'gro med pa'i phyir/ /gang phyir de shes dang nus pa/ /res 'ga' 'brel cing gzhan du min/ /rang gi rgyu las skye 'gyur ba/ /tshad ma rnams kyi nus pa ni/ /rang gi rgyu las skyes
113a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ /phyis rkyen gzhan byas min zhe na/ /'dir ni bdag cig la rtsod med/ /gang phyir rang rgyu las skyes pa'i/ /cha shas med pa'i dngos po yi/ /nus pa phyi nas su zhig rtog /gzhan gyis phyis kyi dus su ni/ /ngo bo gang zhig byas pa ni/ /de ni dngos gzhan
113b1(mdo 'grel): nyid yin pas/ /de'i bdag nyid du brjod min/ /gang phyir 'gal ba'i chos 'dre ba/ /dngos po'i tha dad nyid du bshad/ /de grub na de mi 'grub phyir/ /nus pa la yang de yod yin/ /dngos kun skad cig 'jig pa ru/ /bsgrub par byas pas de dag gi /nus pa 'ga' zhig rkyen
113b2(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyis/ /skyed par byed par mi nus so/ /gang phyir de dag gis gnas pa/ /dus gzhan du ni rkyen gzhan gyis/ /'bras bu 'ga' zhig la nus thob/ /'di ni blo bzang sangs rgyas pa/ /de dag ji ltar brjod pa yin/ /shes pa 'ga' la nus gnas kyang//
113b3(mdo 'grel): de ni rang las rtogs nus min/ /ji ltar gnas pa'i shes bya yi/ /dngos po rtogs dang thob nus nyid/ /nyams myong bdag nyid gcig pu yis/ /su zhig nges par byed pa nus/ /gang phyir tshad ma ma yin yang/ /skra shad la sogs shes pa ni/ /rnam pa gsal ba snang
